reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: My Genuine review about SNS college of technology.

detailed_review.Placements: Currently, 40% of students were placed in Computer Science and Engineering. The highest package is around 13.5 LPA, the lowest package offered is 2.5 LPA, and the average package is 4.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are CTS, Accenture, Wipro, TCS, and Zoho. Only very few students got internships at ISRO and from some start-up companies. Top roles offered are Software Developer, Mobile App Developer, Full Stack Developer, and DevOps Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The whole campus supports Wi-Fi connectivity, but with very low internet speed. Here, we don't have hi-fi systems in our lab; mostly all the labs are equipped with AC. Every classroom is equipped with a projector and smart board and has proper ventilation. The hostel is situated inside the campus. Talking about the quality of food available in the mess, it is very average. There is a food court available inside the campus which provides good quality food. SNS College of Technology gives more importance to sports and encourages us to participate in various sports events like cricket, basketball, volleyball, etc.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers here are qualified, helpful, and knowledgeable. Mostly every staff member uses smart boards for teaching so that we can easily take notes, and it is way easier to understand than with regular boards. This course is curriculum-relevant, and also it makes the students industry-ready. The semester exams are moderately difficult, and the pass percentage is 50%.
detailed_review.Other: I am fascinated by how technology works, and I would like to solve real-world problems creatively using programming. Many courses are overly theoretical here, so I wish those would be replaced by practical courses. In Coimbatore, SNS is famous for conducting events and festivals. Students here conduct various technical and non-technical events, and students from other colleges can also participate. Since SNS College of Engineering, SNS College of Technology, and SNS College of Pharmacy are on the same campus, it seems crowded. But they manage the crowd by allotting different break times. Extracurricular activities like NSS and NCC are available.

college_info.college_name: SNS College of Technology Admission 2025: Fees, Courses, Eligibility and Selection

faqs.question: Is entrance exam required for admission at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Yes, candidates seeking admission in PG or PhD courses need to pass the accepted entrance exam. Admission to MBA/ MCA is based on TANCET scores. Aspirants need to have a valid CEETA PG score for admission to ME/ M.Tech programme. Besides, candidates seeking admission in PhD programme need to qualify a written test conducted by the Anna University.

faqs.question: Can I get admission in SNS College of Technology with 60% in Class 12?
faqs.answer: Candidates need to pass a minimum of Class 12 to apply for UG programme i.e. BE/ BTech at SNS College of Technology. The minimum aggregate to apply for BE/ BTech programmes is 45%. Hence, aspirants with 60% in Class 12 can get admission. There is a 5% relaxation in the aggregate for BC/ MBC/ SC/ ST candidates.

faqs.question: How can I get admission at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: SNS College of Technology offers admission under Government Quota and Management Quota. The college shortlists candidates for admission to BE/ BTech programme based on their merit in the last qualifying exam. Admission to MBA/ MCA is based on TANCET scores whereas, CEETA PG is required for ME/ M.Tech programmes. Once selected, candidates need to participate in the counselling and seat allotment. Selected aspirants have to pay the course fee to confirm their seat in the college.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: SNS College of Technology offers direct admission in BE/ BTech programme to candidates seeking admission under the Management quota. For admission to PG courses under Management Quota, aspirants need to pass entrance examination conducted by the Consortium of Self-Financing Professional, Arts and Science Colleges in Tamil Nadu, Chennai for Management Quota.

faqs.question: Can I get admission in BTech at SNS College of Technology without TNEA?
faqs.answer: No, candidates are selected for BE/ BTech programme based on their Class 12 scores and TNEA Counselling. SNS College of Technology offers seats to candidates based on their TNEA rank. Inr 2024, Aerospace Engineering was the specialisation with the highest TNEA rank of 29426.

faqs.question: What is the TNEA cutoff for BTech at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: SNS College of Technology offers seats to candidates based on Class 12 score and TNEA rank. Students get a TNEA rank based on their merit. Below is TNEA rank for BE/ BTech specialisations of last three years:

faqs.question: Which are the BTech specialisations offered at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: SNS College of Technology offers BE/ BTech programme for four-years. The course is available to candidates who have completed HSc or Class 12. Below are some of the BE/ BTech specialisations offered at the college:

faqs.question: Is MBA available at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Yes, SNS College of Technology offers two-year MBA programme spread across four semesters. Admission to MBA programme is based on TANCET score followed by university counselling. Candidates who have passed graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate can apply for the MBA course.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for MBA at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Aspirants who have completed graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate can apply for the MBA course. There is a relaxation of 5% in the aggregate for BC / BCM / MBC, SC (Arunthathiyar), SC & ST candidates belonging to Tamil Nadu. Candidates must hold the documents proving their eligibility for verification at the time of admission.

faqs.question: Which are the ME specialisations offered at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: SNS College of Technology offers two-year ME/ M.Tech programme. Candidates who have completed graduation are eligible to apply for the course. Below are some of the ME/ M.Tech specialisations offered at the college:

faqs.question: How can I apply for admission at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Candidates need to fill out the application form of accepted entrance exam for SNS College of Technology admission. Aspirants applying for BE/ BTech need to apply for TNEA. Below are the steps to apply at college for PhD, PG and Management Quota admission: Step 1: Visit the SNS College of Technology campus. Step 2: Go to the college office to get the application form. Step 3: Fill out the details and attach the required documents. Step 5: Pay the application fee. Step 6: Submit the form.

faqs.question: What is TANCET application fee? Do reserved categories have any fee concessions?
faqs.answer: TANCET application fee may or may not change across exam sessions. The application fee for TANCET was revised previously. Earlier, candidates had to pay INR 400 if they belonged to reserved categories and INR 800 if they belonged to unreserved categories. However, the fee for all categories was hiked. Unreserved categories had to pay INR 1000 and INR 500, respectively. Since the exam fees was revised in the recent session, Anna University is unlikely to change the same again. However, the application details along with the TANCET registration fee is to release soon.

faqs.question: What is the criteria for scholarships offered at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: SNS College of Technology provides scholarships based on merit to students. The scholarships are offered to students who got admission under Government or Management Quota. Below is the criteria for the scholarships offered at SNS College of Technology: GQ/ MQ Score 80% in SNS PET/ SNS SAT 8.0 CGPA for 4 years to be maintained MQ Enroll within 5 days from announcement of Class 12 result GQ/ MQ Enroll in Automobile, Civil, EEE and EIE 7.5 CGPA for 4 years to be maintained

faqs.question: Does SNS College of Technology offer scholarships?
faqs.answer: Yes, SNS College of Technology offers merit-based scholarships to students seeking admission under Government or Management Quota. Students need to fulfil the scholarship criteria for selection. Students can avail a maximum of two scholarships. A maximum of INR 10,000 is offered as scholarship amount per year.

faqs.question: Is entrance exam required for admission at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Yes, candidates seeking admission in PG or PhD courses need to pass the accepted entrance exam. Admission to MBA/ MCA is based on TANCET scores. Aspirants need to have a valid CEETA PG score for admission to ME/ M.Tech programme. Besides, candidates seeking admission in PhD programme need to qualify a written test conducted by the Anna University. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: Can I get admission in SNS College of Technology with 60% in Class 12?
faqs.answer: Candidates need to pass a minimum of Class 12 to apply for UG programme i.e. BE/ BTech at SNS College of Technology. The minimum aggregate to apply for BE/ BTech programmes is 45%. Hence, aspirants with 60% in Class 12 can get admission. There is a 5% relaxation in the aggregate for BC/ MBC/ SC/ ST candidates. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: How can I get admission at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: SNS College of Technology offers admission under Government Quota and Management Quota. The college shortlists candidates for admission to BE/ BTech programme based on their merit in the last qualifying exam. Admission to MBA/ MCA is based on TANCET scores whereas, CEETA PG is required for ME/ M.Tech programmes. Once selected, candidates need to participate in the counselling and seat allotment. Selected aspirants have to pay the course fee to confirm their seat in the college. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: SNS College of Technology offers direct admission in BE/ BTech programme to candidates seeking admission under the Management quota. For admission to PG courses under Management Quota, aspirants need to pass entrance examination conducted by the Consortium of Self-Financing Professional, Arts and Science Colleges in Tamil Nadu, Chennai for Management Quota. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: Can I get admission in BTech at SNS College of Technology without TNEA?
faqs.answer: No, candidates are selected for BE/ BTech programme based on their Class 12 scores and TNEA Counselling. SNS College of Technology offers seats to candidates based on their TNEA rank. Inr 2024, Aerospace Engineering was the specialisation with the highest TNEA rank of 29426. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: What is the TNEA cutoff for BTech at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: SNS College of Technology offers seats to candidates based on Class 12 score and TNEA rank. Students get a TNEA rank based on their merit. faqs.answer: SNS College of Technology offers BE/ BTech programme for four-years. The course is available to candidates who have completed HSc or Class 12. faqs.question: Is MBA available at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Yes, SNS College of Technology offers two-year MBA programme spread across four semesters. Admission to MBA programme is based on TANCET score followed by university counselling. Candidates who have passed graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate can apply for the MBA course. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for MBA at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Aspirants who have completed graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate can apply for the MBA course. There is a relaxation of 5% in the aggregate for BC / BCM / MBC, SC (Arunthathiyar), SC & ST candidates belonging to Tamil Nadu. Candidates must hold the documents proving their eligibility for verification at the time of admission. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: Which are the ME specialisations offered at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: SNS College of Technology offers two-year ME/ M.Tech programme. Candidates who have completed graduation are eligible to apply for the course. Below are some of the ME/ M.Tech specialisations offered at the college: ME Computer Science & Engineering ME Power System & Engineering ME Thermal Engineering ME Structural Engineering

faqs.question: How can I apply for admission at SNS College of Technology?
faqs.answer: Candidates need to fill out the application form of accepted entrance exam for SNS College of Technology admission. Aspirants applying for BE/ BTech need to apply for TNEA. Below are the steps to apply at college for PhD, PG and Management Quota admission: Step 1: Visit the SNS College of Technology campus. Step 2: Go to the college office to get the application form. Step 3: Fill out the details and attach the required documents. Step 5: Pay the application fee. Step 6: Submit the form. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: What is TANCET application fee? Do reserved categories have any fee concessions?
faqs.answer: TANCET application fee may or may not change across exam sessions. The application fee for TANCET was revised previously. Earlier, candidates had to pay INR 400 if they belonged to reserved categories and INR 800 if they belonged to unreserved categories. However, the fee for all categories was hiked. Unreserved categories had to pay INR 1000 and INR 500, respectively. Since the exam fees was revised in the recent session, Anna University is unlikely to change the same again. However, the application details along with the TANCET registration fee is to release soon. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

college_info.college_name: SECE - Sri Eshwar College of Engineering: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements

highlights.summary:
Sri Eshwar College of Engineering (SECE) was established in 2008 and is located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. It is an autonomous college and is affiliated to the Anna University, Chennai. The college strives to provide outcome and value-based engineering education. Further, the college has been awarded the Best Industry Linked Emerging Institute Award by AICTE-CII in 2014 and is accredited by the NBA and NAAC.
SECE courses are offered to students at UG and PG levels in the stream of Engineering. The college offers various programmes such as BTech and MTech to students in full-time mode across several specialisations such as Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, etc. These courses offered by the college are recognised by approving bodies like AICTE. In addition to this, the college has a dedicated placement cell and provides placement assistance to students. Sri Eshwar College of Engineering campus provides modern facilities to students including A/C Classrooms, an Auditorium, a Boys' Hostel, a Cafeteria, a Girl's Hostel, a Gym, etc. For more details, candidates can check out the table given below:
Sri Eshwar College of Engineering Highlights 2025

college_info_program.intro: The flagship programmes offered at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering are BTech and MTech. The college offers a wide range of programmes at UG and PG levels. These programmes are offered to students across several specialisations such as Computer Science Engineering, Information Technology, Mechanical Engineering, etc. Further, the college is affiliated with Anna University, Chennai, and offers programmes in full-time mode. These programmes strive to enhance the learning experience of students in order to prepare them for the industry. summary.college_name: SECE - Sri Eshwar College of Engineering

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: SECE is the best for good placements from the beginning and eco-friendly surroundings.

detailed_review.Placements: In our batch of 2023, around 300 students, almost 280 students got placed in well-known companies with good packages. During our placements, the highest package was 25 LPA, and the lowest package was 3.5 LPA. The topmost roles offered were Software Engineer, Software Developer, and Trainee positions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There were lots of facilities available in our department. Most preferably, I would say the library, which was useful for all final-year and project-delivering students. Almost all areas of the college and hostels had Wi-Fi. There were separate labs for ECE, EEE, CSE, IT, and Mech. Facilities in the college hostel were good, and the food quality was also good. There was a separate roof for medical facilities called the medical center. There were enough sports and games facilities for both day scholars and hostellers to play. More tournaments were held for sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were very helpful, and the quality of the teaching was also good. If they didn't know, they referred to library books or other staff members and cleared our doubts. The course was relevant to the curriculum, and the course would be useful to students during their placements. Semester exams were not difficult. They were easier compared to other departments, and the pass percentage was 60/100 marks.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I was very interested in electronic devices, so I was eager to learn more about them. That’s why I choose ECE. The best thing about the course was that they taught with real-time and live examples. I would say there was nothing to improve in my course. Events and fests were held monthly once, and hackathons were also conducted. Scholarships were available for students who scored top marks in higher secondary, and a first-graduate scholarship was also available.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placement with 100%, best infrastructure, qualified faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides placement training for each student and is divided into different batches to get trained from the 2nd year onwards. The average package is above 5 LPA. The highest package is above 40 LPA. Recently, 10 students got placed. There are many companies that come to our college and conduct internship drives.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure in our college are really good and developed, Classrooms are well-modified within today's version with smartboards. 24/7 availability of Wi-Fi in both hostel as well as college is there. The hostel in the college will be much more comfortable like a 5-star hotel with a separate cot with a free pillow and bedsheet. The food in the hostel has very good quality. It is healthy.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers is our college are highly qualified with Ph.D. and make us understand every topic to learn. Students get trained to get placed in high companies. Semester exams are a bit difficult but we get trained to solve it. A student should score a 7.5 CGPA.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course which is CSE because it has more scope for the future.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: A growth full college life in my 20's.

detailed_review.Placements: As a graduate of Sri Eshwar College of Engineering in Computer and Communication Engineering, the highest package is 40 LPA. The average package ranges from 6 LPA - 10 LPA. Companies like Microsoft, Dell, Cadence, Thoughtworks, Lendingkart, etc., came for on-campus drives.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is very good and green. We have more than 20 labs for every domain in our college. Hostel is good and maintained in a neat way which is cleaned daily. Hostel food is okay. We too have mario and canteen inside our college where we can have snacks whenever needed.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members in our department will be friendly and they keep supporting us in making us do projects. They help us win in many outside college or MNC hackathons and events. Course in our curriculum are updated to Industry 4.0 and emerging technology will start teaching from the first year onwards.
detailed_review.Other: Our college organizes various fests like Thiran and Dhrona where all the college students can be part of it. Various events take place at that time. It will be like a week of festival.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (AI and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: The over-hyped college in Coimbatore SECE.

detailed_review.Placements: Our course is new. Still, there are no final years. Some students got placed with the maximum salary package of 7 LPA. The minimum salary package offered is 5 LPA. They are in their internship period. The top role offered is an autodesk. The salary package offered is 20 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The overall building is a little decent, but there is a signal to make calls. Wi-Fi is not strong enough when there are more than 40 devices connected to the Wi-Fi. This is not a good count when there is only 1 repeater per class. Each class has over 60 students. Some of us have to rely on our personal hotspot, which is also bad due to the poor signal.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty members are not bad in terms of behaviour or anything related. It is just they don't know much about the subject. But still, there are some faculty members who are experts in their subjects. As per the curriculum, it is okay but they change the syllabus after entering the semester sometimes.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Business Systems
reviews.review_title: Life at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are really better here. The maximum package here is 50 lpa, and the minimum package is 4 lpa. The average package here is 6 LPA to 10 LPA. Many well-known companies come for placements. More than 90 percent of students will get placed every year. Internship is also provided from the 2nd year. It depends on the impact of your projects and communication.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Really good infrastructure. Other than classrooms, more labs and IT centers are present here. A library is also here with every book. Unlimited free Wi-Fi is available, as every class has smart boards. The hostel was very good here. It is more comfortable and safe. Food provided here is also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members here are more knowledgeable, and their way of communication and teaching was more understandable. They support and help us in many ways to improve our skills. The exams and curriculum here are about like every college under Anna University.
detailed_review.Other: CSBS is about learning both computer science technical knowledge as well as the business management knowledge.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (AI and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: Honest review about life at Sri Eshwar.

detailed_review.Placements:
Student can opt for placement, higher studies or entrepreneurship. Those who opted for placement were 100% placed last year (2023). 
The highest package of all time is 45 LPA. The average package bagged by students here is 6 LPA. Almost 80% of students get into paid or unpaid internships from all tier of companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms have Wi-Fi, have charging ports for every bench, and have smartboards for interactive classes. A medical center is available. Hostel mess provides average food and there are few canteens inside campus with good food. Hostel rooms have all needed furniture, like a bed, study table, cupboards and Wi-Fi is available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the staff have adequate skills and are friendly and approachable at all times. Few staff lack few skills and seem to be less knowledgeable. English communication is not up to the mark among the faculty. The curriculum is industry-ready and is updated regularly and discussed with experts and alumni. Semester exams are quite difficult; correction is a little lenient. Scoring in exams needs a little hard work.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good, Bad, Ugly - A Review on SECE

detailed_review.Placements: 30 percent students in our batch secured placements with packages above 350000. The highest package for our course reached 100000 while the lowest was 350,000. Top recruiting companies include Caterpillar, Danfoss, Techinow, and Mr. Cooper. The internships offered by these companies are highly regarded and well-paying.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is very good overall. However, the Wi-Fi in the labs is often slow, and the classrooms are somewhat outdated. The library is well-equipped, and there are many sports facilities; our college has won numerous trophies. The canteen food is also quite good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching quality is commendable, with most faculty members holding Ph.D. degrees and all possessing master's degrees. The teaching methods are effective, although some faculty members with Ph.D.s lack practical knowledge. Semester exam question papers come from Anna University, which can be somewhat challenging, but most students manage to pass.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I've always had an interest in mechanical engineering, inspired by movies. While mechanical engineering is a challenging field, understanding it makes the learning process rewarding and engaging. The college organizes various functions that are enjoyable, and first-generation graduates receive a discount, although no other scholarships are available.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college with scholarship for merits.

detailed_review.Placements: our college is good at placements and most the students(95%) who opt for placements will place within finishing their college.The highest package was 40 lpa ,lowest 2.5 lpa and on average 8 lpa is provided for the students.Main roles includes in IT such as Full stack,ML engineer
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are many labs in college , but the network in college is very bad you won't get good network since the college is in village.The food available in college is good and affordable.The hostel food is also good .The are few facilities for sports but not much encouraged.There is a medical center inside the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teacher  are  friendly and some are well qualified and knowledgeable but not all. The course  syllabus is good which is good for industry requirement . The exams are not  much difficult it is easy to clear the exams.The pass percentage is based on the subject

reviews.course: B.E. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Sri Eshwar College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: In my opinion, the average placement performance at our college is lacking compared to some other colleges. Companies offering salary packages ranging from 3.1 LPA to 5.5 LPA come to hire students, and they conduct various rounds for screening the right candidates for the right positions.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It's a better, stress-free campus. We are strictly asked to follow the principles insisted upon by the college to maintain a healthy environment. Our canteen serves all kinds of snacks, breakfast, lunch, and specific recipes followed every single day.
detailed_review.Faculty: Sometimes, I feel really disappointed with the lectures from the faculty members. Only a few of the teachers provide understandable classes. Before exams, I find myself confused about all the concepts and lose concentration in my studies due to a lack of clarity in the subject matter.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Sri Eshwar College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements:
Percentage of placement: 80%
The lowest package is 4 LPA.
The highest package is 44 LPA.
Top companies like HCL, TATA, Hyundai, Mahindra, BMW, etc. recruit students. Good college with good lab facilities. Students need to put in effort.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good infrastructure with new buildings. Classrooms are spacious and well ventilated. Equipped with a projector and white box. Good Wi-Fi connection, but slow internet through Sim. The climate will be pleasant, and hot water will be available for bathing. Labs are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: 100 percent of teachers are Ph.D. holders with knowledge in their field of focus and are very friendly and helpful for research works and projects. The exams are moderately difficult and are both balanced for theoretical and practical knowledge.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: My engineering college review.

detailed_review.Placements:
Placements are good in our college. About 90 percent of students are placed with a good package.
The average package is 4 lacs. The maximum package is 44 lacs. Placement training is given in the 2nd year, according to the domain and is very intensive.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure is very moderate. The labs are up to date and the classrooms have Wi-Fi connections and a smart board. Libraries have a wide range of technical books. There is a medical centre that has many facilities. There is a cafe, Mario, and plenty of food.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are highly talented and they help us when necessary. Students can clear their doubts without hesitation. The course curriculum is well planned; they start the placement training in the second year. Semester exams can be a bit of a tough nut to crack.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Business Systems
reviews.review_title: Exceptional Satisfaction: Achieving Success with Top Faculty & high placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Over 85% of the fourth-year students in my department have already secured placements, showcasing the college's dedication to ensuring successful career outcomes for its students. Salary statistics: The placements in my course have seen remarkable salary packages, with the highest offer reaching 24 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is awesome. Wi-Fi is enabled for the whole campus. The infrastructure of the hostel is also well and good. The food provided in the hostel mess is like home food. So no more worries about hostel food. The canteen food is also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty members of our college have completed Ph.D. Our department's industry-ready curriculum ensures students' skills and knowledge meet industry standards, fostering success in their careers. They are giving their best to make the students succeed.
detailed_review.Other: My department, CSBS, has an industry-ready syllabus so that we can learn computer science and, on the other hand, business modules. So we can work in both fields in times of layoffs also.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Best college for students.

detailed_review.Placements: 90 percent of students were placed in the current final year. The highest package was 40 LPA. Top companies are Microsoft, Autodesk, and Commscope. And many companies visit this college for further placements of students. Many students were offered internships in big companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All over college surrounding has Wi-Fi facility. Hostel facility is available for both girls and boys. But some days the hostel food was insufficient for students. Eshwar college has very interesting labs and maker spaces to allow students to perform projects and improve their skills.
detailed_review.Faculty: Eshwar College faculty are very humble and friendly, so students can feel inspired to get the input. Exams are easier than those at Anna University. The curriculum was designed to be useful for student placements because it includes what is needed in companies.
detailed_review.Other: Every year, the college conducts an annual day and throne event. Additionally, many food fests and hackathons have been organized in the past year. The ECE course was very useful for me in terms of placements.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied because of placement in 2024.

detailed_review.Placements: As we all know, a recession is taking place in the IT industry. Still, our college tries its best and placed among 400 students out of 550. Comparing to other nearby colleges, SECE is doing well; it plays a major role in students' future. In my course, our HoD plays an important role as he invites many core companies for us.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has well-equipped classrooms with smart boards and visual projectors, specialized labs for practical sessions, access to a library with relevant books, journals, and online resources. It also has common areas for socializing and studying in the hostel, on-site cafeteria, and access to medical facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable in their respective fields, and we have the most expert staff in our college. The course curriculum is related to industry needs, and the semester exams are very easy to clear for students who understand the subject. The pass percentage is above 75 percent per class.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to learn about embedded IoT and VLSI designing.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Exceptional Faculty, Industry-Relevant, Supportive : Sri Eshwar College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 95% of the students enrolled in my course were successfully placed. At our College, the salary packages typically range from 4.5 Lacs to 15 Lacs. With renowned companies like Google and Microsoft as top recruiters, and an impressive 80% success rate in securing internships, my College undoubtedly provides exceptional opportunities. Hence, I confidently assert that it is an extraordinary institution.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I wouldn't say that the infrastructure is too good, but it's not like it's bad also. It is optimal. But the only problem that our College has is, the signal issues. But it won't be a problem, as our College offers unlimited free high-speed Wi-fi to all the students. The food and hostel accommodation are too good to be true to be honest. When comparing to all other colleges, our college provides wonderful hostel accommodation at a reasonable price. We also have a exclusive medical center for students, but the only problem is, it's not 24/7. And Lastly our college is also has good sports and library facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The instructors are not just highly skilled but also very friendly. The educational program is distinctive, and it aids the students in their future pursuits. Admittedly, the semester exams are challenging. However, despite this, our college boasts a commendable pass rate.
detailed_review.Other: Upon finishing my 12th standard, I, like any other student, found myself uncertain about my next steps. However, I was fortunate enough to secure a place in this college through Government Counseling. Undoubtedly, it has been the most remarkable event in my life. In my opinion, this college is the epitome of excellence for every middle-class student aspiring to succeed in life.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Sri Eshwar College of Engineering is the best college.

detailed_review.Placements: This college is one of the best engineering colleges in Coimbatore. Every year, more reputed companies offer jobs to the students of this college. The highest salary package is 12 LPA, and the lowest is 1.8 LPA. Therefore, the placements in this college are good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Sri Eshwar College of Engineering's infrastructure is very beautiful. The entire campus has free Wi-Fi, and CCTV camera facilities are available. Multiple laboratories and a common library for all departments are also accessible. The college hostels are maintained clean every day, and the mess provides good food.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college faculty members are friendly to all students. They teach multiple lessons every day, clarify students' doubts at any time, and organize model exams and workshops events every month. The college has well-designed faculty members, and over 90% of students passed in 2021.
detailed_review.Other: I selected the mechanical engineering course in this college. There are multiple mechanical laboratories available, and the college is situated in a good environmental location. Medical facilities are also available.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The placements have raised high to packages upto INR 60 lpa.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are doing so well, and the students are getting placed in well-developed companies with a package of more than INR 20 lakhs. The stipend they are getting is INR 90k for internships and the placement cell makes sure that all the students get placed without failing.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel atmosphere is so good and the hygiene is good. It feels like home and the infrastructure of this course is software and hardware. You will learn both the core and software sides, and you can finally choose where you would like to work, whether core or IT.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty of the course are so good and experienced and the course is so detailed for us. The faculty are so kind; they see us just like their own sons and daughters and they sell only when needed. Exams are scheduled periodically and the paper standard is high.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Not the best college but this college was the best in placement and other activities.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, 100% placement is guaranteed. And after joining the college, I asked some of the seniors about placement. After that, they said that the placement was very good. And they said that CGPA was very important for placement. And now I am working for a good company. In our college, they place a lot of students in companies. Thank you.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Before joining these colleges, I visited many other colleges and all of them. I love this college infrastructure and our college lab facility was very good. So that we didn't struggle to use the lab. And I am also a hostel student and in hostels, the infrastructure and facilities for hostel students are very good. And our study hall was very attractive and motivating.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty were very friendly; they taught in a very understandable manner and they also motivated us to participate in many of the hackathons and other projects. I am studying the UG (Computer Communication Engineering) course. In this course, the subjects were very interesting and easy to learn. Our semester exams are very easy for me because I listen to the class very interactively, and their teaching style is quite funny and interesting.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: A reality of SECE college life.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement is said to be good. Top companies visit the college for freshers roles. It depends on the skill level of individual students. The highest package I heard was about INR 30 LPA, but currently around 6 students are placed for INR 26 LPA. The opportunities are very good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is very modern, with relatively newer buildings. The laboratories are decent. The only thing lacking is the hostel food, which is below par compared to other colleges. The hostel is as big as the entire college infrastructure.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is very good here. The teachers make us understand the concepts. The subjects are also relatively close to our placement. The semester exams are expected to be difficult for all. Getting through is not that difficult. The pass percentage is on par with other colleges.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Business Systems
reviews.review_title: There are good faculty members but the teaching is so good.

detailed_review.Placements: The overall placements of our college are up to the mark. Even some of our seniors have been placed in good companies. Overall the placements are good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our course, Computer Science and business systems have a separate block and has a lab called business analytics laboratory. The hostel infrastructure is so nice. The hostel life is a great life in college days. In our college, the hostel life is so good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members and the professors are so nice and give a clear cut explanations about the courses which we study in our college life. There are exams for the preferred courses which we want to learn. Even the faculty members help in completing the courses.

faqs.question: Can I join Sri Eshwar College of Engineering directly?
faqs.answer: No, candidates cannot join Sri Eshwar College of Engineering directly for BTech or M.Tech course admission. The selection criteria for B.Tech course is Merit + TNEA counselling and GATE, CEETA for Mtech course. The eligibility criteria for the course are Class 12 and graduation.

faqs.question: How can I get admission for various courses at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: Sri Eshwar College of Engineering's admission process includes registration and merit-list preparation of the entrance exam as per respective courses. Candidates must follow the below steps to get a seat in the Sri Eshwar College of Engineering: STEP 1: Sri Eshwar College of Engineering Application Process 2025 Candidates looking for course admission at SECE must apply offline. To downlaod the application form students must visit the official website. STEP 2: Selection Rounds The selection criteria at Sri Eshwar College of Engineering are based on entrance exam scores. However, candidates have to complete the last educational qualification as per the respective courses set by the college. Students are selected based on the entrance exam of Merit + TNEA counselling for BTech and GATE, CEETA for M.Tech courses. STEP 3: Merit List and Admission Confirmation Once selection rounds are over, the institute releases a merit list. To allot and confirm the seat candidates are required to pay the application fee at the admission receipt centre.

Candidates must pass graduation with a 50% aggregate to apply for the ME course.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility to get admission in SECE - Sri Eshwar College of Engineering for UG/PG courses?
faqs.answer: SECE - Sri Eshwar College of Engineering has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility B.E. / B.Tech General Category Candidates must have passed 3 years Diploma with with a minimum of 55% marks in the final year examination or must pass in any recognized bachelor's degree in Science of minimum 3 years duration with Mathematics as a subject. Candidates from Backward class community of Tamil Nadu need to secure an aggregate of 50% marks in the final year diploma examination / Final year B.Sc.degree course. Candidates from Most Backward class community of Tamil Nadu need to secure an aggregate of 45% marks in the final year diploma examination / final year B.Sc.degree course. Candidates from SC/ST community of Tamil Nadu need to just pass in Diploma Course / B.Sc. Degree course. M.E./M.Tech Candidate who have completed 10+2+AMIE or 10+3 years diploma + AMIE are also eligible. AMIE candidate must have 2 years regular full time experience in the relevant field. facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: SECE library is established in an area of 500 sq.mts with 150 seating capacity. The Central Library is replete with 20,545 volumes of 8,491 title of books, 1,970 cd's and 383 back volume. OPAC software search facility to find out the availability of books in library is made available by Central library. SECE Library is a member of DELNET and subscribes to 145 AICTE Consortia journals with NPTEL video lectures available in NPTEL Server of library.

highlights.summary: Established in 1999, Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College - SMVEC is also known as SMVEC is located in Pondicherry. The institute offers courses like B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM, B.Sc. and MCA. These courses are offered in Full Time mode. A total of 39 courses offered by the Institute are available across streams such as Engineering, Medicine & Health Sciences, Business & Management Studies, IT & Software, Architecture & Planning and Law. The institute has all the necessary facilities to the students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Experience in my college.

detailed_review.Placements: There are a total of 89% of students who got placed from my course. The highest package in my course is 4 LPA, and the highest package is 19 LPA. The top recruitment companies in my course are Google, Amazon, Microsoft, etc. A total of 80 percent of students got internships from my course at Microsoft. The top roles offered in my course are HR and manager.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure available in my course are Wi-Fi, with full speed and 24/7 availability. Labs are very big, and all resources are available. Classrooms are big and well-cleaned with digital boards. A well-stocked library is present with all resources available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are helpful, qualified, and well-knowledgeable. The teaching quality of teachers is very good. The course curriculum is relevant, and this makes students industry-ready. The semester exam is not too tough but moderate. The passing percentage is 88 percent.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I have a great interest in the IT field, and the best thing about my course is the highest placement. I think the syllabus difficulty should be decreased. Events and fests happen yearly. Campus crowd and connectivity are also good. Scholarship is available. Extracurricular activities happen.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: To shine in your career, choose the best here, the best Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: At Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College, more than 85% of students got placed in top companies. The starting salary is about 3.5 LPA, especially in our department. Companies like TCS, Kaar, Zoho, Wipro, Cognizant, etc., are ready to hire students. About 78% of students got internships, and some with a stipend.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: About 150 acres of college with environmental amenities, and AICTE approved idea lab and library facilities. Hostel facility has been split into two, one is with AC and another without AC. Canteen food is also available in our college with good quality.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. Teaching quality is very nice. Course is relevant to the stream we chose, and it makes students industry-ready. It is not difficult to pass the examination, and semester duration is six months.
detailed_review.Other: It is the best college for your right career. Some extracurricular activities, cultural events, technical and non-technical events, etc., are conducted.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements at SMVEC are exceptional with over 95 percent of students placed annually. Top recruiters include Tech Core and Zenosys. The dedicated Career Services Cell conducts regular training sessions and mock interviews which are top notch and very nice.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure at Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College is modern and functional. The campus boasts smart classrooms, advanced laboratories, a digital library, an innovation hub and Wi-Fi-enabled classrooms. The eco-friendly architecture includes solar-powered buildings and green spaces.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are designed in such a way that both theoretical knowledge and practical application. The academic calendar includes continuous assessments, term exams and end-semester exams. The college conducts exams regularly.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is worth for money because the college is so good in everything but the sports are only less.

detailed_review.Placements: If we have a good CGPA, we will get good placements, but it doesn't mean that those with lower CGPAs won't have chances. There are many companies like TCS, Woho, and Vibrio are coming to our college. They provide placement training for all students, so placements are good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is so excellent. They have good infrastructure and they are building the new hostel. Classrooms and labs are in a good manner. The ideal lab of the college has a very good atmosphere. There we can get so many ideas.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty members are very friendly and willing to help us study, especially if we have any arrears. We can approach the old faculty members, and they will clarify our doubts. They will give simple notes by which we can understand the concepts.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Dissatisfied because of faculty, average placements and no enjoyment.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of students were placed in this course in our college. The highest package is 18 LPA, and the average package is 3.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are TCS, Hexaware, Zoho, CTS, etc. The roles offered include Machine Learning Engineer, AI Engineer, Data Analyst, and Software Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructures are good for labs and the library, but in the classroom, it's average. They can't provide Wi-Fi for class; we have to use our personal devices. Hostels are not too good; they are moderate. Canteen food is also average, but prices are high compared to quantity and quality.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are also said to be normal for this course; we have to learn by ourselves. Yes, the course curriculum is relevant and makes the students industry-ready. Semester exams are good to score a grade, and the pass percentage is 30% in theory. Then, add the internal mark; totally, we have to score above or equal to 50.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course for data analyst. They did not conduct any event or any cultural.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Insights on Course Structure and Faculty in Computer Science.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly most of the students were placed in my batch, and it's still going on. Up to date, the highest salary was offered by Content Sack, a figure of 13 LPA. There are further more companies offering a minimum of 4 LPA. The company named Zoho took an intern from our batch, and other companies like Hexaware and Multicore also provided internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Coming to infrastructure, I would say that it's below average. They provide Wi-Fi within the circumstances, and it's not good either. The classrooms are good. Coming to labs, it's very well-equipped with updated systems, and the library is provided with more than 10,000 books of different genres.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty was quite short. It led to difficulties in the semester and providing quality education. Not all of them are good. There are some staff who take good care of your time. The curriculum is very strict to the course perspective, and they take advantage of every program conducted through the respective departments.
detailed_review.Other: I've chosen Computer Science and Engineering because it's a course everyone prefers these days, and I thought it has a good future. I wish they will focus on one perspective so we can lead in that domain. If we're talking about fests and extracurricular activities, they rarely happen.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: I almost like all faculty member.

detailed_review.Placements: From 7th semester the students become eligible for campus placements. There are many companies included all over the department like Virtusa, Wipro, TCS and much more. The Highest package of 2024 is 49 LPA and the average package is 4 L per annum. There are 75% of students get placed every year in my university. My plan after getting degree is higher studies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have more holidays as festivals but we have only festival in college means. It is cultural basically cultural is very nice in my college. The range is nearly 1 km from the entrance and accessibility of books is nearly 1 month. The faculties and technological provisions are very good. Mostly our College support extracurricular activities more. In our college no clubs and no social groups are formed.
detailed_review.Faculty: In my department the faculties are friendly and expert in teaching and guiding for carrier they do some carrier advise instead of regular classes. One of my favorite faculties are Dr.Amudhavalli mam and Dr.Delhi raj sir they gave me expertized teaching for carrier and what to do after the studies and friendly communication between them so I like them very much. There are up to 4 exams per semester and there is 8 semester. The exams are little bit easy when you learn and the failing ratio is too low in my department.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: we go under the technology and learn.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement period starts in the month November every year and lasts upto February, The circuital branch students gets a lot of chance in the placements compared to the students from the remaining branches. The average package is around some 24 lakhs per annum. Google - 1.2 lakhs stipend BNY melon - 75,000 Arceus ium - 1.18 l Move in Sync- 60000 Pattern - 50,000 Tata Steel - 40,000 and also we are provided with many research interns in the reputed institutes if country.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have more holidays as festivals but we have only festival in college means it is cultural basically. Cultural is very nice in my college. The range is nearly 1 km from the entrance and accessibility of books is nearly 1 month the faculties. Technological provisions are very good. Mostly our college support extracurricular activities more. In our college no clubs and no social groups are formed.
detailed_review.Faculty: Ration is 1 faculty to 9 student per batch. Faculties are very good and friendly. I'm from electrical department so my favorite is Mridusmita ma'am and Priyakshini ma'am. Although there are some strict teachers like maths sir named Pranab sir. But not hate anyone. There are 3 class test and one end semester exam for each subject. And lab exam too.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Our college provides good facilities and placements.

detailed_review.Placements: The lowest salary package offered is 3 LPA and the average salary package offered is 10 LPA. The highest salary package offered is 23 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Amazon, IBM, and Google. Almost 75% of students got placed in this course. Around 35% of students got internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has good infrastructure with good lab facilities. There are high-quality computer labs and clean classrooms. A library is available for the students in the AI & DS block. We also have a canteen with some snacks. There are sports like basketball, cricket, and badminton. Students can join NCC for a good career.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful to students. They are well-qualified and well-educated. They provide good knowledge. They teach in a good manner. The course provides good knowledge and the curriculum is relevant. The semester exams are difficult in this college. The pass percentage is 72%.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: Faculty are too good. They will give you better understanding of the concepts.

detailed_review.Placements: In the last semester, you are eligible for placements. 150+ companies come. The average package is 7LPA. The companies from Microsoft to Accenture and TCS are all service-based companies that come here. The highest package is 25LPA. One of my friends got his offer of 25LPA from JP Morgan. The percentage of students who are placed is 30% to 40%. In their ADs, they say 100% placement, all of this is fake.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel according to me deserves a one-star. The rooms are small enough to accommodate only one person, however, two need to stay in one room. There is no AC availability here. If you need AC you have to pay 75,000 extra per year for it which is completely absurd. Hostel mess food is also not that great. There has been insects everywhere in the food time and again and we have complained about it multiple times, but no action has been taken. So in my opinion, paying 200000 for this hostel is not at all worth it. Better get an apartments outside the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course subjects are irrelevant. Instead of mastering one teach, they just teach every teach like web development, android development, flutter, and machines learning. But in campus placement, you just need to master one teach because all companies hire for one teach. That's why the curriculum is not very good. There teaching methods are also not good. They just come and read the PPT in front of you and leave.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Don't waste your life by joining this college.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, 60% of students in our class got placed in jobs, including famous companies like Google, Zogo, TCS, etc. Not everyone gets placed because some are interested in areas other than placements. Some are rejected due to skill issues; if you have a CGPA of 9 and above, you will definitely get a placement. They even teach you and help you prepare. Many from our college have become data specialists, entrepreneurs, and managers in companies like Google, Zogo, TCS, Infosys, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of my college is excellent, but sometimes there are many damages in the roads and classrooms, which get worse when it rains. We have libraries, but they don't have a period for reading. If you are interested, you can go to the admin office, get a library pass, and use the library. Other than that, the canteen service is not as good as you might think; it feels like a scam, so choose wisely.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some of the teachers are really talented, while some are just not helpful and tell us to study on our own. However, many teachers in our class teach us excellently, and if you have doubts during lectures, they clear them instantly.
detailed_review.Other: I am a student of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, and I chose this course because this is the only college near my city that offered it. However, it didn't go as well as I expected due to college timings and other concerns. The college has zero extracurricular activities, so if you want to excel in sports, please choose other colleges.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Nice college which is student friendly.

detailed_review.Placements: The average percentage of students who were placed in our course is 75%. The highest salary package is 8 Lacs per annum, and the lowest package salary package is 3 Lacs per annum. The top recruiting companies are Tata Motors and Rolls Royce. Approximately 60% of students secured internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There were many such facilities in the college, such as Wi-Fi access that was available. We had classrooms in all the classes, and the labs were well managed and organized with good quality chairs. There were all kinds of ways we could get hands-on experience. I don't live in a hostel because I live in my house.
detailed_review.Faculty: To be honest, from the mech faculty, the teachers were not so good and guided the students well, especially the HOD of the mech department, who was not at all helpful with our project submission. Also, the exams were easy, and reviewing the syllabus was good for us to be industry-ready, but it did build foundation courses for us.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Strict college but strictness and discipline makes you stronger.

detailed_review.Placements: To be frank, college placement is average; students getting hired by big firms are less. India Smart and Amazon are the top recruiters. If we take the average, nearly 70 to 80% of students from every batch get placed. About the salary package, the highest CTC is 11.8 LPA, the average CTC is 5 LPA, and the lowest is 3 LPA. Getting an internship is an easy thing but quality is important. Getting a good internship is tough. Some companies conduct interviews, and after all, no follow-up is sent to candidates.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is inspired by Western architecture and Portuguese architecture. The college environment is very strict; boys and girls can not talk on campus. The college library is good; it is open until 9 p.m. and six days a week. There is no proper drinking water facility on campus; drinking water comes in cans. The hostel fee is 60,000 plus a 5,000 deposit. Mess food is there but frankly, mess food is not good and not hygienic. There is no big canteen on campus, so we can not eat when we are hungry.
detailed_review.Faculty: 50% of teachers are too bad and strict. Our director of management treats us pathetically. If they find a small mistake and find out the language not respectful, not only us but also our parents will get a big lecture. But at the same time, they are very good at teaching. Our MBA course duration is 2 years and 4 semesters. 1 semester has 4-6 subjects and every subject has 5–6 chapters so the curriculum is very big. Semester exams are not very difficult; almost 90% of students pass.
detailed_review.Other: The one thing I mostly like about college is that they give scholarships to students who are very poor and single parent's children.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: The review about my college.

detailed_review.Placements: The number of students placed in my course is a minimum of 15. The top recruiting companies are TCS, Wipro and some other companies. They are mostly seeking freshers, and at the college, they will provide training for placements and jobs. The highest package they offer is 8 LPA, and the lowest package is 3 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My college has good infrastructure and a peaceful environment. They have separate buildings for each stream, like engineering, arts and sciences, law and so on. The labs are good but the equipment is a little bit old and the classrooms are simple and don't have projectors in them. In a library, you can't access all the books in it and its tough to take books in a library. About hostels, they have separate hostels for boys and girls but girls hostels are at medical colleges, and they have two buildings for boys. Hostel food was pretty bad so it was better to eat outside.
detailed_review.Faculty: About teacher experience, they are well experienced and have had experience for about 5 years. About their teaching method, it differs for each teacher and they teach well. You don't have to worry about the curriculum because they update the syllabus from year to year for industrial needs. The semester exams are pretty difficult and easy on your own. The pass percentage is an average 80%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because for the industrial boom because most of the companies are it so I chose it. They want to lower their feel structure because it is too high for the students. The main point is that they won't allow mobile devices the campus and the connectivity is so poor that events and festivals happen occasionally. About the extracurricular activities they have (NSS and NCC) and sports like tennis, volleyball, kabbadi, khokho, etc.

reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA)
reviews.review_title: I got new friends and good staffs in this college.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement Experience: Starting in the 5th semester, students are eligible for placements. The most famous companies are Microsoft, which offers 52 LPA, Cisco, which offers 25 LPA, and KLA, which offers 36 LPA. The highest package is 52 LPA and the average package is approximately 15 LPA. More than 80 percent of students are placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel Facilities: The hostel facilities are in good condition and the improvements to the hostel are not a must. The rooms are in good condition, the hostel food is very good and the registration process for the hostel and affordability are given in the admission block.
detailed_review.Faculty: Course Curriculum Overview: Initially, I was trying the Indian defense but then I chose NIMCET, through which I can pursue an MCA in NIT. Obviously, it is very helpful for me because here I am having the same opportunities as a B.Tech. student who has cleared JEE at the college. The academics are totally placement-oriented, which helps a lot in developing skills and the exam are also not that tough so we have enough time to develop any skill.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: A higher number of students with good placement records.

detailed_review.Placements: This college arranges both online and offline placements for students. Mostly, they arrange on-campus placements for their students. Nearly 50+ companies approached our college as of 2024 placements. Up to 70% of students were placed in those placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It was really superb infrastructure, with all the facilities. This college is only for engineering students. The laboratories present in our college are maintained properly with air-conditioned rooms. There is a digitalized library with all the facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: All the teachers present here were highly helpful, motivating, supportive, and knowledgeable. It is a little bit difficult to crack semester examinations, so we need to study harder to clear the examinations. The faculty members present here always focus on practical classes.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Good experience here with nice teachers.

detailed_review.Placements: From the 4th semester on, you should be eligible for your placement. Work hard and attend the campus selection interviews. So many students are getting placed through campus placement; almost 80 percent of students are being placed every year. Right after the degree, I'm planning to start my own enterprise.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostels are just awesome. The hostel are inside the college campus. So you do not have to feel tension about going to classes. Mess food are also good and delicious. It is hygienic and good for our health. Both non-veg and veg are available. In all rooms, there is one bed, one cupboard, one table, one chair, etc. A Wi-Fi facility is also provided to students. The registration process is very easy and it's done at admission time.
detailed_review.Faculty:
The course curriculum and faculty are good and the teaching is easy to understand. I took this course because of my interest in business. The faculty-to-student ratio is very excellent. The faculty members are highly qualified and use teaching methods that are easy to understand. Exams are held once in a month like semester-wise and it are easy to pass. Class Size:-56
Course Fee: INR 50000 per year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Really good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Nearly 70 of the students were placed in campus jobs; Wipro, Amazon, TCS, Infosys, and Tata mainly offer jobs in the college. The highest package offered in our course is 8 LPA per annum, and the lowest package offered in our college is 3 LPA per annum.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: According to the infrastructure, all facilities are available for our course, and well, equipment is provided. The quality of the facilities in our hostels is good, and the food quality is good in the college. Here, Wi-Fi and classrooms are all provided by the college for all the students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful; they are friendly with the students, and also here, teachers are very helpful for the students; they clear all the doubts regarding the subjects, and the curriculum is regularly updated in the college, making the students industry-ready.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Review of Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College - SMVEC.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college has very good placement records. In our college, 60-70% students get successfully placed. The highest placement package offered was 17 LPA. The lowest package offered was 2 LPA. Average offered package was between 2-5 LPA. Top recruiting companies in our course were Icon, Elite Elevators, HCL, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College has good infrastructure, and it was well-maintained and developed. College has high-speed Wi-Fi, labs, library, spacious classrooms, etc. The quality of facilities offered in our college was good enough. College has not provided any hostel facility. Sports and medical facilities are available in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty of our college were helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. All the professors in our college were giving their best for the students. Course curriculum followed in our course was relevant. It makes the students job ready. Semester exams in our college were relevant.

reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
reviews.review_title: Placements of this college are awesome.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement of this college is best and around 70-80% of the students get placed every year. The average package offered is around 2-4 Lacs per annum and the highest package offered is around 8-16 Lacs per annum. Top companies like Oracle, Microsoft, Amazon, Flipkart, etc. visit the campus to recruit the student.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the college and hostel is awesome. Hostel are good and convenient for students. College and hostel provide Wi-Fi facility. It also has a department of labs, library and classrooms are equipped with modern board. The taste of the food we get in the mess is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well qualified and they are willing to clear doubts. Semester exams in college are medium and 40% is the passing marks. Well experienced and knowledgeable teachers are here. All the teachers hold a doctorate degree in the their particular subjects.

college_info.college_name: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements

highlights.summary: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering (also known as Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram) was established in 1985 in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram is approved by AICTE and offers a total of 32 courses at UG and PG levels in 15 specialisations such as Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Construction Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Information Technology and Mechanical Engineering. Furthermore, it offer courses such as B.E. / B.Tech and M.E./M.Tech in Full Time mode. Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram fee structure includes a total tuition fee ranging from INR 50,000 and 4,35,000. Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram has an annual seat intake of 1338 for all the programmes. It offers courses in stream such as Engineering. The institute has a safe and well-equipped campus with all the advanced facilities.

college_info_program.intro: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering popular programmes are BTech and MTech. The available courses equips students with all the necessary skills and knowledge to prosper in their career in Chemical Engineering and various related domains. SVCE empowers various students with leadership qualities so that the students can succeed in diversified fields. BTech and MTech students are placed in top companies at top positions such as Engineers, Web Developers, and others. Below mentioned are some of the SVCE courses and their respective eligibility and SVCE fee:
