reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has good infrastructure, helpful faculty, and placement training.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 80% of students from our batch got successfully placed. The highest package offered is 18 LPA, while the lowest is 3 LPA, with an average package of approximately 6 LPA. Top recruiting companies include TCS, Infosys, Wipro, and Capgemini. Nearly 60% of students get internships at companies like Deloitte, Cognizant, and local startups, which often convert to full-time offers. The main roles offered are Software Developer, Business Analyst, and System Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college has a good infrastructure overall. Classrooms are spacious with projectors. Labs are well-equipped with updated systems and fast Wi-Fi. The library has a wide range of books and decent seating. Hostel facilities are average with shared rooms, but maintenance is regular. Food in the mess is hygienic, but the taste could be improved. The campus is clean and secure, with 24-hour security guards.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are qualified and supportive. Teaching quality is decent. The curriculum is updated and covers important topics, making students reasonably industry-ready. Semester exams are moderately challenging but manageable with regular study. The pass percentage is good, around 85-90%.
detailed_review.Other: The best part is the supportive faculty and regular placement training that help boost confidence. I wish the college would invite more core companies and improve the hostel food quality.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: A decent college to study.

detailed_review.Placements:
Placement in service is not worth it unless you are a top scholar. 
It is not up to mark in service. 
Out of 3/10, they are placed with a good package in Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering. 
Internship is easy to get.
Roles offered in mechanical engineering are assistant engineer and assistant manager.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Infrastructure and facilities are acceptable. 
 Well-maintained labs for every department. 
Huge grounds and play areas and decent classrooms. 
This is a pure veg college and a kind of orthodox one.
More important for sports extracurricular activities will be appreciated.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Teachers are helpful and friendly often, and even knowledgeable. 
The course does not help in the industry. 
Semester exams are moderate, and corrections are strict.
Passing in the semester is not a tough job, but the portions are a little heavier than in other colleges.
detailed_review.Other:
Core departments at this college are better than the others.
No fest, functions, or celebrations are held here.

reviews.course: M.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: In Sri Venkateswara College, the whole campus environment is just like heaven.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college provides average placements. The average salary package offered in the marketing field is 3 LPA. The placement cell keeps on sending emails of placements even after the college is over, so it is a good thing. They provide opportunities even after the completion of college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The library of this college is good and they issue books to students for free.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good enough but a few of them are not well-trained. They are unable to teach students properly and handle the class and students properly. We have a simple exam pattern. There are 2 external exams every year each semester. External exams are held 6 times in 3 years according to the semester. Exams are conducted for 75 marks. Our college gives 55 marks for internal exams by assessing our performance per semester. Internal exams are conducted for 25 marks each semester. Sri Venkateswara College is most weirdest College I found. It does not provide knowledge. They just ask about the attendance. Most of the students come to the college for attendance only.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied, and life at SVCE is pretty easy and good.

detailed_review.Placements: Passing out batch: 2025. The highest package is 21 LPA (only one got placed), the lowest package is 3.5 LPA. Top recruiter is KLA. Bulk recruiters are Accenture, Cognizant, Infosys, etc. The roles offered are software engineer, data analyst, machine learning, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is Wi-Fi access inside the campus, and we need to fill a form in the 1st year of college. Classrooms and the library are well-maintained. The food at the canteen is good, but there aren't many varieties. There is also a food court where you can get food like noodles and fried rice.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful in the CSE department and are also friendly. The course curriculum has been changed for junior batches, and it is good. There will be 3 CAT exams and 3 assignments for each subject in a semester. The difficulty level is moderate.
detailed_review.Other: A symposium will be conducted every year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Good college to complete your engineering course.

detailed_review.Placements: My department has an 80 percent placement rate. AGS Healthcare and Biocon are core companies that hire from my course, and Wipro, Tata Consultancy, and Infosys are top recruiters for IT positions. The highest salary offered for my course is 8 LPA, the lowest is 2.5 LPA, and the average salary is 3-4 LPA. All students in my course received internships, and the companies that hired interns were Aavin, Cancer Research Center, and IIT.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My college infrastructure is good. Classrooms have projectors, and the college provides full WiFi facilities. The library is very high class, with over 100,000 books. The library has its own app that lets students check out books and see when they are due. My college has very high-tech labs, especially in my department, biotechnology. The hostel rooms and campus are great, but the food is not that great. The college has a lot of sports and games, with a special emphasis on cricket.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty are highly knowledgeable and very friendly, and the teaching is superb. My teachers not only provide academic knowledge but also general knowledge and ideas for higher studies. Once a year, we have placement training. The curriculum is relevant to my course, and there are many ways for students to prepare for industry readiness, such as internships, curriculum, and mini projects. The semester question papers are easy to pass, but it is difficult to score high marks. The pass percentage is above 95%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: A great campus amidst woods with great placements and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Well, more than 80% of the students who sought placement have been placed. And the highest so far is 12 LPA. Some students were offered the role of team leaders and assistant scientist in R&D. In my course, many have opted for higher studies, so the students usually don’t need placements, but the other departments have had the said percentage of placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
The network seems to be a little problematic because of the high-voltage electricity cables across the campus, and we have a separate WiFi for our students. 
The food quality is a bit poor in the hostels, but the canteen food is great. And we have good medical facilities and a big ground for sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: They mentor us throughout the course and other activities. Yes, the curriculum is relevant, and we have frequent industrial visits, one per semester. The sem exams are quite hard for the late bloomers, but we have a pass percentage of 89% and above.
detailed_review.Other: Well, there are a minimum of festivals and events, but our college shows great importance in technical events and hackathons each year, conducted by various departments and clubs.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the college till now; really good infrastructure and a good environment.

detailed_review.Placements: Ninety percent of students are placed. The highest package is 46 LPA, and the average is 5.7 LPA. Synkromax Biotech Private Limited was one of the top recruiting companies for biotechnology. Some other top recruiters for SVCE include TCS, Cognizant, Infosys, Deloitte, Accenture, IBM, Amazon, Honeywell Ltd, Ford India, and DXC Technology. The top roles offered in my course are bioprocess engineer, research scientist, bioinformatic analyst, and biotechnology consultant.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Everything is good and sufficient for studying for four years, with no need for drastic changes in infrastructure. The canteen is good and cheap. The Wi-Fi facility is very good, and the department library, central library, and classrooms are well maintained. There is enough food for everybody in the mess and the canteen, and medical facilities are available 24/7. There are sports facilities including a tennis court, basketball court, cricket ground, football ground, swimming pool, and badminton court.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are qualified and good enough; if you are interested in any aspect of the course, you can ask without any hesitation. The course curriculum is relevant because the faculty changes it according to the nature of the course over time. This helps prepare students for the industry by taking them on industrial visits every semester and encouraging them to join internships.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I like biology a lot, and I didn't want to become a doctor.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: A good infrastructure college that prioritizes academic and general activities.

detailed_review.Placements:
I don't know about the complete placement statistics of our college. 
But on average, you get 4 LPA for almost every course. 
And last year, a senior Information Technology Branch girl from our college got an offer from Service Now for 42 LPA.
And generally placement is well above 80%.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Prepared food prices are decent and good in canteens.
But packed snacks and drinks are being sold at a bit higher price than the original price.
And I don't know much about hostels, as I'm a day scholar.
But from what I've heard, you get minimal variety, and taste is not up to mark. 
Also, this college is pure vegetarian.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Many experienced faculties are there with vast knowledge. 
Scoring good marks is easy.
But maintaining the grades and CGPA is tough due to relative grading.
And overall subject pass percentage is good for all branches.
detailed_review.Other:
Enjoyment events are limited. 
But college priorities include extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure but poor hostel facilities; average placement but friendly campus .

detailed_review.Placements: The placement at SVCE, Sriperumbudur, is quite good compared to other colleges in Chennai because of the branding of SVCE. Every year, almost all the students get placed but due to the global recession, in 2023 and 2024, there are students who are yet to be placed. The highest package stands at 26 LPA, and the lowest package is 2 LPA. The average package offered will stand at 4 LPA in 2023. Internships are offered to outstanding students only and average students are supposed to find them themselves. Cognizant is the leading recruiter.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure in SVCE is one of the best in the state. Almost all labs are well-equipped but some can be quite old and lack new equipment. If you compare them with other colleges, then SVCE labs are quite good. The hostel might be the worst part, as the food, the quality of the rooms, and the and the hygiene are below average. Since non-vegetarian foods aren't allowed, the fee they charge for hostels is too high for vegetarian food with poor quality and taste, along with old rooms and beds. There is a medical center where first aid and resting beds are available, which is a good thing and an ambulance will be available for transportation to the local hospital. Sports are well encouraged in SVCE, especially cricket. The ground is well maintained and we have a state-level team that has won several trophies.
detailed_review.Faculty: Since old facilities have retired or resigned, the quality of faculty members has degraded over the last few years. Still, there are enough experience facilities but it used to have more and more good facilities. The student-teacher ratio is around 20:1 (1 faculty will be in charge of 20 students). There are enough facilities at the college. The curriculum is updated and good compared to the Anna University curriculum but it needs a lot of improvement to meet international standards. It makes industry ready only to an extent but we have to learn so many things ourselves, as there are a lot of things they don't teach. The semester exams will have a weight of 60% and the remaining 40% will be calculated from internal exams, which include 3 informative assessment tests and assignments. The pass percentage averages around 65%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because of the wide opportunities in the software and hardware fields. It allows you to learn programming as well as electronics. The method of testing students should be changed as cheating prevails. Lots and lots of events are conducted, as that is what SVCE is known for. The campus is not so crowded as it spans over 100 acres, but we have to have a little to reach the bus bay to the classrooms, canteen and department. Lots of scholarships are offered to deserving students and extracurricular activities like clubs are available, which enhance social skills.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college is very good in placement and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Above 80% of students are placed in placements. This will help every student's life. I don't know the package offered for my course. The companies are there for internships, like HCL, TCL, and Wipro. Many engineering students are placed in our college. Other department students placed very well in our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure was superb. Many courses are available at our college. Labs are always superb. Unlimited Wi-Fi is available on the college campus and hostel. And also available for staff. In my college library, there are more than a million books.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very helpful at our college. Our college staff is very qualified and very helpful. In our college, the president and vice president are available. Semester exams and informative assessment tests are very normal and sometimes hard in our college.
detailed_review.Other: I love electrical and electronics engineering courses. So I chose this course.

reviews.course: M.Tech. in Biotechnology
reviews.review_title: Our college is very good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement opportunities are good in our college. Many companies visit our college and provide average salary packages. Flipkart, Amazon, Goldman Sachs, JP Morgan, HSBC, ICICI Bank, etc., visit our college. The average salary package offered is 15 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: First-year students should stay in a shared room. Each room has 2 fans, a table, and a cupboard. Second-year students got separate rooms. The menu is changed every 6 months. The food served in the hostel is very good. Hostel registration is done during the college admissions process. There are many apartments near our college. The hostel fee is Rs. 95,000 per year.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers are from reputed universities. They are Ph.D. holders. The teacher-student ratio is 1:20. They have great teaching skills. Semester exams are conducted after every 6 months. Exams are easy to pass if we study well.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it has the best teachers, and provides the best placements.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Experience gives the pulse of campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement are very good in our college. Which our college train us how to crack the campus interviews and how to face the problem and consequences. The give us training for developing our skills, knowledge, leadership manner and etc. Based on your performance the campus interviews will be granted.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Infrastructure are very good and perfect and project 
also done by our college with innovative. And our
college hostel was good it feel us to be comfort and gives pace for focus in the studies, sports etc. In our 
College each and every thing gives positive vibes to stay our college.
detailed_review.Faculty:
The faculty are being in the professional and friendly manner. They motivate us for each and everything they will guide us for developing our skills and how to be 
Professions. We can be professional by the College training and curriculum are same as every colleges.
detailed_review.Other: I thought the course was well organized, clear and easy to follow. The given knowledgeable with excellent presentation skills.

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college is really good to find your dream.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students who got placed in our course is about 90% at top companies like Amazon, Deloitte, Goldman Sachs, and many more. Since it is an important department in our college, the internship offers are very high and about 100% of students got interns from top companies. Top roles from our college are analyst, HR, software engineer, product manager, and more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure available in our department are very excellent. Facilities like classrooms, restrooms, playgrounds, and labs are highly good and neat to use. Labs are air-conditioned along with Wi-Fi. The library contains more than 2,00,000 books to read. The hostel food is very good and neat and hygienic. Medical facilities help immediately with any rescue.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. All the faculty members are professional. They are working hard for their students to score more marks. The way of teaching is extremely good and professional. The teaching quality is good and professional. The course curriculum is as expected. It is very good and easy to understand. Semester exams are not that difficult though teachers help in brush up on important topics before exams, so I felt easy to attempt semester exams. The pass percentage is 45%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I would like to do something in computer science. But after joining, I loved the way the college and the teaching are as the environment is very free and not so strict. We have the liberty to find out our goals and dreams. Events, fests, and other things are equally good compared to other colleges. The campus surroundings and scholarships are highly found in our college. Our college highly helps the students in many ways.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Very good placements in 2018.

detailed_review.Placements: 100% students get placed. The lowest package is 3lpa and the highest package is 26lpa. Zoho, Google, Accenture, laser & turbo, CTS, tcs, etc. are the top recruiters. Every student gets his/her internship from my course in core companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities provided in the laboratories, classrooms, and department halls are very good. The speed of wi-fi is very good. Rooms in the hostel are very neat. The quality of food provided in the canteen/mess is good for non-veg eaters.
detailed_review.Faculty:
The teachers are very helpful. They clear our doubts always and they are highly qualified and knowledgeable faculty members. The difficulty level of the semester exams is easy for me. According to anna university's regulations, internals (40) +externals (60)= full marks (100). 
Min 50 marks are required to pass in the semester exams.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: A good college with very good placement records .

detailed_review.Placements: More than 96 percent of the students are placed in the top most companlike Zoho, Cognizent, HCL, TCS, and many more very well reputed companies have visited the college and recruited many of the students in many top roles like executive manager, product analyst, Head recruiter and many more .
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructures are very tolerable but not so bad hostel food is not up to the mark and very poor in their services NON VEGETARIAN FOODS ARE NOT ALLOWED IN THE CAMPUS AND ARE NOT SOLD INSIDE. Laboratories have a decent setup and a managable Wi-Fi setup for which they charge 500.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members in this college are very much experienced like all most 20 years on an average and they have a unique style of teaching students can expect a friendly atmosphere in the class and all over the college and the curriculum was not so relevant but as u progress the curriculum caught up so well and the pass percent is 40 .

reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: One good thing about the college is that you get placed and this applies only for CSE and IT.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements are the best for CSE and IT. Core companies provide a package of 10 to 12 LPA. But for other departments you mostly get only non core companies for placements and it is just average. Major companies that recruit are zoho, EY, IBM, Freshworks, Accenture, CTS, TCS.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel isn't that better especially the food is literally the worst when compared to many other colleges and they provide only vegetarian food and they don't allow you to use swiggy. There is no AC hostels and most buildings are too old. One best thing is you get chill cold water anytime inside the hostel. And there are no attached washrooms too.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are good, they teach concepts well and those who don't teach well give you better marks. And internals are one to lookout here and question papers are average. As per college curriculum it is compulsory to have completed internship of at least 2 weeks before completing 3rd year.
detailed_review.Other: From 2022 the fests are gonna be amazing and there are a lot of changes that are to be incorporated in the coming year.

reviews.course: B.E. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very good college experience, no strict rules, and you can enjoy in a proper way.

detailed_review.Placements: All the option A students get placed at the end of the 7th semester. The average salary package offered is from 3 LPA to 7 LPA. Top recruiting companies are TCS, Zoho, Accenture, Hyundai, and Royal Enfield. Mechanical students got internships for Hyundai and Royal Enfield. The top roles offered are quality management department and the manufacturing sector.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is so good. Wi-Fi, library, and labs are totally working and we have more mechanical equipment for practical learning. The quality of food is normal, not that great. Medical facilities and sports are top class. The hostel warden is also friendly and no alcohol or drugs are allowed on campus for students' safety. Ragging is banned in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are experienced and the quality of teaching is good. You can change the faculty if you request. The pass percentage is above 90% and the end semester exam is a bit tough as they don't give important questions. The courses are mostly core and it is very helpful for students who would like to pursue higher studies also.
detailed_review.Other: SVCE is one of the top colleges for mechanical engineering. They have the most equipment which is available only in industries. The practical knowledge is more and we get good experience. Events and fest are top class and extracurricular is compulsory for getting a degree, so maintenance of that is so good. Scholarship is given to my friends who are first graduates. Only thing is there will be no free hours to enjoy ourselves during a normal day.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college is very good.

detailed_review.Placements: About 90% of students are surely placed in a year. The highest salary package offered to a student is 2 LPA. Students are placed in the top recruiting companies like TCS, CTS, and Cognizant. The students are offered the highest positions in our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has a good Wi-Fi facility, well-furnished classrooms, and the best library in Chennai. The college is good at sports and games. There is a huge ground to play. There are also well-furnished hostels with the best food and good taste. It has a lovely atmosphere on campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very kind in our college. They are always ready to help and to guide for exams. This course curriculum is relevant and it makes students industry-ready. The semester exams are very easy to attend as teachers guide during the exams.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I found something interesting in this course.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: This college is a very good college.

detailed_review.Placements: About 90% of students are surely placed in a year. The highest salary package offered to a student is 2 LPA. Students are placed in the top recruiting companies like TCS, CTS, and Cognizant. The students are offered the highest positions in our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has a good Wi-Fi facility, well-furnished classrooms, and the best library in Chennai. The college is good at sports and games. There is a huge ground to play. There are also well-furnished hostels with the best food and good taste. It has a lovely atmosphere on campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very kind in our college. They are always ready to help and to guide for exams. This course curriculum is relevant and it makes students industry-ready. The semester exams are very easy to attend as the teachers guide during the exams.
detailed_review.Other: Compared to other courses, IT has more scope in the upcoming years all over the world.

reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It provides excellent infrastructure and placements if students do not consider the fee.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are excellent in this college. Students can expects more offers in the placements. They also provide placements training but with fee, overall good placements. The final year students only 4 is left for placements, students need to be in a good CGPA and grade to get good placements, they also offer other ways like studying PG abroad or competitive exams or entrepreneurship. The students can also get financial support for their projects.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. It provides fully technical laboratories. Wi-Fi availability all over the campus and in hostel is good. The food is better than another college mess. But non-vegetarian is not allowed. They give equal importance to extra curricular activities. Regular sports events are held. Students can enjoy culturals often, and it will be very joyful. They conduct inter-college culturals also.
detailed_review.Faculty: This college provides good teaching and easily understandable. They can easily solve students' doubts. Monthly there will be a CAT exam for internal mark. Laboratories sessions are easy. They prepare notes to study for the CAT exams and semester exams it is very easily to study. The faculty members are very friendly. Mobiles are allowed in this college but not during the classes if they find students they will take the mobile and students can get it after the classes.
detailed_review.Other: I came through the counselling and this college is good overall except the fee. The fee structure is very high. For management students its even higher. If students prefer coming to college by local bus then they can get an exemption from paying the college transport fee, but it is not easy only if students show with proof. Food deliveries are not allowed. But deliveries like Amazon, Flipkart, and Big Basket are allowed though. Hostel is not strict.

college_info.college_name: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering Course Admissions 2025: Fees & Eligibility

admission.title: SVCE Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering admissions 2025 are open . The college offers courses in the field of Engineering, including B.E., B.Tech, M.E., M.Tech, and PhD. These courses are offered under the affiliation with Anna University. Admissions to all the courses are administered by the Directorate of Technical Education. SVCE admission is completely entrance-based. The Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering accepts CET and TANCET scores for BTech and MTech courses, respectively. Further, direct admissions are also offered through Lateral Entry. Candidates looking for course admission must apply through the official website of the college.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission in Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram?
faqs.answer: Candidates seeking course admission at Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram cannot enrol for direct admission. The college admits students based on scores from the CET/TANCET entrance exams. To enrol for course admission, students must apply through the official website. Aspirants can apply for course admission on the official website.

faqs.question: What entrance exams are accepted for BTech and M.Tech at Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram?
faqs.answer: SVCE accepts CET exam scores for BTech and TANCET/CET scores for M.Tech course. Out of the 1,020 total seats for the BTech course,  50% are filled up through Tamil Nadu Government Department of Technical Education Online-counseling. To be noted is that the seats offered by SVCE are filled up within the first few days of counseling with significant-high cut-off marks. The remaining 50% seats are filled through management quota, as per the Govt. norms.

faqs.question: What type of courses doesSri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram offer?
faqs.answer: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering offers B.E., B.Tech, M.E., M.Tech, and PhD. These courses are offered under the affiliation with Anna University. Candidates looking for course admission must apply at the official website. The duration of the UG course is four years, and the PG course is for two years, excluding PhD.

faqs.question: Is Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram admission open?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram admission is currently open. The college offers courses in the field of Engineering, including B.E., B.Tech, M.E., M.Tech, and PhD. These courses are offered under the affiliation with Anna University. Admissions to all the courses are administered by the Directorate of Technical Education.

faqs.question: What are the requirements for BTech Lateral Entry at Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram?

Qualifying in the Common Entrance Test (CET) conducted by the Directorate General of Shipping, Govt. of India is NOT mandatory for Diploma candidates Medical fitness certificate & Merchant Marine Psychometric Evaluation Test certificate obtained from Directorate General of Shipping approved Medical Officer. A Valid passport is required at the time of admission at Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Kanchipuram.

faqs.question: Which entrance exams are accepted by Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering accepts various entrance exam scores for admissions such as TANCET , GATE, and others. faqs.question: What is the mode for TANCET registration?
faqs.answer: Anna University releases the TANCET application form in an online mode. Candidates who wish to apply for the TANCET exam need to apply for the exam online. No other mode is available for the TANCET registration. Anna University will not entertain any requests for offline submission of the application form. After submitting the online application form, candidates must take a print out of the TANCET filled in form to retain the same for future references. However, this print-out must not be sent to the official authority via fax or post. TANCET form print out is for retainment by the applicant. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

college_info.college_name: SVCET Chittoor: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements

highlights.summary:
Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology (also known as SVCET) was established in 1998 in Chitoor, Andhra Pradesh. The institute offers a wide range of 13 UG and 18 PG Degree and Diploma programmes approved by AICTE. The institute is recognised by UGC as an autonomous body. Ranked 198 among the Top Engineering Colleges by NIRF 2022, MHRD, Govt. of India, SVCET offers NBA-accredited courses with a grade of 'A' by NAAC. Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology also offers courses in affiliation with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Anantapur.
The institute offers courses in the fields of Civil Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and more, providing comprehensive education through experienced faculty and modern facilities. Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology, Chittoor also offers excellent infrastructure. For more details on Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology, check out the table below:

college_info_program.intro: SVCET Chittoor offers a range of popular programs for 2025 admissions. Eligibility criteria include a minimum 50% aggregate in relevant subjects such as Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry for BTech, and specific entrance exams like AP EAMCET, GATE, AP PGECET, and APICET for MTech, MBA, and MCA respectively. Admission selections are based on these criteria to ensure qualified candidates join their desired courses at Sri VCET. reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)
reviews.review_title: In my opinion, it is okay, and the faculty members are also good.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students who were placed is around 20%, and the remaining are still in search. The highest package is, I think, 10 LPA, and the lowest would be 3.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Cognizant, Accenture, L&T, etc. It would be around 30% of students who got internships from my course, and those are JSPIDER and Thopstech. The top roles offered are web developers and DevOps.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are good and decent facilities and infrastructure available in my college, like labs for different courses, separate classrooms for each section, and a library. I didn't know about the hostel at my college because I live in PGs near the college, but I have heard about the hostel from my friends, and they said it is okay.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, and well-qualified faculty are present, and they are mostly from Chennai, so the communication is also good. The semester exams are very strict and stressful because no copying is allowed. If anybody gets caught, the punishment would be very severe.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because my family suggested I take it. The things I would wish for are that there should be more capable and good labs present for this course.

college_info.college_name: SVCET Chittoor Course Admission 2025: Eligibility, Selection, Application

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission into SVCET Chittoor?
faqs.answer: Yes, you may get direct admission into Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology through management quota. The college reserves a certain percentage of the seat intake for students applying under the management quota. The college follows the norms as specified by the Government of Andhra Pradesh. Interested students can connect with the college's administration desk to know more about the same.

faqs.question: What courses are available at SVCET Chittoor?
faqs.answer: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology Chittoor offers courses at diploma, undergraduate, and postgraduate levels. These programmes are offered in full-time mode. Students looking to get into the college must ensure to fulfil the admission criteria of the programme. Find below the list of SVCET Chittoor programmes :

faqs.question: Who is eligible for Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology Chittoor admission?
faqs.answer: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology Chittoor eligibility varies depending on the programme selected by the candidate. Those looking to get into the undergraduate programmes need to pass Class 12 with relevant subjects. Similarly, those who wish to join the PG courses need to complete graduation in the relevant field. Find below the general eligibility for some SVCET courses: Class with a 50% aggregate with Mathematics, Physics & Chemistry as compulsory subjects BTech/BE with a 50% aggregate Any degree with a 50% aggregate Any Degree with 50% aggregate with Mathematics Compulsory subject

faqs.question: Is Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology admission open?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology admission 2024 will begin soon. The college offers courses, such as BTech, M.Tech MCA and MBA courses at the UG and PG level. Apart from the degree courses, the college also offers Diploma courses. Sri VCET courses' admissions are based on entrance exam scores

faqs.question: What are the BTech courses offered at Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology Chittoor?
faqs.answer: At SVCET Chittoor, students can enrol into BTech course at the undergraduate level by fulfiling the preset admission criteria. Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology Chittoor offers the following BTech programmes in full-time mode:

faqs.question: How can I get admission to MBA at Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology?
faqs.answer: For admission to the MBA course, students need to fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria in the first place. Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology accepts a valid score on the APICET exam. Apart from this, the total tuition fee for the MBA course is INR 1.2 lakh.

faqs.question: Does Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology have entrance exam for MTech?
faqs.answer: Yes, for admission to M.Tech courses, candidates must have a valid score, i.e., GATE, Andhra Pradesh PGECET at Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology. This exam is particularly conducted for admission of students to its UG courses. Students can get admission to BTech after qualifying for this exam.

faqs.question: Which M.Tech specialisations does Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering and Technology offer?

college_info.college_name: SVCE Tirupati: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Tirupati is also known as SVCE Tirupati was founded in 2007. It is a private institute and is located in Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh. SVCE Tirupati courses are offered to students at the UG and PG levels. The institute is approved by AICTE and offers courses in Full Time mode. SVCE Tirupati offers a total of 15 courses in streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. Some of the popular courses offered at the institute are B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and MCA and the total seat intake for the available courses is 2034. These courses are offered to students across several specialisations such as Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering and Information Technology. Further, the fee for all these courses ranges between INR 70,000 to 2,98,000 and the average median salary is around INR 4,96,667. Apart from this, the SVCE Tirupati campus has a state-of-the-art infrastructure with all the advanced facilities.

SVCE Tirupati Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college's excellence in teaching.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement is good. The people are getting less placements. They can offer less package. The placements are good for those who have the skills and above 8 CGP, and it is coming more for now. This is the best college, and it is the way to get maximum placement.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel is superb but the beds are up and down. The college has digital boards, and the facilities are good. It is conducting good CRT classes, and they are developing to the change of the college placements for improvement. They are good from their perspective.
detailed_review.Faculty: The exams are scheduled. Teachers send the PDF, and it's good for the percentage. Teachers help with workshops, intern the people developing, and the latest minor degree comes. It will be conducted for 3 years, and the minor degree we need to do the mini project.
detailed_review.Other: College is the best, and the management does not force us to pay the EAMCET fee.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: If you're willing to join SVCE, then you don't have to think twice because it's the best.

detailed_review.Placements: I'm currently pursuing ECE, which is electronic and communication engineering, so it's very obvious to get a placement. Though you're not from a university but in our college, it's guaranteed that every elite student gets their respective placement in their own fields.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hospitality and infrastructure are quite good among all other colleges that come under Tirupati. As we look into the facilities they're providing, every required facility that can make students feel comfortable and satisfy this college is very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Every faculty in the college is helpful and knowledgeable, a qualified experts who have years of experience in their respective subjects. Semester exams are not bad, but it's okay to write. The pass percentage will be between 60% to 65%. Exams and activities are conducted with proper management.
detailed_review.Other: If we discuss the ECE department, it's very much needed for the future technology and semiconductor platform may run well in future, and events are good but not as expected before joining the college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good placements were there last year.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students is about 80% are placed in our college. The highest package is about 5 LPA, the lowest package is 1.5 LPA, and the average package is about 3 LPA. I think our colleges go mostly for companies like Zoho, Wipro and Infosys. About 55% students got internships. Manager, trainers like those roles are offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities that we have are poor Wi-Fi for classes, but Ethernet is available in labs, so no problem. Each classroom has dedicated digital boards, a good number of laboratories, well-managed classrooms and a sufficient number of libraries. The quality of facilities available in our hostel is the same as that of other hostels, with no special treatment. The quality of food is super, good games and sports, and there are some medical kits available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are so helpful with students and funny, but some people are not like that. We need to be nice, that's it, well-qualified, and most teachers have good knowledge of subjects. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students industry-ready. Exams are not so difficult and not so easy, we just have to read. The pass percentage is about 70%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I have an interest in it, and it will rule the future as well. I wish that, if possible, the technical subjects have better materials and better instruments so that the student can learn the course practically. There are an infinite number of fests and events we can fully enjoy them as well.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Cyber Security)
reviews.review_title: It is better than the past years.

detailed_review.Placements: There is a medium range of placements. Nearly 95% of students are passed out from the college with the placements. The highest package offered in the college is 8 LPA. The lowest package is 3.5 LPA in the college placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is satisfied here. It provides well infrastructure and education. It recently added NCC for students, and conducted monthly technical events. It has well-equipped infrastructure labs with the latest updated versions and soft skills communication labs. There are electrical department labs that are fully equipped.
detailed_review.Faculty: It is easy to study here. They provide good library resources and good teaching staff. They are moving closer to the students' mindset. They are friendly and interactive with the students. College management plans an industrial visit for students to gain practical knowledge.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good college with quality teaching.

detailed_review.Placements: 75 percent of students in my college got placements. The highest is 10 LPA, and the lowest is 1 LPA. The average package is 4 LPA. Top companies are Zoho. Around 70 percent of students got internships from my course. The top roles offered in my course are software engineer, front-end developer, and software developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure available for my course and department are good. Wi-Fi is not provided to students. Labs and classrooms are spacious and good. The library is big, and there are many books available for my course. Hostel facilities and the canteen are average.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are qualified and knowledgeable. They are helpful in gaining knowledge in core subjects. Teaching quality is good and clear. This course curriculum is relevant and makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are easy in the college. Pass percentage is 75 percent.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very good college in our city

detailed_review.Placements: 60 percent of students are placed in our department, and the highest package is 19 LPA. The lowest package is 9 LPA. The students are placed in top recruiting companies in the college like TCS and Infosys, and it is very useful for us.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure in our college are very good. We have good Wi-Fi connections, very new computers, and very good library rooms. The hostel food is very hygienic, and the food is also good. The rooms are very clean, and there are good sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful for us. The teachers are very good and very knowledgeable. They teach us very well with quality teaching. The semester exams are very easy for us because of our teachers, and we get good scores in our exams.
detailed_review.Other: I have got seat.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good learning environment with decent placements, strong academics.

detailed_review.Placements: In my B.Tech batch, about 70-80% got placed. The highest package was around 10-12 LPA, the average is 4-5 LPA, and the lowest is 2.5 LPA - 3 LPA. Top recruiters were TCS, L&T, Tata Technologies, and Bosch. Around 50% got internships in L&T, Tata, Dr Reddy's. Common roles were GET, design and quality engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our department has Wi-Fi, equipped labs, smart classrooms, and a good library. Hostel facilities are decent with clean rooms, normal mess food, canteen snacks, basic medical support, and good sports grounds for games and fitness. Good environment.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and explain concepts well. The curriculum is relevant and supports industry skills. Semester exams are moderate in difficulty, and students who prepare regularly clear them easily, giving a pass percentage of around 80-90%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course for strong career prospects and practical learning. The best parts are hands-on labs and supportive faculty. Improvements are needed in placements and industry exposure. Campus events, crowd, connectivity, and extracurricular activities are good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Very satisfied and good.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 70-85 percent of the students in the ECE department get placed every year. The average package is 4 LPA-6 LPA. The lowest Package is 2.5 LPA-3 LPA. Recruiting companies are TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Cognizant, Accenture, Capgemini, Jio, Airtel, Nokia, and Cisco. Around 40-60 percent of students from ECE get internships, depending on the year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The ECE department has well-developed academic and technical facilities to support both theory and hands-on learning. ECE has fully equipped labs. These labs have oscilloscopes, signal generators, a trainer kit, sports, and monthly events are conducted.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers in the ECE department are generally helpful, well-qualified, and knowledgeable. Most faculty members hold M.Tech or Ph.D. degrees. The ECE curriculum is updated and relevant to current industry needs. Semester exams are moderately difficult.
detailed_review.Other: Events are conducted.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The ECE course is best, and my faculty is well-experienced and very friendly with students.

detailed_review.Placements: 60-70 percent of students got placed from my course. The highest package is 10 LPA and the lowest package is 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Intel, Telecom, Bosch, and Texas. 40-50 percent of students got internships from my course. Top roles are electronics designer and engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities provided in hostels are well-equipped. The rooms are cleaned every day. The canteen and mess food is very good and tasty.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, well-qualified, and well knowledgeable. The teaching quality is extremely good. The course curriculum is very relevant. It makes students ready to survive and manage in life and career. Semesters are manageable, and we can pass easily. The faculty are well-trained with more than 15 years of experience. Teaching is very understandable to students, and they are very friendly to students.
detailed_review.Other: I like this course very much, so I have decided to take it. I wish to improve my coding and hardware experiments more. Events and fests are conducted monthly, inviting many guests.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Very satisfied with the industry-relevant IT course with good labs and supportive staff.

detailed_review.Placements: 75%-90% of students in the Information Technology course get placed. The highest package is 20 LPA, and the average package is 4 LPA. Around 40%-70% of IT students typically secure internships. Software Developed / Software Engineer, Full Stack Developer roles are offered. Infosys and TCS recruit.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Internet speed is usually stable enough for coding, online labs, and project submissions. Labs are maintained regularly and have air-conditioning in most campuses. Many colleges provide smart classrooms with projectors, audio systems, and digital boards.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers use smart boards, PPTs, and real-time examples, which makes the concepts easier to understand. It includes lab sessions, mini-projects, workshops, and internships, which help students gain practical exposure. 80%-90%, depending on the academic year.
detailed_review.Other: I chose it because it's the best.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: It is a very good and useful college.

detailed_review.Placements: 60% of students have been selected for campus placements in our college, and the highest package in our college is 8 Lacs per annum, while the lowest package is 4 Lacs per annum. The highest recruiting company that has come is TCS to select us.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Super and good facilities and infrastructure in our college. We have good speed Wi-Fi connections in our block and super-fast computer systems in labs. Library books are also good, and the facilities in our college are nice. Food is good, and the rooms are hygienic.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and very good for our department. They are very friendly with us, and each teacher is qualified with high Ph.D. courses and has good knowledge. Because of them, we are passing our semester easily with the highest scores and CGPA.
detailed_review.Other: I have a good seat in this college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Very nice and beautiful college.

detailed_review.Placements: 80% of students have been selected from our college, and the highest package in our college is 12 lacs per annum, while the lowest package is 5 Lacs per annum. The top recruiting companies, such as Infosys and TCS, came and selected the students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities in our college are above average, and the infrastructure of our college/department is very good. We have very high-speed internet, good labs, updated systems, large classrooms, and good hostel rooms. Additionally, we have hygienic food.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is very good, and they are highly skilled lecturers we have in our college. Because of them, we are able to attend the semester exams easily and score well.
detailed_review.Other: Good college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Cyber Security)
reviews.review_title: Good placements and practical training in Cyber Security.

detailed_review.Placements: Our Cyber Security batch had strong placement results with around 85–90 percent of students placed. The highest package offered is about 20 LPA, the average is 5–7 LPA, and the lowest is around 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies included Deloitte, TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Accenture Security, and IBM. Nearly 70–80 percent of students secured internships in companies like Deloitte, TCS, and PwC. The most common roles offered are cyber security analyst, SOC analyst, penetration tester, and security consultant.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our Cyber Security course had well-equipped labs with updated tools, high-speed Wi-Fi, smart classrooms, and access to a good digital library. The hostel provided clean rooms, continuous water supply, and decent security. Mess food is average but hygienic and the canteen offered better options. Basic medical facilities are available on campus along with playgrounds, indoor games, and areas for fitness and recreation creating a comfortable overall living and learning environment.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty in our Cyber Security course are helpful, well-qualified, and had strong technical knowledge which made the teaching quality productive and easy to follow. The curriculum is updated with industry-relevant topics like SOC operations, ethical hacking, and digital forensics helping students become job-ready. Semester exams are moderate, not difficult focusing on both theory and practical skills. The pass percentage is around 85–90 percent making it manageable for sincere students.
detailed_review.Other: I chose Cyber Security because of its growing demand and strong career scope. Our batch had good labs and practical learning. The course could improve with more hands-on projects. The campus had active fests, a good crowd, and decent extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Good and very useful college.

detailed_review.Placements:
In our college, a large number of students are placed in the campus selection and the students who have received the highest package of 17LPA and the lowest package offered is 7LPA. The top recruiting companies TCS and Infosys, have selected many students.



Good and very useful college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Better facilities and good infrastructure are available for our colleges. Infrastructure of the labs is very big and has good updated systems and a good library. I like the quality of the food, and the rooms and canteen are very clean and hygienic.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is good and they are very helpful, qualified teachers and knowledgeable staff. They have good skills, and they help us learn new skills easily. Our teachers, we are passing our semester exams and getting good scores.
detailed_review.Other: In our city, the SVE College is a very high named college, so I have joined there.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: It's a good and useful college.

detailed_review.Placements: More students are placed in our information technology branch. The highest package in our college is 17 LPA, and the lowest package is just 5 LPA. Many useful companies have come to our college, like Infosys and TCS.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good college facilities and infrastructure are available in our department, like labs, classrooms, and a library. We have big rooms and good Wi-Fi connections in our labs, and good updated systems. The quality of the hostel is average, and the food is also average.
detailed_review.Faculty: I have a good teaching staff, and I have learned useful things, and I have developed my skills by reading and learning from our staff. The teaching of our staff helps us to score good marks, and they make it easy for learning easily, and I like the teaching.
detailed_review.Other: I chose it because I got a seat.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good and useful college .

detailed_review.Placements: Many students have been placed in our college, and the highest package is 17LPA I have seen till now, and the lowest package is just 5LPA. The topmost level companies that have come to our college are Infosys and TCS.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities are poor, and the labs are very few, many systems are not working in our colleges, and there is a bad Wi-Fi connection. The library is too small for all the branches we have just one library, and the hostel facilities are also bad, not that good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very good, and they help us in our studies. They are the qualified teachers, and they teach well. The semester exams are very easy because our teachers are very good, so we can write every exam easily and I like my teachers very much.
detailed_review.Other: Many students are selected in campus selection for a job, so I too joined this college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good campus, and average labs.

detailed_review.Placements: 75 percent of students are placed in my course. The highest package offered is 11LPA, the average package offered is 5LPA, and the lowest package offered is 1LPA. Top recruiting companies are ZOHO and Infosys. Fewer people get internships from my college, mostly students choose outside the campus. The top roles in my course are chip designing.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure in my college are good. Wi-Fi is available, but it is not provided to students. Labs are good, but the equipment is not in good condition and often lags. Digital boards are present in the classroom. The library has a wide collection of books and also provides Wi-Fi.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most teachers are helpful, though a few are not. Teachers are supportive are qualified and knowledgeable. The course curriculum is good and covers most of the essential topics. It is relevant to industry needs. Semester exams are easy, and students can write easily.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with this college, which is good in placements, and the facilities are good.

detailed_review.Placements: I am from the 2024-2027 B.Tech batch, and the placements are good. A number of companies visit the campus, and a few of them prefer hiring only female candidates, which reduces opportunities for others. The placement faculty puts in good effort and regularly shares off-campus and pooled drive information. Around 40-50 percent of students from my course got placed. The highest package is around 6 LPA, the lowest is about 2.5 LPA, and the average package stayed near 3 LPA-3.2 LPA. Companies like Infosys, Wipro, Tech Mahindra, and TCS hire a few students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure provided for our course is good. But sometimes computers in the lab do not work properly, and the internet is also unstable at times, which affects practical classes. Classrooms have digital boards, but not all teachers are comfortable using them effectively. The library has a decent collection of books, but the space could be better maintained. Hostel facilities are manageable. The rooms are okay, but not very spacious. The hostel food is simple and edible, though the menu does not change. Medical support is always available quickly. Sports facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some faculty members are really good at explaining concepts and are helpful whenever we need support. A few teachers lack experience and mostly rely on digital boards or ask us to read from the slides without proper explanation. The curriculum is generally relevant and covers the basics needed but practical exposure is good. College uses digital classrooms which are helpful when used properly. Semester exams are not very difficult, and with regular study, it is easy to pass. The overall pass percentage in our course is fairly high, around 80 percent.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I was interested in engineering and wanted to build skills in the technical field. The college conducts more events and fests compared to some nearby colleges, which makes campus life enjoyable. Students are friendly and the environment is peaceful. However, I feel placements and lab facilities should be improved. Extracurricular activities happen, but sports equipment and grounds need better maintenance. Connectivity to the campus is decent, and scholarships are available for eligible students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Very average college, and don't join.

detailed_review.Placements: A high percentage of the students got placed from our course, above 30 students got campus selection, and the highest package is 5 LPA and the lowest package is 2 LPA. The top companies, Infosys and TCS, have come and selected.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure available in our department are good, with Wi-Fi connections and big and advanced computers in labs, and very knowledgeable books in the library. In hostels, the rooms are not good, the bathrooms are few, and the food is not good.
detailed_review.Faculty: For other departments, they have well-qualified teachers, but coming to IT, the teachers are not good and not skilled. They just send the PDFs and tell us to read, and they are irregular with the classes, and they do not teach us well, and they don't help us.
detailed_review.Other: Nothing much interests me in this college, and more fees and extra charges.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: I liked the college.

detailed_review.Placements: Many percent of the students have been placed in our course, and the strength of our course is 78 students. The highest package in our college is 12 LPA, and the lowest package is 5 LPA. The top companies are Infosys and TCS in our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure available for our course are very good. We have the best Wi-Fi connection, a super-fast network, good classrooms and a very well-developed library with updated books. In our hostels, the quality of food and the available food in the mess are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers are very helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is very good and I like it very much. The course curriculum is relevant and does make the students industry-ready which means it helps us and makes it easy to take semester exams.
detailed_review.Other: I liked the college so I joined.

faqs.question: Is MU - Mewar University good for placements?
faqs.answer: Located in Chittorgarh, Rajasthan, Mewar University boasts a student-centric placement cell dedicated to aiding students in securing their desired employment opportunities. As per the latest data, the university has successfully placed over 600 students with an impressive average package of Rs. 4.2 LPA. Notable recruiters in 2023 included prominent names such as Wipro, TCS, Genpact, Lupin, ICICI Bank, and CEAT Tyres. The placement process involves essential steps like registering on the Campus Interaction Portal, engaging with recruiters for campus placements, completing the Employer Registration Form (ERF), and collaboratively determining dates for pre-placement talks and final placements. While the available information suggests a favorable placement record for Mewar University, it is advisable to conduct additional research and seek insights from alumni or current students for a comprehensive evaluation before making any decisions.

faqs.question: Why do you need to score less than 20000 rank in APICET to get into a Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Tirupati offers MBA and MCA specialisations. In 2024, the Andhra Pradesh ICET cutoff had been released by the Institute for Home State categories. The College of Arts and Commerce cutoff 2024 for Master of Computer Applications (MCA) was 17660 , and for MBA in Retail Management , it stood at 34430 for the General Home State quota. So, considering the Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Tirupati cutoff 2024 , we can assume that to get into the institute, candidates will have to acquire a rank less than 20000 for MBA admissions. Further, candidates can check out the round, year, and category-wise cutoff from the Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Tirupati page:

faqs.question: What is the eligibility to get admission in Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Tirupati for UG/PG courses?
faqs.answer:
Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering, Tirupati has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility MCA Candidate must have passed Bachelor degree of 3/4 years duration with Mathematics as one of the subject at Intermediate or Degree level with above mentioned marks from any recognised University/Institute.
45% marks for BC categories.
Candidate who are appearing for the final year degree examination are also be eligible.
Degree obtained by Distance Mode Program should have recognition by Joint Committee of UGC, AICTE and DEC/DEB.
Candidate who passed all the subjects of the three years of any Degree course in one sitting is not eligible for admission. MBA/PGDM Candidate must have completed Bachelor degree of 3/4 years duration with above mentioned marks from any recognised University/Institute.
45% marks for BC categories.
Candidate who are appearing for the final year degree examination are also be eligible.
Degree obtained by Distance Mode Program should have recognition by Joint Committee of UGC, AICTE and DEC/DEB.
Candidate who passed all the subjects of the three years of any Degree course in one sitting is not eligible for admission. B.E. / B.Tech Candidate must have passed Diploma in Engineering/Technology from a recognised board M.E./M.Tech Candidate completed B.Tech./B.E. degree in relevant branch from any recognised University are eligible to apply.
Candidate must have also qualified GATE/AP-PGECET Entrance Tests. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

highlights.summary:
Sri Venkateswara University College of Engineering is college of Sri Venkateswara University Tirupati. The college was set up in 1959. It is associated to JNTU Anantapur. It has been recognised as institution offering engineering education programs, training human resources oriented to problem-solving and system development. It is approved by AICTE and UGC. It has been accredited with A Grade by NAAC. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate programmes in different fields such as Engineering, IT and Software.
