SVUCE Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college. The college and hostel fees are affordable. We can't expect huge placements.

detailed_review.Placements: I am from the electronic and communication engineering course. Placements in our department are a bit low, and maybe like 7-10 students get placed out of around 70 students. We can't expect any big packages.  Here, the salary package offered ranges from 4-6 LPA, which is the most common. One student got a package of 18 LPA, which is off-campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is no working Wi-Fi on campus. There is no Wi-Fi in hostels at all. Labs are average, but have enough equipment to run. Every classroom has a digital board, which is a good part of our campus. Desks are a little old. There is good medical support. It is also good for sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: All professors are good at their subjects. They are not able to explain things in a simple way. They have good research knowledge. The course curriculum is mostly theoretical, and we should mostly learn on our own. They provide enough notes to appear for semester exams. Exams are moderately to a little hard. We roughly have around 60-80 percent pass percentage.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college because it is a well-reputed public university in our state. The best thing is that we have a good amount of time outside the classes, and if we are very interested, we can use that time a lot. I would like more practical and industrial-related things to be added to the curriculum. I think the new regulations are better than the previous ones. As a public university, we can't expect a number of events, but we will have fun. The number of students is very limited, like 60-72 students per department and a total of 6 departments. We have good sports facilities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Excellent college in AP. We enjoy every bit of our time in this college.

detailed_review.Placements: Good placements. Top companies like Fanatics (18 LPA), Cognizant, Accenture, and Glory Global come. This year placements are a bit low due to recession and tough times for companies, but overall, placements are good (3.5/5). Many companies shortlist students based on CGPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Good infrastructure is available for the department with 100 Mbps Wi-Fi. Faculty is exceptional. The principal and core principals are supportive. Labs and workshops are satisfactory for the Mechanical and Civil departments. A new computer lab is coming, and currently, we have four labs.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, but exams are conducted strictly. We have core subjects from semester 1 to 7 and a project in semester 8. Many ongoing activities happen on campus, especially in the university. Everything is strict, including the curriculum and syllabus.
detailed_review.Other: Fests are held every year. It includes hackathons and rhapsody, with many events organized. The department technical fest also happens. They provide certifications that are useful for future work. These events cover various aspects. It follow the core principles department-wise.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of College of Engineering, Sri Venkateswara University.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement percentage of my course is 90%. The highest package is 28 LPA. The average package is 6 LPA. The top companies include Amazon, Flipkart, Wipro, Infosys, etc. The percentage of getting internships is 75%. Companies like Wipro, etc, are visiting our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college looks very beautiful with its infrastructure. All blocks and department infrastructure are very beautiful with a cool climate. Wi-Fi is not available. Classrooms are good. The library is also good. Hostel rooms are very nice. The food gives a homey feeling. Overall, the food is superb. There are good facilities for medical and sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well-qualified and very knowledgeable. Teaching quality is really very nice. All teachers are very experienced. My course is relevant to software, not the industry field. Semester exams are moderate. Each semester has two exams. The pass percentage is 80%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is good. The infrastructure is very good.

detailed_review.Placements: The maximum of higher percentage of students get placed in placements in our college. The highest package is 18 LPA, and the lowest package is 3 LPA. Placements are slightly good, but not too much. In this college, teachers teach us about internships from the start.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is very nice. There are digital classrooms. Hostels are also very nice. Our campus area is spread over 1000 acres of land. The atmosphere is good and full of greenery. This college has good infrastructure, and all are very adaptable.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are good. They teach very well. They are very highly educated. Their teaching is very good. Staff members are very friendly to us. I have enjoyed it a lot. In our college, exams are held very strictly and properly.
detailed_review.Other: The main point in choosing this college is that it is a government university.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely amazing because of the good placements, faculty, and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements in our college, Sri Venkateshwara University College of Engineering, are based on students' CGPA and skills like subject knowledge and working ability. The maximum package in this department is 8 LPA, and the minimum is 4 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The food quality is very good. It is just like home food. The hostel and room quality are also very good. There is a separate hostel for first-year students. We have digital classrooms and well-organized labs in our college. They are in great condition.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is very experienced with amazing explanation skills. They are well-trained. The concepts are easily understood by students. There is a big library, which is useful for GATE preparation and also for many central government jobs.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is best suited for all-rounder.

detailed_review.Placements: 50% of students got placed in 2024-25. The highest package is 18 LPA, the lowest is 3.5 LPA, and the average is 6 LPA-8 LPA. Recruiting companies are Wipro, Fanatics, Cognizant, Virchow Technology, Medha Construction, NCC Limited, Tech Mahindra, Nyreas, TCS, and Glory. Roles offered are software developer, Java developer, BDA, and junior tester.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have labs with above-average updated software, smart boards, Wi-Fi facility for labs, and technology devices. The facilities are also above average. About food, the taste is best. There is availability of medications. The sports and games are available every day, both indoor and outdoor games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are experienced, well-educated, and knowledgeable. The curriculum is above average with an up-to-date syllabus. All courses are available for students. The exams are quite unpredictable of toughness, but they're not overly tough. We can write if we study well.
detailed_review.Other: The best thing is, it is a booming industry in the future. The improvements we should include more courses relevant to the present situation. The events and fest are the most enjoyable ones.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: It has good faculty members and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college students are highly achieve a package of 13 LPA in electrical engineering. There are courses like computer engineering, civil engineering, and electrical engineering. There are two internships. Civil engineering students go to construction buildings and computer engineering students go to software companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It has good infrastructure. Wi-Fe is only for faculty members and not for students. Labs are good. There is a 130-member seating capacity in classrooms. The library is very good with department books and also other books. The food is good. Sports are conducted during only festival season.
detailed_review.Faculty: During the examination, faculty members are very strict in our college. Examinations are very tough and under CCTV footage as the principal sir watching us live. In mid-semester examinations also principal sir watches us on CCTV cameras. On one bench, there will be only one student. There will be three invigilators in one class.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it is my dream. There is no ragging. The campus has friendly juniors, seniors, and faculty members.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: A university with great opportunities in engineering, arts, and life knowledge for better placements

detailed_review.Placements: Intel, L&T Projects, Genpact, Deloitte, LLP Consultancy, and more companies offered internships, and 24 LPA jobs for graduates. It also provided fresher experience and offered multiple benefits with jobs. Most of my friends had completed internships at Intel and joined Intel with 40 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Food was good. Our campus had clean environment to study. Hostel warden was friendly and no ragging was allowed. Mostly it was a silent area for group studying. Food offered was hygienic. Two banks were working and 5 ATM machines were placed, offering a gymnastics club with tennis grounds.
detailed_review.Faculty: PG qualified lectures were available for students who teach in a better way to shape the young generation. Two pre-final exams were conducted with one final exam then the year was completed. Totally graduation of 1 year was completed over the quarter. Teachers were friendly, and guidance was provided.
detailed_review.Other: Our campus had a clean and green area. Campus placement offers 1-year fests each year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a great college with good food.

detailed_review.Placements: To date, above 50% of students got placed in top companies with good packages. Most of the jobs are from the software side. Infosys and IETE are the most recruiting companies. It is a better college in the overall Andhra Pradesh state.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostels provide comfortable accommodation with well-furnished rooms and 24/7 security. Wi-Fi, common study rooms, and recreational spaces enhance the student experience. The mess serves hygienic and nutritious food with multiple menu options, while the canteen offers snacks and beverages. The university promotes sports and fitness with facilities for cricket, football, basketball, and indoor games. A well-equipped gym is also available. The campus has a health center providing medical care with qualified doctors and emergency services. With a strong emphasis on academics, research, and extracurricular activities, SV University and SVCET offer a well-rounded educational experience for ECE students.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are highly qualified and knowledgeable. They have great knowledge and skills. They are great in the college. Semester exams are easy. Everyone can easily pass the exams. It is a great college in perspective of engineering and technology admission.
detailed_review.Other: It is way too good in the college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: SV University for engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: In our college, most students prefer to do their graduation in M.Tech after the completion of B.Tech so the placements are not as much as expected. About 50% of students got placed on campus. The highest package in our is 18 LPA, and the average package is 5 LPA-6 Lacs. The top recruiting company is Fanitics.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the college is wonderful. Classrooms are excellent with digital screens. Wi-Fi is available and there are multiple labs with peaceful environment. We have the largest library where we have numerous books. Hostel is good than expected. Hostel environment is very good and the food is better as compared to other hostels.
detailed_review.Faculty: Course curriculum is out of date and faculty members are well-qualified and more knowledgeable. The teaching quality is very good. Semester exams are difficult for students as faculty members do not cover the entire syllabus. Students need to study on their own so it is difficult for students.
detailed_review.Other: I have been very passionate about computers ever since my childhood so I chose this course. After coming to the college, I was not much more interested in seeing my seniors are their competition I made myself improve myself. Coming to fest that happens in my college one major event is Cynosure which is our department's fest so we all participate in the fest. Students from various colleges visit fest to participate.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Experience of College of Engineering, Sri Venkateswara University.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are gradually decreasing every year. In the last 4 years after the coronavirus pandemic, companies did not hire many graduates so our college campus placements have also decreased. One student got a salary package of 18 LPA this year and the other student got a salary package of 6 LPA from Accenture company in campus placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college hostel for boys is the best and the food is good. It serves non-vegetarian food 3 times every week and omelets 5 days. The food is best at the mess and its charge is Rs. 3,000 per month. Rooms and infrastructure are also good. The college hostel for girls is okay, not bad.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course curriculum is okay but it needs some modifications. It is required to add the latest technologies to give students industry-level experience for better placements and job opportunities. Faculty members are well-experienced. They have great knowledge and are friendly.
detailed_review.Other: I chose computer science and engineering because this course has the best infrastructure for the computer science and engineering branch. It also has the best faculty members and good placements.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Best place to get University life but dissatisfied with teaching dependency.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are going on average. Most of the students placed are from ECE, Civil, and Mechanical engineering departments. From Computer Science and Engineering, less than 10% of students were placed. We are expecting some more recruitments to occur in the future.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college is spread over an area of 600 acres and there are 6 departments: Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Electrical and Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, and Chemical Engineering. The library is too good and we can find peace of mind there. The auditorium is an architectural marvel.
detailed_review.Faculty: The course curriculum includes all the subjects required to make a student eligible for their respective industrial work. Teachers are well-qualified and interactable with students. Exams are simple to get qualified marks, but it's difficult to get distinction marks. There will be two mid-term exams, each of 40 marks, and the semester exam is conducted for 60 marks.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Other than good placements, good opportunities are also being provided here.

detailed_review.Placements: We have a percentage of over 70 percent where we have been placed in campus placements. The average package is like 4 LPA. We have companies like Fantics, Cognizant, Accenture, etc. We students have the chance to apply for internships with companies like Tech Mahindra, TCS, Infosys, and Wipro.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Yes, we have the facilities of labs, Wi-Fi, and classrooms. It's quite good to get a seat in this college. Here, we have almost all the possibilities which a college must provide. So, we are grateful to have this course, Computer Science and Engineering.
detailed_review.Faculty: Yes, the teachers are helpful. They even have PhDs, and their teaching is quite good when compared to any other universities. The teaching helps us to learn more about the techniques and programs. The process they are following here is also good for our future practice.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with faculty, good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: 70 percent of students were placed in the Electronics and Communication Engineering course. The highest package is 4 Lacs per annum. Top companies are HCL, TCS, Wipro, Cap Gemini, and Tech Mahindra. More than 80 percent of students got internships in TCS, Wipro, and HCL. Top roles are web developer and app developer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is average, and there is no air conditioning in classrooms. The library is good, full of books. There is no proper equipment in labs. There are two canteens in the university. The food in the mess is average. There is one health center in the university.
detailed_review.Faculty: There are highly qualified teachers. All are PG holders. They are very interactive with students. In the future, there will be a huge number of jobs related to our course. There will be two semesters every year. The pass percentage is about 85%. We can pass in examinations.
detailed_review.Other: In the future, there will be more vacancies in the semiconductor industry. So it will be helpful for us. We can learn some software-related languages also in this course. The campus is very good with greenery. Rhapsody is the fest that will be held once a year for 3 days.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Future for students in placements .

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, the students getting a rank below 10k will be placed. Most of the students are clever in this course. The highest package is around 12 LPA, and the lowest is 4 LPA. The top company was TCS. There is a lesser percentage of getting internships, so we have to try off-campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The course building is very old, and the department labs are there, but there is a lack of equipment to do practical experiments. Only Matlab is providing Wi-Fi; other labs don't have Wi-Fi facilities. The food is okay because it is good as per what we are paying for. We have daily eggs and omelets, except on Saturday.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are very good and student-friendly. The teaching quality is good for some teachers, and some teachers didn’t cover the entire syllabus—they just showed the PPT and completed the syllabus. The curriculum is not ready for industry purposes because of the lack of equipment in labs. Per semester, we have a total of 2 mid-exams. The highest mid marks are considered as 80 percent, and the lowest is 20 percent.
detailed_review.Other: We have a free campus because we don’t have any sections here. We only have one section for one branch, and all branch faculty take care of us. But in other colleges, one branch has a lot of sections with a huge crowd, and the faculty doesn’t see the students—they just leave them. We have a local scholarship scheme where the local government pays our tuition fee.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Do's and dont's of our college.

detailed_review.Placements: Emphasis, Cognizant and TCS are most likely to give jobs. This year we are getting a very low number of placements; till now we have gotten only one placement for our senior and that is from Emphasis, and his package is just 6 LPA. We are not getting satisfactory placements here.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our hostel, the bathrooms are not clean and there is some blockage of water. Hostel rooms are good but most of the fans are not working properly. But the environment is very good. Classes are digitalised but are not so good to listen to. Water pours down during heavy rain.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our teachers are very much qualified; most of them are professors. We have less pressure on academics. Our academic standards are so good. This curriculum is so much more relevant to studies. Semester exams are very difficult. Our teachers are also helping with the competitive exams.
detailed_review.Other: Our college is vast and there are so many grounds there to play and to improve physical fitness. We are also getting gym but roaming in college around nights is a little bit dangerous because of wild animals.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: A detailed review of our college.

detailed_review.Placements: From the 6th semester, students are eligible for placements. The number of students who are opting for placements is few because most of them are interested in cracking GATE, UPSC, CSE, IES, etc. Most of the students cracked government exams. The highest salary package offered is 12 LPA by Fanatics, Hyderabad.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure in our college is pretty good. It has decent labs and Wi-Fi. Every classroom is provided with a digital board. The library is very huge and contains every book that a student requires in their course. It has many journals. The hostel rooms are a bit disappointing, but the food served is good. Sports are also conducted every year.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty-to-student ratio is about 1:20, and their approach is also good. Faculty members play a key role here in developing the university to great heights and the semester exams are of moderate difficulty level. The course curriculum is designed perfectly for real-world applications. The pass percentage is approximately 85-90%.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this college because it is a government university and one of the best universities in our country. The college provides a great study environment, which makes us feel comfortable. There is no pressure from the faculty members. A tech fest is conducted once every 2 years, and other fests are conducted at frequent intervals.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: SVUCE: A Canvas of Dreams and Discover.

detailed_review.Placements: Last year, no companies came to our college. Out of 80 students, only 10 students were placed, and 10 to 20 members wanted to study for an M.Tech and also cracked the GATE entrance exam. In our branch, the studies are good, but companies are not coming here properly. But this year, companies are coming to our college. As of now, 3 companies have come to our college this year.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In our college and department, there is no Wi-Fi facility. The labs in our department are neither bad nor good. In the ECE department, only the classroom and 1 seminar hall are good; the rest are not good. The library is good. There are 2 libraries in our university: 1 university library and 1 B.Tech library. But our hostel infrastructure and food are the best. In our mess, the menu is also prepared by us, and we can change our mess menu every 3 months. There is no Wi-Fi in our hostel.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our department, there are 11 well-qualified professors, and their teaching skills are awesome. The courses in our curriculum are relevant to core-side jobs. The curriculum offered by our college is good and useful for our careers. The semesters are tough and made strict by our college faculty. The pass percentage in our department is nearly 80 to 90.
detailed_review.Other: I want to focus on my career in government-based jobs; I want to work in DRDO, ISRO, etc. The best thing about our course is that if you are interested, you will understand quickly, and if you do work on chips and other instruments, your interest will gradually increase. In our course, we want to do more lab work and gain practical experience; this is something that should be improved in all colleges. The events conducted by our department are: 1. Inaugural—this is for inviting freshers to our college and to our department, and this event is done by every department individually; 2. Department Activities (DA)—in this, seniors and juniors form a team and play games like volleyball, cricket, badminton, etc., and winners also get prizes in this event, and this event is done by every department individually; 3. Rhapsody—this event is conducted by all branches, and this event includes games, events, and other extracurricular activities, and every activity has some points. At last, whichever department gets the highest number of points wins the Rhapsody Cup, and M.Tech students are also included in this event; 4. Sigmoid—this is the national-level technical symposium of the Electronics and Communication Engineering branch, and I am proud to say that I am a student currently pursuing a B.Tech in the Electronics and Communication Engineering branch.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good choice for the preparation of M.Tech and other courses.

detailed_review.Placements: 60 percent of the students are placed in our Computer Science and Engineering course. The highest package is 18 lpa, the average package is 7 lpa, and the lowest package is 3.5 lpa. Accenture can recruit students from this college, and some companies visit alternate years.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are nice and clean. Digital classrooms are there. The hostel food is average. The hostel fee is value for the mess food. The library is very good and superb. The maintenance of the library is very good. Wi-Fi is available in the library. In the hostel, no Wi-Fi is available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Yes, teachers help students and they are knowledgeable. The teaching quality of the teachers is good. The curriculum is also nice. The exams are not that tough. The exams are conducted very strictly. The results take more time.
detailed_review.Other: This is the trending course nowadays, so I took it. The AI skills.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied because of good placements in 2019.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 70 percent of people were placed at the time. The highest package they offered is 10 LPA, and the least is 4 LPA. Top recruiters are CTS, TCS, and Wipro. They offered for junior engineer roles. Internships are offered for almost 60 percent, and we are truly blessed with placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is too good, and the labs we have here are some of the best in our state, and the lab technicians are highly talented and well-behaved people. Facilities in hostels are good, and food available in the canteen is too good. A medical facility is available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is very strict when it comes to academics, and they will conduct weekly assessments. Semester exams are difficult some times and good sometimes. The curriculum they provided is very helpful for us during exam time. Teachers are highly knowledgeable.
detailed_review.Other: Crowds in the classroom are moderate. Maximum 40 people are there in each class and event. The college fest is the biggest event, and scholarships will be provided 100 percent.

faqs.question: How can I get a seat at SVUCE Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Candidates are offered seat in SVUCE Tirupati BTech based on Andhra Pradesh EAMCET score whereas, GATE or Andhra Pradesh PGECET scores are considered for M.Tech admission. SVUCE has a total intake of 360 for BTech and 180 for MTech. Aspirants are alloted seat based on their entrance exam rank. Candidates need to bring the specified documents for verification at the time of admission.

faqs.question: What are the eligibility criteria at Sri Venkateswara University College of Engineering apart from national-level entrance exams?
faqs.answer: Sri Venkateswara University College of Engineering considers Class 12 score for UG and graduation for PG programmes. Aspirants need to meet the course-specific eligibility criteria as mentioned below:

faqs.question: Can students join Sri Venkateswara University College of Engineering directly without any entrance exam?
faqs.answer: No, candidates cannot get admission without qualifying entrance exam at SVUCE. The college considers Andhra Pradesh EAMCET score for admission to the BTech programme. The selection for M.Tech is based on GATE or Andhra Pradesh PGECET scores. Selected candidates are further called for counselling and seat allotment. Aspirants need to pay the course fee to confirm their seat in the college.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission to B.Tech at SVUCE?
faqs.answer: No, direct admission to B.Tech is not available at SVUCE. However, with the Tech lateral entry program, eligible applicants get admission directly into the program's second year. This is because the eligible candidates already have the basic foundational knowledge of the subject from their prior relevant qualifications and so they can directly start studying in the second year of the B.Tech. The eligibility is:

faqs.question: How can I get admission to B.Tech at SVUCE Tirupati?
faqs.answer: SVUCE Tirupati offers admission to BTech course based on Andhra Pradesh EAMCET score.  AP EAMCET is conducted by the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTU), Kakinada on behalf of the Andhra Pradesh State Council of Higher Education (APSCHE). It is a state-level entrance exam conducted once in a year in online mode. Aspirants once selected need to participate in counselling and seat allotment. Selected candidates need to pay the course fee to confirm their seat in the college.

faqs.question: What is the fee for B.Tech at SVUCE Tirupati?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for SVUCE Tirupati BTech ranges between INR 44,100 and INR 6 lakh . This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. Candidates need to pay the course fee at the time of admission to confirm their seat in the college. The total fee of SVUCE include examination, registration, tuition fee, caution deposit, etc.

faqs.question: What is the cutoff for B.Tech at SVUCE Tirupati?
faqs.answer: SVUCE Tirupati considers Andhra Pradesh EAMCET score for admission to BTech course. As per the Andhra Pradesh EAMCET Round 1 2024 cutoff, BTech in Computer Science and Engineering came out as the most competitive BTech specialisation with a closing rank of 3273 for the students belonging to the General category under the Home State quota. For the OBC category under the Home State quota, the Round 1 cutoff varied between 5214 and 86402.

faqs.question: How many students can do M Tech at Sri Venkateswara University College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: There are a total of 180 seats in M.Tech course of SVUCE Tirupati. The college offers seats to M.Tech aspirants based on their GATE or Andhra Pradesh PGECET score. Candidates must also fulfil the eligibility criteria to get admission in the college. Candidates who have been allotted seat in SVUCE need to pay the course fee to confirm their admission.

faqs.question: Is pursuing M.Tech at SVUCE expensive?
faqs.answer: The M.Tech at SVUCE, Tirupathi costs between INR 37,800 - 82,000. This cannot be considered expensive, comparing it with other colleges. The cost of living in Tirupati is also affordable. The education quality is good. Apart from that the college has a placement cell that helps students get the right job. The cell also provides students with training, lectures on career guidance, connections with alumni, mentorships, and industry-focused interaction programs. The highest package offered was INR 9 LPA and the lowest package offered was INR 4 LPA. Internships with good offers were also provided. Hence, pursuing an M.Tech is affordable at SVUCE, Tirupati.

faqs.question: Does SVUCE Tirupati offer scholarships?
faqs.answer: SVUCE students can apply for the Central Sector Scholarship for College and University Students offered by the government. Under this scheme,  82,000 fresh scholarships are offered every year to meritorious students.  tHe annual family income of the students must be up to INR 8 Lacs to apply for the scholarship.

faqs.question: What is the criteria to get scholarship at SVUCE Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Students pursuing a course from SVUCE can apply for Central Sector Scholarship for College and University Students. To avail the scholarship, the annual family income of the students must be up to INR 8 lakh. The applications for this scholarship is invited through the National Scholarship Portal.

faqs.question: What is the criteria to get scholarship at SVUCE Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Students pursuing a course from SVUCE can apply for Central Sector Scholarship for College and University Students. facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: The library, centrally situated and easily accessible to all the departments on the campus has steadily grown over the years and it has 38000 documents as on today. It includes textbooks, reference books, general books, gift books, reports, back volumes of Journals. The library subscribes to about 400 print journals of National and International importance and the library is a participating member of UGC INFONET Programme. Under this programme, the V-Sat facility to have access to Internet is installed in SVU Computer Centre. The INFLIBNET has provided 1 Gbps connectivity to institute. The Computer Centre has provided Internet connectivity to all the Departments/Institutions on the Campus.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: Hostels of S V U College of Engineering are located nearer to NCC building and SVU Press. Hostels have good scenic view of Tirumala Hills. S V U C E Hostels have following Four Blocks Viswakarma Block, Visweswara Block, Viswa Pragati Block (PG & Research Block), Viswateja Block.

college_info.college_name: St. Joseph's Institute of Technology: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: St. Joseph's Institute of Technology, is located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. Established in 2011, it is a private institute approved by AICTE. St. Joseph's Institute of Technology provides 10 UG and PG courses in 7 specialisations, namely Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering and Electronics & Communication Engineering. Theses programmes are offered in Full Time mode. B.E. / B.Tech and MBA/PGDM are some of the courses offered at St. Joseph's Institute of Technology. Some of the streams in which these courses are offered include Engineering and Business & Management Studies. The total fee at St. Joseph's Institute of Technology is INR 2,00,000. St. Joseph's Institute of Technology has a student intake of 990 for all the courses. The average median package at St. Joseph's Institute of Technology is INR 4,25,000. St. Joseph's Institute of Technology offers all the infrastructural facilities to students.

St. Joseph's Institute of Technology Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: For studies, my college is preferred. My college has more placements than other colleges.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 75% of students get placed. The highest package is 47 LPA, while the lowest package is 5 LPA. The average package is 6 LPA. Top companies like Cognizant, Amazon, Zoho, Accenture, Juspay, and Cadence hire students from my college and offer high salaries.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My college provides good support for sports. The quality of the hostel is nice. My college is very famous for its food. Medical support is available at any time. The hostel has a well-equipped gym. As I already said, my college has a basketball court and a badminton court to support students in sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers at my college have many years of experience and teach in an understandable format. More than 85% of students pass each semester.
detailed_review.Other: My course has more scope than other courses. Cultural activities are not encouraged much. My college has good infrastructure.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Impressive placements and facilities, but the curriculum lacks industry focus.

detailed_review.Placements: Some of the top recruiting companies are Infosys TCS Accenture Capgemini Cognizant and a few startups like Zoho and Freshworks. Internships were also offered to about 60 percent of the students, mostly through the placement cell and online training platform. Some companies that offered internships include Gradious, AICTE Internships, and Microsoft Learn Student Ambassadors. The top roles offered were data analyst, software developer, AI/ML intern, system engineer, and business analyst.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good and well-maintained. Labs are provided with a good PC and a built-in platform to practice. The lab is also air-conditioned. Classrooms are also neatly maintained. Classrooms are spacious, and we are also given a projector. The department lacks a good internet Connection.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are helpful and approachable, but the teaching style is mostly theoretical and lacks hands-on industrial exposure. Some teachers are experienced and knowledgeable, while others rely too much on PowerPoint slides. The curriculum covers core concepts of artificial intelligence and data science, but a few subjects feel outdated and need revision to match current industry demands. Exams are moderate in difficulty, and the questions are mostly from the syllabus. The pass percentage is usually high, around 85- 90%, but scoring distinction requires consistent preparation. Overall, the curriculum could be more practical and job-oriented.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: College Review-a good to go one.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement is quite good. There is a separate and dedicated cell for placements that is responsible for conducting placement preparation workshops to improve coding, technical skills, and communication. The average package is around 4 Lacs per annum.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is a huge library with over 2000 books from all genres, including references for competitive exams and technical books. The classroom is a separate block for 1st-year and other-year students. There is free Wi-Fi for hostel students with gym, medical, and proper canteen facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is very friendly and ready to help you at all times. The institution follows an autonomous curriculum that completely focuses on equipping skills to sustain in the industry. For every semester, 3 model exams are conducted along with co-curricular activities, with marks to be considered for internal marks.
detailed_review.Other: It is a green and Trinity campus. There are various sports opportunities and extracurricular activities conducted to encourage students and faculty. I chose Computer Science since I was keen on mathematics, and the food here is great with a balanced meal. There are various scholarships provided to students as a part of rewards every year.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: The total college fee is between 2,75,000 to 3,65,000.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 75% of IT and CSE course students were placed in companies. The lowest package is 3 lakh per annum, the average package is 7 lakh per annum, and the highest package is 18 lakh per annum. Avasoft, TCS, and Accenture are the companies that recruit our students the most. No internships are provided by our college; only interested students seek opportunities outside. Web development and data science are the top roles offered at our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All facilities are kind and good, with our department, classrooms, library, and labs meeting basic needs. The Wi-Fi in the hostel is not too good, but it's fine for the labs. The college is known for its food and placements. Additionally, discipline and other amenities like the canteen and medical facilities are basic; for other needs, we usually have to buy outside. Sports mainly focus on football, basketball, kabaddi, hockey, and ball badminton, as these games have more grounds in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Not all staff are great, but most are knowledgeable and have excellent teaching quality. Our college staff mostly align with relevant courses, and only a few help students with future placements. Semesters are sometimes easy and sometimes hard, depending on the paper, with a pass percentage of 45%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose ADS because of my brother, and I've learned a lot about new things. There’s nothing to improve; events and other activities are not impressive but are acceptable.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: The college is strict and will have decent placements.

detailed_review.Placements: The placement in this college is not great but good. In current final year, till now the highest package is 27 LPA, and note that only very very few can land there. The lowest package is 80 KPA. So it's purely based on how you make yourself prepared for interviews. The average salary will be like 5-6 LPA. The top recruiters are JUSTPAY, FEDERAL BANK, TCS, ZOHO, and AVASOFT.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good and pleasant. They provide Wi-Fi in labs, hostels, ideas, and innovation centers. The library is good and has a decent number of books. You can borrow books from the library for the semester exam preparation using a Bookbank card. One of the pros of this college is MESS. You will have to pay likely Rs. 1 lakh for food and transport. You can't avoid this fee. Whether you are a hostler or a scholar, you have to pay this. But will enjoy the good food. The sports are only for students who entered college by sports quota.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculties are average. They will tell you what to do. But few teachers are very good at concept explanations. The course curriculum is mostly relevant and makes students industry-ready. The semester exams are not too tough. You can easily get a 7.5 plus CGPA.
detailed_review.Other: Don't expect fests and events in this college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: High Placements, Exceptional Infrastructure and Culinary Delights!

detailed_review.Placements: Minimum 80 percentage of students got placed. The lowest package is 3LPA, average package is  7LPA and maximum package is 24LPA. Mostly students are placed in web development field. They give coding platform like skillrack free for gaining coding knowledge. They also give placement training in our campus. The companies are ZOHO,TCS,AVASOFT, INFOSYS and few other good companies. They also give Internship offers in our campus.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The labs, classroom, library all are maintained well. They also provide wifi in labs, hostel. The food is minimum, 6 days non-veg in a week. But they ask minimum 1lakh for food. This is the best college for infrastructure, food, hostel . In hostel, they give 4 students per room. Football, Basketball, Volleyball, Kabaddi, Cricket grounds are in the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty is good. They teach atleast 50 percentage of marks scored in exam. The course  curriculum is average and definitely it makes students ready for the industry. You will have three model exam and one model lab, it's taken by internals of semester exam. The passing percentage is 45 marks out of 100.
detailed_review.Other: I chose Artificial intelligence and Data Science course for future technology. In this course, you will be gaining more technical skill. Lot of events are scheduled like coding test ,out side faculty for good in those domain knowledge. The festivals are just okay.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: This college will be good if you are okay with rules and regulations!

detailed_review.Placements: St. Joseph's is one of the good colleges in Chennai—it's good but not great! The positives are actually the placement drive and food. When it comes to placements, they attracted more companies in the past, like during "2020." But now, due to regression, the placement drive is dull all over Tamil Nadu, I guess! Still, an average placement drive is provided by the college. If you have skills, you will be placed in a good company! The industry needs web development professionals nowadays. Many students have secured placements in this technology at this college. The top companies are TCS, AVASOFT, ZOHO, Federal Bank, and a few other good companies! Internships are not provided by the college; we need to search for internships on our own. I am doing Data Science, but it seems like very few are getting placed in that field. Many of the graduates are placed in web development. From 2020 to 2022, the placement percentage was 90%! But now, there has been a minor fall. As per the last year (2024) batch, 60% of students got placed! For the 2024 batch, the highest salary is 14 LPA, the average salary is 6 LPA, and the lowest salary is 3.2 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The labs, classrooms, library, and Wi-Fi are good. When it comes to the hostel, there are 4 students per room. The food is among the best in Tamil Nadu, but the fee is high as well! There is a dispensary in the college for medical emergencies, and sports facilities are available only for sports quota students. Don’t expect to play tournaments!
detailed_review.Faculty: The staff is average. The course curriculum is good and makes students industry-ready. It’s not difficult to pass the semester exams. You will have three internal exams and one internal lab, followed by a semester exam and semester lab. Overall, it’s a good experience.
detailed_review.Other: The events are limited! I chose Artificial Intelligence because I thought it was the future, but it looks like I have to rely on web development now.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Decent and good college for the students, but the placements are a disaster in the current year.

detailed_review.Placements: The passing percentage in this course 86.9%. The highest package offered is 49 LPA and the lowest package is 5LPA. Amazon, Tata, Zoho, and Wipro are the top companies offering the students roles of software engineer, which is the best. The ECE department has very high opportunities of placements and higher salary packages.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi and the classrooms are okay. It is a good place to study and work hard. There is a strict system for the college students. The staff is worse for people to get a clear understanding of the concepts. You could join this college for the food because it is the only good thing here.
detailed_review.Faculty: It has a good teaching staff. There is an autonomous curriculum with a good passing rate, but the exams are tough because of the external questions which are randomly asked subjects in the theory which makes the passing rate low. The teachers are quite close to the students, understand their needs and help them pass.
detailed_review.Other: ECE has the best placements rate. The course provides the correct amount of knowledge required for studying. Extracurricular activities are superb here.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Absolutely satisfied because of the faculty and good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: They play a major role in concentrating on both education and placement opportunities. It is a good place to study, where we gain more knowledge. 90% placement guarantee with a minimum package of 3 LPA to a minimum of 10 LPA. Top companies are coming to our college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I am really proud to study at St. Joseph Institute of Technology. The college infrastructure is really good and neat. Wife facilities are available in this college. Well-equipped labs. Classrooms are also very good. A library facility is also available. Toilets are also very neat and clean.
detailed_review.Faculty: The quality of teaching is perfect. The staff is highly experienced and ready to help us at anytime. Teaching qualities are also very good. The staff is good and friendly. Easy-to-clear model and semester exams. Pass mark percentage is 45%. If you get 67 out of 100 during model exams, you will get full internals during semester exams.
detailed_review.Other: The placement offices and the staff support us, and they put in their efforts to ensure that each and every student has a job in the end. I will ensure that it is a good place to start your career.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Good college to join with 100% placement guarantee.

detailed_review.Placements: 100% placement guarantee with a minimum package of 3 LPA to a maximum of 10 LPA. Top companies are coming to our college for recruitment. Excellent coaching for placement activities. 70% got internship offers in the 6th semester itself. One of the good colleges to complete a graduation with 100% placement.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facility and infrastructure are good in our college. Classrooms are well-maintained with good hygiene. The library is built with a large area where students help to gain knowledge and read all kinds of books regarding subjects and projects. Wi-Fi facility is also there for students to download subject-related books.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching quality is a plus point to join this college. Staff are well-educated with double degrees. All the staff working here are experienced individuals. Semester exams conducted in this college will have a very good procedure with proper monitoring of students' reports.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is a good college in terms of academics.

detailed_review.Placements: Every year, about 1000 students get placed in good companies like Zoho, Wipro, etc. The college has partnerships with Infosys, Zoho, Wipro, Tata, HCL, and others. The minimum salary package offered is 4 LPA and the maximum is 15 LPA. It depends on your CGPA and technical skills.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Labs in our college are not excellent. There aren't adequate chairs. The chairs are faulty. We aren't allowed to use phones, so we do not have access to Wi-Fi unless the staff permits. The Wi-Fi speed is quite average. The classrooms are spacious, but the benches are a bit small.
detailed_review.Faculty: The curriculum gets updated every year to make sure students are well versed in the latest developments in the industry. Teachers are excellent at teaching. They are very friendly and helpful. They have good communication skills. They make sure we are attentive in class. Semester exams are average. They ask direct questions. The pass percentage is usually about 70%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: I'm dissatisfied with faculty members and infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 1200 placements are provided in our college. Many of the students get placed in various roles. Top recruiting companies are Zoho, TCS, Infosys, and many other companies. Internships are provided according to the course and interest of the students. The top recruiting company for CSE is IBM.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities available in our college are vast. Students are not allowed to use mobile phones on campus. Food and transport facilities are compulsory under academic fees.
detailed_review.Faculty: Some teachers in our college are knowledgeable but some of them are bench passers. Teaching quality differs based on the teachers. The course curriculum doesn't make students industry ready so they have to learn some online courses to enhance their skills to get industry ready. It is an autonomous college since 2022 so the pass percentage is 70% to 80%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our institute provides good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Top companies like Zoho and Karl provide great placements with the highest salary packages of 25 LPA. We have great opportunities to get placed. They provide good preparation to get into companies, and you should be very determined in your studies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have a library with great books needed for our department. The hostel has Wi-Fi facilities and sports facilities. We have a cricket ground, a huge badminton court, and a volleyball court. The hostel food is good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Semester exams are easy as teachers provide study materials. Students can get high marks in the examinations by following the instructions of professors.
detailed_review.Other: The institution celebrates all the festivals irrespective of religion.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of St. Joseph's Institute of Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are good in this college. Placements offer start from 6th semester everyone will get placed in high package salary within the last semester. The top offers are from Paytm, HCL, and Soliton. Around 95% of students are placed in high package companies.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel infrastructure is good, each room provides 4 students with non-air-conditioner. It also has a non-air-conditioner room with an attached washroom with a heater and room will be cleaned. Our hostel has a separate room for internet connection, and students can use the internet on the laptop by ethernet cables, and the internet speed is 50 Mbps to 100 Mbps.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are polite and good. They allow students to attend more symptoms and compensation. The registration fees will be given from our college. This college follows Anna University syllabus, and it is easy to learn. Our college is trying to give better knowledge to the students by giving special training from outside.
detailed_review.Other: This college is good for those students who need better jobs.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of St. Joseph's Institute of Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 70% of students were placed. The top companies were Cognizant, TCS, Infosys, LTTS, Mahindra, Soliton, etc. The highest salary package offered was 12 LPA. The lowest salary package offered was 3.5 LPA. Internships were also offered to students by some of the companies. May start-up companies also came for placements and recruit students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It provides a building with all of the departments on each floor. The environment was very fresh. Hostels were convenient and more exclusive for students. A very big library was there with lots of knowledge. The laboratories provided were with advanced technology, and the students can easily learn things from them.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were helpful and friendly. Doubts can be cleared with them easily. This college was affiliated with the curriculum of Anna University. Thus the exams and the questions were based on the makers of the question paper. If students read properly, then they can clear the exams.
detailed_review.Other: It provides a good environment for students to learn great knowledge.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of St. Joseph's Institute of Technology.

detailed_review.Placements: The specialty of this college is a high level of placements. Several companies are visiting the campus for placements like Zoho Corporation, Wipro, Mindtree, Infosys, Cognizant Technology Services Verizon, and Newgen. Around 90% of the placed students are working as software developers in TCS.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Till 3-rd year, I was in our college hostel and the quality of food provided in the hostel is up to the mark. They serve both vegetarian and non-vegetarian food every day. For my convenience, I went out and stayed in Tambaram in the final year. Our classroom can accommodate 60 students and the course fee is 1.15 lacks.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty students ratio is 1:9 and the staff is well qualified and experienced in their respective fields. Everyday classes start with a unit test. Until passing we should write a test.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Facilities are awesome with student teacher bonding

detailed_review.Placements: In our college they give more importance to information technology jobs other than core varient jobs. But they provide more placement training skills to attend government jobs, core oriented jobs, and information technology jobs. We need to be considered roles while selecting a future jobs.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure wise our college is awesome but I will give only 3 star because inside there is no phone signal we need to search for phone signal to make a call. Library they provide both foreign and local author with dozens of book. In lab they provide good quality equipment.
detailed_review.Faculty: In our college facilities are awesome with student teacher bonding. In education wise they came till depth to teach students. For hostel students they provide extra class for studying purposes. In exam wise they make twice internal exam in a month they release marks in their portal and give us paper.
detailed_review.Other: If you need to get a good job choose this college if you want to enjoy your college life like movies please don't choose this college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is the best college with good infrastructure and excellent facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Every year our college provides a huge number of opportunities for students. I am 2019 passed out student, and from our batch, nearly 80% of the students got placed. The lowest salary package offered is nearly 2.5 LPA, and the highest salary package offered is nearly 12 LPA. Lots of top companies visit our college every year for placements. Cognizant, Infosys, Vibro and Mindtree play an important role in placements. Nearly 50% of the students get placed in these companies. Infosys and Cognizant offer internships to students who got placed. Nearly 50% of the students will attend internships in their 8th semester. Students will be really capable of balancing both internships and course. The top role is offered by Cognizant, and it was an associate role with a salary package of 6.5 LPA.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college provided the best in everything, and there is a pleasant atmosphere in the college. All classrooms are smart, and there are separate spacious labs for all departments. We have a library, conference halls and auditorium with Wi-Fi facilities. Our college is best in food as it provides high-quality food with hygienic standards. There is a huge variety of good quality food items in the canteen with affordable prices. Our college provides decent and neat hostels separately for both the genders. There are separate staff members to clean the hostel every week. There are separate grounds for all sports, and our college has a sports academy in which many students are trained every year.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college recruits most knowledgeable teachers. They all will have a minimum of post-graduation and maximum of PhD degrees. They are very friendly, and they teach many courses other than our syllabus. The course curriculum is really useful, and we gained a lot of knowledge.
detailed_review.Other: I loved to study the engineering course, so I have chosen the computer science department because I like to work in the IT industry. Computer science is really a good course, and we had a good syllabus. We gained lots of knowledge through our course.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: Placements and food are good here, but there is no enjoyment.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 85-90% of the students got selected. Average salary package is offered to the students. The top recruiting company of our college is Zoho. A good percentage of students got placed.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi will be available in our college, but students cannot use it. Classrooms are average, but the department is good. Labs are good in condition and neat. Students will always be coding if they are topper, and for academically average students, it will be difficult to continue with others. Capitation fees are very high. Bus and travelling facilities are in average condition. Extra sports activities are not conducted here. They only provide good food, and it is like a school. However, schools are better than this college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in our college are good at teaching and clearing doubts. Training is given to students to train them. There will be no enjoyments when you come to this college. If you want placements, then you can opt for this college. The most important thing about our college is to wear a tie.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this college because my parents said, and it provides good and hygienic food. But college life is like a school life. Cultural and college functions are not celebrated in a grand manner.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is the best college with good infrastructure. Teaching faculty members are very good.

detailed_review.Placements: Our college is the branch college of Jeppiaar Educational Trust. Our college was opened 3 years before, and our batch was the first batch of our college. There are around 120 students in the CSE department, and in that 80% of the students got placed. Students of our college got placed in good companies with a salary of Rs. 25,000 to 40,000 per month. Companies like Infosys, Cognizant, Ford, Bosch, etc., visited here for campus interviews. Software associate, junior developer and manager were some of the basic roles offered to the students. Some of the leading companies like Zoho also visited here and hired some of the talented students from coding irrespective of the students' backlogs and their percentage in their academics. Our college has provided many training sessions and many technical symposiums, events and communication improvement training for the students who studied in our college. In our college, almost 65 to 70% of the students got an internship from leading companies, and they also got paid for attending internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college has a peaceful environment with a lot of natural beauty, and our college infrastructure is very good as compared to other colleges in our state. Our college infrastructure is in such a way that it is engaged with nature, and it is surrounded by trees. The college is located in the main area of Chennai. The college has neat washrooms and other facilities. Our college has a huge mess hall, and they cook all the food items inside our own college mess hall. Food is prepared in a very hygienic manner, and the taste is very good as compared to the food provided by the other colleges.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers here were well-educated, and they are very helpful for students to make them understand every topic. They give individual care for each student in the class. The overall teaching quality is very good as compared to the other colleges. Staff members are very friendly, and they not only help students in studies but also teach good things about life.
detailed_review.Other: I have chosen this course because I had a passion for computers. I am very passionate about coding, and after completing my 12th standard, I was waiting for a good college where computer science department had very good lab facilities and a very clean environment.

faqs.question: How can I get into St. Joseph's Institute of Technology for UG/PG courses? Am I eligible for admission?
faqs.answer:
St. Joseph's Institute of Technology has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility B.E. / B.Tech Candidate must have passed VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. from schools situated in Tamil Nadu.
Tamil Nadu native candidate who have passed any of the VIII, IX, X, XI & XII Std. or their equivalent exam from schools situated outside Tamil Nadu can also apply. They should produce Original Nativity Certificate.
Children of Central Government Employees, irrespective of their nativity, provided their parents or guardians (only if both parents are not alive) have been serving in Tamil Nadu continuously for the past five years can be eligible to apply.
Sons & daughters of All India service Tamil Nadu cadre officers are eligible to apply. A Self declaration from the parent in this regard is to be produced.
Children of employees in the Public Sector or Government recognised institutions had been working in their organisations for the past five years are also eligible, irrespective of their domicile.
Other State candidates who have studied VIII, IX, X, XI and XII Std. in Tamil Nadu are eligible to apply. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

college_info.college_name: St. Joseph's College of Engineering: Admissions 2025, Courses, Fees, Eligibility, Placements

highlights.summary: St. Joseph's College of Engineering was established in 1994 in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. St. Joseph's College of Engineering is approved by AICTE and offers a total of 32 courses at UG and PG levels in 14 specialisations such as Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Information Technology and Mechanical Engineering. Furthermore, it offer courses such as B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and BBA in Full Time mode. St. Joseph's College of Engineering fee structure includes a total tuition fee ranging from INR 35,000 and 2,00,000. St. Joseph's College of Engineering has an annual seat intake of 1911 for all the programmes. It offers courses in streams such as Engineering and Business & Management Studies. The institute has a safe and well-equipped campus with all the advanced facilities.

college_info_program.intro: St. Joseph's College of Engineering offers various undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programmes. The courses provided by the institute include B.E/ BTech in nine specialisations, M.E/ MTech, MBA, and Integrated MBA. The institute also provides PhD courses in nine specialisations.
