Also, it is provided by the faculty itself, the faculty creates a group for each class to transfer information among the students. There is a lack of proper teaching by the faculty members, which I feel. No proper labs are conducted for student experience.
detailed_review.Other: The course I chose from this college is BCA. Other than this, there are a variety of other courses that you can apply to, along with specialisation in the field you want.

college_info.college_name: Uttaranchal University Admissions 2025: Application, Dates, Courses, Eligibility

admission.title: Uttaranchal University Admission Overview 2025
admission.overview_text: Uttaranchal University admission 2025 is both entrance and merit-based. The university offers a wide range of courses at undergraduate, postgraduate, and diploma levels. Uttaranchal University accepts relevant entrance exam scores to shortlist candidates for admission. For instance, admission to the BTech course is done based on the rank secured in JEE Main and for MBA , Uttaranchal University accepts MAT/ CAT /CMAT / XAT/ UU Entrance Test scores. Further, merit in the last qualifying exam is also considered for admission to courses, such as BA. Uttaranchal University courses are offered through its various constituent schools and institutes. The courses are offered in various areas of study such as Management , Engineering , Law , etc. Interested students can read the following article to learn all about the eligibility criteria, courses, and admission procedure of the university.

faqs.question: Is it hard to get into Uttaranchal University?
faqs.answer: Uttaranchal University offers several courses, admission to which are mostly entrance-based. With the limited number of seats and ever-increasing competition, Uttaranchal University admission chances vary depending on a lot of factors. Students need to appear for the entrance examination accepted by the university (if applicable) in addition to clearing the basic eligibility. Hence, yes, it might be slightly difficult to get into the university. However, with the right prep and strategy, one can get into the course of choice at Uttaranchal University.

faqs.question: Are there any BCom fee quota for at Uttaranchal University?
faqs.answer: Yes, Uttaranchal University follow state quota system for its BCom course. The univesity has Uttarakhand and All India quota system for their cousre fee. The fee vary across both the quotas. The quota also has categories under which the merit scholarships are offered as a fee waiver. Find the fee details of the first semester with category 3 (12th Aggregate% >=70.01 and <=80) type scholarship below: NOTE: The fee structure is taken from the official website. However, candidates are advise to reach out to the Uttranchall University's admission official for more details.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission in DPharma at Uttaranchal University?
faqs.answer: Yes, direct admission in DPharmais possible at Uttaranchal University. All you need is a valid qualification for the programme. As admission at the uniersity based on candidates performance in the last qualifying exam. Therefore, if you meet the eligibility criteria and provide the required documents and follow aptplication process you will get direct admission to DPharmaprogramme. The application proces involves submitting the registration form along with necessary documents to the University Admission Cell and paying the registration fee of INR 1,200. After successful registration, you will receive an email, and upon acceptance of the offer letter, you can proceed to pay your fees. It's important to note that the university reserves 40% of seats for students from Uttarakhand under the state quota, and the remaining seats are open to students from all over India. If you are applying under the Uttarakhand quota, a domicile certificate is necessary.

faqs.question: How can I get Admission in Uttaranchal University for BA LLB?
faqs.answer: In order to get admission in BA LLB at Uttarakhand University you need to pass the eligibility criteria i.e. Twelve years of School education with 45% aggregate. Also you need to appear for the qualifying exams CLAT, CUET, ULET. For more details related to BA LLB course click here .

faqs.question: Can I get admission in Uttaranchal University with 60% in Class 12?
faqs.answer: You may get into the univeristy with 60% in Class 12, however, this depends on several factors. Uttaranchal University UG admissions require students to pass Class 12 in a relevant stream and with specified aggregate. The aggregate usually ranges from 42% to 50% (based on the course and category). Hence, yes,  60% is certainly enough to clear that criteria. However, as admission to certain courses, such as BTech are done on an entrance basis, students need to provide scores obtained in the accepted exam to be eligible for admission. Students may connect with the admission desk of the university to learn more about the admission chances of the university.

faqs.question: What is the selection criteria for Uttaranchal University?
faqs.answer: Uttaranchal University selection criteria is mainly entrance-based. The university accepts both national-level entrance exams in addition to conducting its own exam. Further, for certain courses, such as BTech, MSc, students are also required to appear for the PI rounds conducted by the university. faqs.answer: The Uttaranchal University application fee for BCom is INR 1,200. Candidates applying online can pay the application fee via Credit Card/Debit Card/UPI/Internet Banking. For candidates appying offline the mode of payment can be Cash /Cheque /DD /Credit /Debit card /NEFT /RTGS /UPI.  Interested candidates must submit the Uttaranchal University application form along with the application fee before the deadline.

faqs.answer: The cost for BA LLB at Uttaranchal University is around INR 14.2 lakh. faqs.question: What is the fee for BSc in Uttaranchal University?
faqs.answer: Uttaranchal University BSc fee is range from INR 1.8 Lacs - INR 6.5 lakh . The fee might include multiple components which must be paid at the time of admission. Apart from the tuition fee, there is a one-time admission fee of amount INR 10,000 , and a hostel fee of amount INR 2.57 lakh that students are required to pay in addition to the tuition fee. To get admitted to Uttaranchal University BSc in English course, applicants must meet the eligibility criteria. faqs.question: Can we study BSc in Uttaranchal University?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can pursue BSc programme in Uttaranchal University. The University offers Bachelor of Science (BSc) in multiple specialisations such Agriculture, Agriculture, Microbiology, Microbiology, Chemistry, etc.. BSc admission is based on the candidate's performance in the last qualifying exam followed by an personal interview round conducted by the University. Also computed based on marks secured in NEET is also required for admission.  The programme is offered via the School of Liberal Arts and lasts for a duration of three years. However, BA honors programme takes a minimum of four years to complete.

faqs.question: What is the admission procedure at Uttaranchal University?
faqs.answer: The Uttaranchal University admisson process begins with the release of application forms. Candidates willing to apply can fill out the application form after meeting the course-specific eligibility criteria either through online or offline modes. After filling out the application form, the University will shortlist candidates based on the selection criteria. Uttaranchal University admission criteria for most of the courses is merit-based. For certain courses such as MBA and BTech, the admission criteria is entrance-based. The University accepts various national level entrance exams such as CAT, XAT, MAT, JEE Main etc. to shortlist candidates. For MBA admission, the University also conducts a personal interview round. After the selection process is completed, the University will issue a offer letter for selected candidates. The candidates have to accept that offer letter by paying the admission confirmation fee. On payment of the admission confirmation fees, selected candidates will be recieve and admission confirmation mail on their registered email ID.

faqs.question: What is the fees of BPharma in Uttaranchal University?

Apart from the tuition fee, there is a one-time admission fee of amount INR 10,000,  and a hostel fee of amount INR 3.42 lakh that students are required to pay in addition to the tuition fee. To get admitted to Uttaranchal University Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm.) course, applicants must meet the eligibility criteria, i.e., Class 12 with 60% aggregate from any recognised board (55% aggregate for SC/ST category).

faqs.question: What is the admission procedure at Uttaranchal University?
faqs.answer: The Uttaranchal University admisson process begins with the release of application forms. Candidates willing to apply can fill out the application form after meeting the course-specific eligibility criteria either through online or offline modes. After filling out the application form, the University will shortlist candidates based on the selection criteria. Uttaranchal University admission criteria for most of the courses is merit-based. For certain courses such as MBA and BTech, the admission criteria is entrance-based. The University accepts various national level entrance exams such as CAT, XAT, MAT, JEE Main etc. to shortlist candidates. For MBA admission, the University also conducts a personal interview round. After the selection process is completed, the University will issue a offer letter for selected candidates. The candidates have to accept that offer letter by paying the admission confirmation fee. On payment of the admission confirmation fees, selected candidates will be recieve and admission confirmation mail on their registered email ID. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

The season had more than 750 recruiters that hired students from the campus. Additionally, over 2356 students have been placed during the current placement drive and recorded an 80% placement rate . Major recruiters such as Microsoft, Adobe and Google , etc. were part of the Uttaranchal University placements 2025.

A total of 162 drives were conducted during Uttaranchal University placements 2023. Google, Nutanix, and Virtusa Consulting Services Pvt. sections.heading: Introduction
text: Uttaranchal University offers students modern amenities and state-of-the-art infrastructure. The campus amenities include classrooms, a library, conference rooms, an auditorium, convenience stores, ATMs, a sports complex, and health services. The university has hostel facilities for students with separate hostels. Uttaranchal University Dehradun has well-developed laboratories with modern types of equipment to impart world-class teaching to the students.
For more information about Uttaranchal University check out the below video:

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: The Uttaranchal University’s library holds a hybrid collection of 125000 books, 125 current periodicals, 1000 back volumes, 15 National newspapers, 1000+ e-journals and e-books of National / International societies  500+ dissertations and over 2500 CDs/DVDs.  The bibliographical details and content pages for all the books are accessible through OPAC. The Library has a collection of approximately 3500 clippings concerning to topics relevant to the academic community of the University. The Library has a multimedia section to access NPTEL video lectures on various subjects and topics.

facilities.name: Cafeteria
facilities.description: The University has set up an open-air joint ‘Nescafe’ which provides the delicious muffins, sandwiches, different flavours of coffee, soft drinks and the piping hot snacks. No-effort is spared to offer the best of the food. It has a comfortable seating arrangement and provides respite to the students after their gruelling academic schedule.

facilities.name: Hostel
facilities.description: The hostel of Uttaranchal University has a provision for the single room, double room, three bed and four-bedroom. Each room is furnished with bed/beds, mattress, study table, chair, cupboard and curtains. 4000 boys and girls can accommodate in the campus hostel. There are spacious lawns within the hostel campus for the students to play different games or to take walk or recreate themselves. Great care is taken to maintain hygienic conditions and cleanliness. Hostel common rooms are fully equipped with HD TV network, indoor games, newspapers and laundry staff. There is a separate group of hostel maintenance staff under the active supervision of the Chief Warden. The hostel offers many exciting experiences both in the terms of games and entertainment.

facilities.name: Shuttle Service
facilities.description: The University provides transport facility to its day scholars on nominal charges through its self-owned luxurious buses. The buses ply on different routes of the city to pick and drop the students from various areas. The students are spared the difficulty of commuting to the University by public transport. This also contributes to inculcating an element of punctuality among the students. There are separate buses plying for the staff.

data.description: Uttaranchal University appoints experienced and trained faculty members. The faculty are passionate and committed to helping the students in their career pathways. college_info.college_name: Vidya Jyothi Institute of Technology: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Vidya Jyothi Institute of Technology is a private institute, established in 1998 in Hyderabad, Telangana. Vidya Jyothi Institute of Technology is approved by AICTE and offers a total of 21 courses at UG and PG levels in 9 specialisations such as Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering and Electronics & Communication Engineering. Furthermore, it offer courses such as B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech and MBA/PGDM in Full Time mode. Vidya Jyothi Institute of Technology fee structure includes a total tuition fee ranging from INR 1,03,600 to 4,60,000. Vidya Jyothi Institute of Technology has an annual seat intake of 1287 for all the programmes. It offers courses, in streams such as Engineering and Business & Management Studies. As per the recent Vidya Jyothi Institute of Technology placement records, the average median salary at the Institute is around INR 3,93,850. The institute has a safe and well-equipped campus with all the advanced facilities.

reviews.course: B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure and campus life and good faculty support but limited placement opportunities.

detailed_review.Placements: Good placements. 8 CGPA. The lowest package 5 LPA and the highest 20 LPA. VJIT’s placements are decent but moderate compared to top-tier colleges. Students with solid skills often secure better packages, especially IT roles. Average packages cluster around 4 to 5 LPA, while few students secure higher offers up to 10 to 12 LPA or more.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Hostel facilities are good, neat, and clean. Library, classrooms, Wi-Fi, and ACs available. Spacious, well-laid campus. VJIT sits on a 10+ acre green campus with landscaped grounds and modern academic buildings. Infrastructure is good to above average for academic support, practical learning, recreation, and student services.
detailed_review.Faculty: Exams are conducted on course weekends. Pass percentage 5 points above. Many faculty members are experienced and hold relevant qualifications. Several are supportive and approachable. Exams are usually conducted twice a year, regular and supplementary exams.
detailed_review.Other: Minimum 3 to 5k crowd. Fest will be going on.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Affordable course with supportive faculty and active campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 65-70% of students in my course got placed. The highest package was about 8- 9 LPA, the average stayed near 3.5- 4 LPA, and the lowest was around 2.5 LPA. Recruiters included TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Teach Mahindra, Capgemini and a few startups. Nearly 40% of students got internships from companies like BSNL, TCS iON and local IT firms. The common roles offered were Software Trainee, Embedded Intern, QA Analyst and Network Support Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: My department had decent Wi-Fi, well-maintained labs, and classrooms with projectors. The library was helpful for reference books and quiet study. The hostel facilities were average but manageable, with regular cleaning and basic amenities. Mess food was simple and sometimes repetitive, but the canteen offered better options. We had a small medical room for basic issues, and the campus had grounds for cricket, volleyball, and indoor games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of our faculty members were helpful and had good subject knowledge, especially in core electronics subjects. The teaching quality depended on the teacher, but overall it was satisfactory. The curriculum was updated with practical labs and project work, so it gave a decent foundation, though students had to put extra effort to become fully industry-ready. Semester exams are moderate. Neither too tough nor too easy. Anyone who studied regularly could clear them. The pass percentage in our course was generally above 85-90%.
detailed_review.Other: For me, the course was value for money because the fees were reasonable compared to the facilities and exposure we received. I chose B.Teach ECE (2021-25) because I wanted to learn both hardware and software. The best part was the practical labs and project opportunities, though I wish the department offered more industry-oriented workshops. Campus life was fairly active with cultural events, teach fests, and a friendly crowd. The campus surroundings were calm, and connectivity to the city was good. Scholarships were available, and there were enough extracurricular activities to stay involved.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good at academics poor at placements.

detailed_review.Placements: As I am from a computer science background. The number of placements this year has declined and till now only 30% of 2025 students got placed. I'm one of them. The average package this year is about 5 LPA. The highest package this year is 9 LPA. My friend got placed in HSBC. Top companies which visited this year are Cognizant, Infosys, HCL, and other companies are consultants.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: As our VJIT doesn't have any hostel. It is being now constructed. As far as our infrastructure is concerned, it's good with well-equipped classrooms and projectors. In each class, easily 100 students can sit at a time. We have spacious labs for every course.
detailed_review.Faculty: Not all teachers are highly qualified. Some of the faculty are well-qualified. They teach us every subject with complete practical knowledge which makes a person industry-ready. Some irrelevant subjects can be excluded. Our is an old curriculum. There were no new technologies when we were studying. Now, for freshers, they have been introduced to new technology as their subjects.
detailed_review.Other: I have opted for computer science and engineering and every subject that we're studying as part of our academics doesn't have labs. It is better to have labs because one can become industry-ready only if he has high technical knowledge along with practical knowledge.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college had the best faculty and staff, and there were many facilities as well.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 70 percent of students from our course got placed in campus placements in top companies. The highest package was 5.5 LPA, the average package was 3 LPA, and the lowest package was 2.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies included Foxconn, COULRYT, and 24/7 AI. Approximately 53 percent of students completed their internships in companies like Software IT Solutions and Arky Technology Pvt. Ltd. The top roles were Network Planning Engineer and Electronic Design Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college was absolutely satisfying for students. Facilities were very reasonable. Facilities included AC labs, seminar halls, a library, free Wi-Fi around the entire campus, and other resources. Facilities provided by the hostel were also great for students, with good and neat rooms and tasty food available in the canteen and mess at reasonable prices. Games like cricket, volleyball, and basketball were played regularly in the college. The medical facilities were available throughout the day.
detailed_review.Faculty: Absolutely, teachers were really helpful for students. They were highly qualified and very knowledgeable in their course. The teaching quality was excellent with a good way of explaining concepts. The course curriculum of our course was excellent, and everybody followed this curriculum because it made many students industry-ready. The semester exams in the college were not very tough, but we should never have taken the exams lightly. The pass percentage was also decent, with around 70 percent of the students passing the semester exams.
detailed_review.Other: The course had lots of advantages and opportunities in the future, so I chose this course. The best thing about my course was that it allowed me to learn new things every day. Improvements like better circuits and PCBs had to be brought into the laboratory. Student refreshment activities like fests, farewells, freshers’ parties, crowd meetings, tours, and concerts were conducted in the college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I literally loved this college because of faculty members and staff.

detailed_review.Placements: The placements were excellent in our college from our course. Approximately 73 percent of the students got placed in the campus placements. The highest package was 7 LPA, the average package was 5 LPA, and the lowest package was 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies like TCS, Wipro, and Accenture participated. Approximately 67 percent of the students received their internship certificates from our course. The top roles included software development and code development.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure and facilities were really satisfactory for students at reasonable prices. Facilities included separate blocks for different branches, AC classrooms, library, free Wi-Fi across the campus, auditorium, and seminar halls. The mess and canteen food were excellent with decent prices. Medical services were also good. Professional doctors available. Sports and games were conducted every weekend, with sports meets organized regularly.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty and their teaching quality were excellent throughout the academics. They were highly qualified and knowledgeable in their course. The curriculum especially gave the best results in making students industry-ready. The semester exams were very easy to clear. The pass percentage was around 75 from our course.
detailed_review.Other: This course had the best opportunities for students, so I chose this course. The betterments I wished, like increasing the industrial visits, would have been great. The events like cultural activities, fests, farewells, freshers’ parties, crowd meetings, tours, and concerts were the best entertainment for the students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Coming to placements, most of the offered roles are sales-related compared to technical roles.

detailed_review.Placements: Around 35-45% of students are placed in our course. The highest salary package offered is 6.5 LPA. The average salary package offered is 4.5 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is 2.25 LPA. Most of the recruiting companies are start-ups. Top recruiting companies this year are Cognizant, HCL, PwC, Concentrix, etc. Around 40% of students got internships. Some are placed in companies like MAQ, Kyndryl, Qspiders, Planetspark, Sutherland, etc. Most of the roles in our course are sales roles and some are tech-related roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The overall facilities and infrastructure available in our course are good. Until now, we do not have any college hostel. Now they are constructing beside the college. The quality of the food in the canteen is okay. Our college encourages every student in sports and games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members and their teaching knowledge are overall good. Most of the faculty members are PhD and M.Tech holders. The course curriculum is relevant to the industry. Semester exams are difficult but not that much if the students are well prepared. The passing percentage is 60-75%.
detailed_review.Other: The college encourages events, fests, campus crowds, connectivity, activity clubs, technical events, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college is very good for educational purposes, encourages students to explore their interests.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are very good in our college. Our college grants permission for every event. It provides placements every year with an average of 5 LPA. Our college starts guidance from 2nd year itself.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college is good in terms of infrastructure. Our college provides very good labs which help in improving the practical knowledge of students. It also provides Wi-Fi facilities to us. Mess food is just like home food. Security guards will be there to monitor it.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our college provides very good faculty members in terms of knowledge and experience as well. The most experienced faculty member has an average of 10 years of experience. They guide us very well. Lab in charge guides us in a very neat manner in such a way that every student can understand everything.
detailed_review.Other: Our college is very good at cultural activities as well.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: A good, healthy environment for studies and overall growth.

detailed_review.Placements: I am pursuing B.Teach from this college. Most leaf placements are above average, showing that most placements that year were above 8 Lacs per annum. About 65% of the students are placed based on their scores. The roles that are offered by the companies are also good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities and infrastructure department is no doubt outstanding, because the facilities are above average. After all, there are automatic machines for coffee and water. There is a proper ground for spending time with friends and completing assignments.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members provided by the college are extremely excellent. Mostly, teachers are very educated in their subjects and have a proper understanding of every topic. They always provide good notes and dpps. Teachers come regularly and take regular classes.
detailed_review.Other: The connectivity should be improved because there is no Wi-Fi available for the students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Collegw is good and you can study well.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements are good and every year companies will come and recruit the students. The highest package is 24 Lacs per annum and the lowest is 4 Lacs per annum. 70 percent members will place every year. Companies which come to our college are tcs, techmahendra etc. Many of them even get internships also.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the college is good and all the facilities are available. Wi-Fi is also good and even the students can avail this. Labs are also filled with full of equipments and the lab assistants are also fully skilled. Mess is also good. There is medical facilities available in college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are also good and they are skilled. They will good and students can understand by their lecture. The exams which they conduct are not so easy and not so hard. There are two minds for semester and finally they will appear for the final exams.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I loved this college for placements and good facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 70% of our students got placed through campus placements in top companies. The highest salary offered is 5.5 LPA, and the average package is 3 LPA. The lowest package is 2.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course include Foxconn, Coulryt, and 24/7.ai. About 53% of students completed internships at companies such as Software IT Solutions and Arky Technology Pvt. Ltd. Students get selected for roles like network planning engineer and electronic design engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college also provides good facilities, which include a spacious library, free Wi-Fi points, an assembly hall, seminar rooms, a project work station, and a waiting lounge within an indoor suite, among others. Two categories of rooms are offered to students, such as air-conditioned and non-air-conditioned. The canteen and mess food are delicious and not very expensive. Medical assistance is readily available from a fully qualified doctor in the college medical room. There is no shortage of chances for physical activities, whether it is indoor sports or outdoor sports. Moreover, a sports meet is conducted every weekend.
detailed_review.Faculty: The instructors in our program are doing a fantastic job throughout the academic year, employing effective teaching methods to ensure that every student comprehends the material. The quality of instruction has been outstanding. Faculty members are well-informed and highly skilled in their subjects. Everyone appreciates the course curriculum, as it prepares many students to be ready for the industry. Semester exams are not as challenging as we might believe, but it is essential to grasp concepts thoroughly. The pass rate is approximately 65%.
detailed_review.Other: This course provides me with the best opportunities in various fields, so I chose this course. It should provide good equipment in the college laboratory, which will be great. Events like a farewell party, freshers party, crowd meetings, tours, concerts, etc., are great in college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: Good placements, supportive faculty members, and a vibrant campus life.

detailed_review.Placements: At VJIT, around 75-80% of eligible B.Tech students get placed, with packages ranging from 3 LPA to 10 LPA (average 4.8 LPA). Top recruiters include Cognizant, Deloitte, Infosys, TCS, PwC, HCL Tech, etc. About 40-60% of students secure internships at firms like IBM, MAQ, Kyndryl, mainly in software developer, analyst, and technical roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: VJIT offers Wi-Fi-enabled smart classrooms, well-equipped computers and subject-specific labs, a large central library with digital resources, and dedicated department libraries. Campus has hostels with decent rooms, 24X7 security, and basic amenities, with mess and canteen food rated as satisfactory by most students. It also provides medical facilities with a health center. It also has sports grounds, indoor games, and gym facilities for overall student's well-being.
detailed_review.Faculty: At VJIT, teachers are generally helpful, well-qualified, and knowledgeable, using a mixture of theory and practical examples to aid understanding. The curriculum follows JNTU guidelines, is updated with industry-relevant electives and projects, and includes internships to make students job-ready. Semester exams are moderately difficult, focusing on conceptual clarity, with a pass percentage usually above 85-90% for most courses.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course for its strong industry demand, practical learning opportunities, and diverse career options. The best parts are the supportive faculty members, good placement opportunities, and well-equipped labs. Improvements could be in curriculum flexibility, more industry-like workshops, and advanced lab equipment. VJIT hosts technical fests, cultural events, hackathons, and sports meets, with an active and friendly campus crowd. Campus is well-connected to the city, surrounded by a safe environment. It offers scholarships and extracurricular clubs that encourage overall development.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
reviews.review_title: It is good because of the infrastructure, and opportunities are given to students.

detailed_review.Placements: About 40-60% of students got placements in our college. The highest package is 24 LPA, and the lowest package is 6 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are Google, Flipkart, Amazon, Wipro, Infosys, etc. About 90% of students get internships with a stipend.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college is full of greenery and its climate is very pleasant, so that students can be attracted to this climate. The infrastructure of the college looks very good. Labs, classrooms, and the library have modern technology. The hostel work will be completed this year, so that the students who stay far away from college will not face any problems with accommodation. Medical and canteen facilities are available in our college. A very particular interest is given to sports. VJIT has the best team in all types of sports.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers who teach each subject are very helpful so that I can easily study subjects. The course curriculum is relevant, and it makes students ready for the industry and helps them get placed in companies. Semester exams are done very strictly, so that no one can cheat. About 80% of students pass exams.
detailed_review.Other: I have a particular interest in doing electrical and electronics engineering, so I chose it. If I work hard in B.Tech, then I can get a placement. Monthly, twice or thrice, students must be taken to the branch-related work areas. Events, fests, and cultural activities are held here.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: It has good education, but average placements may be due to the crisis in the West.

detailed_review.Placements: Mostly, about 40% of students got placements, but did not meet the students' related requirements. I meant to say that non-IT jobs are offered, but quite a few of them got offered in the IT as well. The highest package is 10 LPA, and the lowest package is 2.4 LPA. The average package is 3 LPA. Sutherland and BMW are top recruiting companies that offer non-IT roles. 10-15% of students got internships through our college. Software engineer and developer are the top roles offered to students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is too good. It has a good maintenance team that cleans every day at a scheduled time. It makes a place look good and hygienic. Wi-Fi is available all over the campus. Especially, every department has a separate outer, including the administration and library.
detailed_review.Faculty: Honesty, a few teachers have good knowledge about the subject. Other faculty members simply come and explain through PPTs, but not every faculty member does this. My opinion on this curriculum is that it is not up to the mark or outdated. It does not make us industry-ready. Exams are easy until we read and understand from our perceptions, so there is a similar experience of examination in our college. The pass ratio is good enough.
detailed_review.Other: I am pursuing B.Tech in Information Technology, but I am interested in Network and working as an IT professional. The best thing about my course is that I got to learn about the core languages. In this department, faculty members are supportive compared to the CSE branch. It regularly conducts hackathons and technical events, which may increase subject knowledge. It organises a lot of events and fests. The campus crowd is huge. Every month, we would have certain types of programs. Every year, a massive fest that engages a crowd.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: I love this college in terms of placements and facilities.

detailed_review.Placements: In my course, around 85% of students secured positions during campus recruitment, with the highest salaries ranging from 12 LPA to 14 LPA, while the lowest offered between 2 LPA and 3 LPA. The average salary stood between 5 LPA and 6 LPA. Leading recruitment firms include Cognizant, Capgemini, Accenture, Wipro, and Deloitte. About 80% of our students have internship certificates from companies like Capgemini, Accenture, and Cognizant. The primary roles involve research and development, as well as managing vendor relationships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There is Wi-Fi facility throughout the campus, a library for different branches of students, labs, seminar halls, auditorium, project labs, good ventilated classrooms with AC, etc. The facilities of the hostel are good and clean rooms with attached bathrooms, tasty food in the mess and canteen with reasonable prices, water facilities, etc. For the students, there are medical services available 24/7 and a qualified doctor with an ambulance facility. Every weekend, there are sports meet for both indoor and outdoor games.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teaching staff is doing an amazing job for the students. They are so humble towards the students and highly qualified in their course. The course curriculum of our course is the best case, as it is making many students ready for the industry. The semester exams are highly concept-based exams, and the pass percentage is around 72.3%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it provides me with the best opportunities and various choices in my career. I wish things like improving the standards of the laboratory would be great. The entertainment activities like musical night fests, farewells, freshers, crowd meetings, tours, concerts, festivals, etc., are excellent in the college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: You can go to this college only if your EAMCENT rank is low or if you are going for management seat.

detailed_review.Placements: 80%-90% of students got placed from this college. The highest package is around 24 LPA, the lowest package is around 2 LPA, and the average package in this college is around 6 LPA-7 LPA. Recruiting companies such as Microsoft, Accenture, Tata, etc. 35%-45% of students offered internship opportunities. CSE, ECE, EEE, and specializations in CSE are the top roles offered.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The facilities in this college are quite impressive. For every course, there is a certified faculty. The Wi-Fi of the college provides good and fast internet to compile code faster. Labs look quite impressive and professional. Classrooms provide ventilation to each class. There are multiple libraries that students can access easily. The main disappointment is that there is no hostel in this college. Though they are building it now, it may be completed in the year 2027. Every year, they conduct a sports fest. We play with other colleges and also among ourselves.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in this college are very helpful in sharing knowledge, irrespective of the college. They also give their personal number to contact and seek help from them at any time, which helps students during exam time and project submission. The courses provided in this college are completely designed for job purposes and future individual development. The semester exams in this college are not that tough. We can easily pass the exams. The pass percentage in the semester is around 85%-90%.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: This college was my favorite experience throughout my B.Tech journey.

detailed_review.Placements: In my graduation year of 2024, nearly 70% of students from our course got placed on campus. The salary packages were quite satisfactory for the students. The highest package reached around 7 LPA, while the lowest was approximately 3 LPA, with an average package of about 4 LPA. Leading companies such as Being, Civitas Innovation, and Larsen and Toubro were among the top recruiters. Approximately 80% of students from our course completed their internships. The principal roles filled included designing mechanical systems and testing.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There was Wi-Fi entire the campus, a library for different branches of students, labs, seminar halls, an auditorium, project labs, and well-ventilated classrooms with AC. The hostel facilities included good and clean rooms with attached bathrooms, tasty food in the mess, and a canteen with reasonable prices, as well as water facilities. Medical services were available 24/7 for the students, with a qualified doctor and ambulance facility. Every weekend, there was a sports meet for both indoor and outdoor games.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers were supportive of students. Many faculty had higher degrees such as PhDs and M.Tech. Some had experience with reputed companies. The teaching quality was excellent throughout the academics. The course curriculum provided great results in preparing students to be industry-ready. The final exams were not very tough to pass. They were well manageable. The pass percentage was around 92.5%.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it provided me with the best opportunities and various choices in my career. I wished that improvements in the standards of the laboratory would have been made. The entertainment activities like musical nights, fests, farewells, freshers’ meetings, tours, concerts, and festivals were excellent in the college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with my college.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 90% of students are placed in our college this year. The highest package is 20 LPA, and the lowest package is 3 LPA. The average package is 6 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are TCS, Salesforce, etc. 20% of students get internships. It offers fresher roles.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities are good enough wherever we work in the college. Wi-Fi is not allowed for students but is provided in labs when we're working. Classrooms are good and meet students' requirements. As per the hostellers, the hostel facilities are good too.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful. Almost all of them are skilled enough and they share great knowledge. The course curriculum is from the JNTU and exams are designed by them. They make students ready for exams. Semester exams are tested well and in mind too.
detailed_review.Other: I have always been interested in computer engineering. The best thing is that we work with the technology in systems. Events are conducted on some occasions. Fests are also conducted. The campus crowd is high. Surroundings are also effective. Scholarship benefits are available for eligible students. Extracurricular activities are conducted frequently testing skills of students.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: It's one of the good colleges in Hyderabad and has improved every year in terms of placements.

detailed_review.Placements: 75% of students got placed. The highest package is 20 LPA this year, the lowest package is 6 LPA, and the average is 7 LPA. The average placed percentage in history is 99% and top recruiting companies are TCS and Salesforce. The percentage of students who got internships is quite good.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: We have a very decent and upgraded infrastructure in the labs and classrooms. The food offered in the canteen is hygienic and fresh. I'm a non-hosteller and a semi-president. The sports are being conducted every year for annual days or events and there are prizes.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty are supportive in every aspect. The course curriculum is great. The semester exams are from the JNTU curriculum and the pass percentage is 35%. The difficulty of the semester end-exams is being calculated on the JNTU board. We're affiliated to that board.
detailed_review.Other: I have always interested in computer science since my childhood. Events are held on some occasions.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: I am satisfied with this college.

detailed_review.Placements: 40% of students get placed from our college in our course. Last year, the highest package in our college was 8 LPA. The average package was 4 LPA. Many companies visit the college to recruit students. Some of them are Infosys, Tata, etc. 50% of students get internships in our department.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: There are many facilities in our department. There are many labs and classrooms are neat and tidy. There is a huge library in our college. The environment of our college is excellent. But the only problem is there is no hostel in our college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful a lot. Teachers are M.Tech and PhD graduates. Semester exams are not difficult, and we cannot say that they are so easy. We can simply say that the exams are average. If we work hard, then we can score good marks.
detailed_review.Other: Data Science and AI are the trending courses nowadays. I am interested in taking data science, so I chose this course.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college has great faculty, good placements, and infrastructure and has cultural, social, and tec

detailed_review.Placements: The placement percentage in the civil department is nearly 50%. The highest package was 5 LPA in core and the lowest is 2.5 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Ultra Tech, JSW, DR. Fixit, Mahindra, Space India and many more. 60% of students got internships. The department also has a center of excellence for ultra tech.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: A separate block is given to the civil engineering department. Labs we have are AutoCAD, the strength of materials, hydraulics, geotechnical engineering, concrete technology, geology, surveying and geomatics, environment engineering, and concrete and highway materials. There is a department library and another 2 libraries in the college.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty in our department completed M.Teach and some of them are Ph.D. scholars. The curriculum we follow is JNTU. The college was autonomous the question paper correction was fair and 80% of students passed unless you are very poor in academics.

college_info.college_name: Vignan's Institute of Information Technology: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Vignan's Institute of Information Technology is a private institute, established in 2002 in Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh. Vignan's Institute of Information Technology is approved by AICTE and offers a total of 23 courses at UG and PG levels in 9 specialisations such as Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering and Electronics & Communication Engineering. Furthermore, it offer courses such as B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and MCA in Full Time mode. Vignan's Institute of Information Technology fee structure includes a total tuition fee ranging from INR 70,000 to 2,74,800. Vignan's Institute of Information Technology has an annual seat intake of 2886 for all the programmes. It offers courses, in streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. As per the recent Vignan's Institute of Information Technology placement records, the average median salary at the Institute is around INR 3,98,529. The institute has a safe and well-equipped campus with all the advanced facilities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: School. Faculty are LKG teachers.

detailed_review.Placements: You need to learn a lot of skills for placements, and the college won’t teach you them. I’ve seen people with good skills crack good jobs, and I would just say people should learn something and build something. It’s not always about a job, and Infosys hires many individuals here (I’m not sure they are going to be on the bench or working).
detailed_review.Infrastructure: I don’t know about the hostels and medical facilities, but other than that everything is good. The library is also good. If you are good at any sport, they will encourage you. The mess food is also very good and cheap. There is no Wi-Fi, and classrooms are decent.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members have great knowledge. Mostly, you will see a bunch of lecturers who seem like junior lecturers in intermediate in this school. Charging 2k for a semester seems like a scam to me. About exams, they are all good because they give revision hours.
detailed_review.Other: Fests are good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: According to education and infrastructure, the college is good and fine.

detailed_review.Placements: As for the passouts of 2025 that is the batch of 2021-2025, the placement percentage for CSE branch with respect to eligibility is 53 percent. The placed percentage with respect to total strength of CSE branch is 44 percent. The average salary package is 6.46 LPA for the CSE branch. Top recruiting companies for our course are Infosys and Cognizant. The lowest salary package is between 2.5 LPA to 3 LPA. The highest salary package is 36 LPA. One of the top roles offered is full-stack developer role.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College's best part could be the labs and the library as the infrastructure of the labs is very good which gives a very aesthetic view. About library, we can find the books which we want as they are categorized in a systematic manner. We can check the books which we need quickly whenever we want. About the hostel, Wi-Fi and classroom they are above average and are fine. The quality of the food available at the canteen and mess is good. The prices are reasonable too.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are all qualified, helpful, and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is between average and moderate but some faculty members are extraordinary. The course curriculum is relevant, and it does make students campus-ready for the placement with their guidelines. The semester exams are difficult, ranging from moderate to hard.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because I felt that the industry requires more students from this course and that could help me get a placement at a good company. The course offer is fine but some non-useful subjects are involved in this course and that should be checked and improved by keeping good and useful subjects. Campus surroundings, infrastructure, events, and fests are good and well-maintained.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence )
reviews.review_title: Finally, it is a good college.

detailed_review.Placements: Only 30 percent of overall students are selected in the campus placements. The highest package last year is 50 Lacs per annum, the least package is 3 Lacs per annum, and the average package is 4 Lacs per annum. Many MNCs like Amazon offer roles like testing engineer and data engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Coming to the infrastructure of my college, it is average; there are some limitations in infrastructure. Wi-Fi is not available for students; they do not give access to Wi-Fi. Coming to classrooms, they are average, the canteen is average, and there are no medical facilities in my college.
detailed_review.Faculty: Coming to teachers, they do not teach properly; they contribute partially to our studies. They are knowledgeable only partially. Coming to teaching quality, it is okay. The course curriculum is relevant, but no students are ready for the industry. Coming to semester examinations, they are moderate.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence )
reviews.review_title: Finally, it is a good college. You can join.

detailed_review.Placements: I think about 70 percent were placed. The highest, the lowest, and average are 10, 3, and 5 LPA. Mostly MNC companies like TCS, Infosys. 80 percent were selected for internships in MNC companies. Testing, back-end, front-end, ML, like that they offer jobs for students in my college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is not good at all. There is Wi-Fi in my college, but they do not give access for students to use. Classrooms are good, but there are no smart boards. Library facilities are okay. Students also utilize the library well. The food quality in the hostel is not good. No medical facilities. Sports and games are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are not as helpful as in other colleges. They are qualified, and the teaching quality is okay not bad at all. The course is curriculum-relevant, but students are not ready for the industry. There is an outdated syllabus in the college. Semester examinations are not difficult. They are moderate. The pass percentage is only 70 percent.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: I think the best choice is this college, and we have a beautiful future after completion of B.Tech.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students placed every year from civil engineering students is 60 percent. The highest package is 6 LPA - 9 LPA, and the lowest package is 2 LPA - 3 LPA between these high and low packages.  The best companies recruit skilled students. Every year 60 percent of the students get internships in civil course. The top roles offered by the companies are site manager and estimation manager.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In my college, many facilities are available for all students like good Wi-Fi, well-equipped laboratories, a big and peaceful library, and well-equipped digital classrooms. Hostel facilities are also available. It has good mess in hostels. There is a different menu for day by day items. We have beautiful playgrounds in our college for cricket, basketball, badminton, and kabaddi courts. We also have a beautiful canteen.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty is very helpful for students with their studies, and they are very much concerned about every student's future. The faculty members are highly talented and knowledgeable. Best thing about my civil faculty members is that they are well-experienced and practical. They have given quality education to students. Every curriculum that they have given us is very helpful to students. Semester exams are in the pattern of easy, moderate, and difficult.
detailed_review.Other: I am very much interested in civil engineering, and I like planning especially. The best thing about my college in my branch is well-equipped laboratories. There are many events held in my college and also extra curricular activities. The beautiful thing is that the college atmosphere and surroundings are greenery and look beautiful.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
reviews.review_title: Honest opinion on our college.

detailed_review.Placements: 80 percent will be placed by the end of their final year, the highest package is 37LPA, and the lowest is 3.6 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Infosys, alphastream, and matrix. 90 percent students get internships. Top roles offered are SDE, Full Stack developers, ML engineers, and Data analysts.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college facilities and infrastructure are good. We have laboratories for all the courses offered. Library has a wide range of collections. Hostel facilities are also good. We have a playground in the hostel too. Food in the canteen and mess is worth the money.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful and they provide their best insights. The course curriculum is relevant to the present industry needs. The semester exams are more concept-oriented, are of medium difficulty, and the pass percentage is around 80 to 90 percent. This college has one of the highest pass percentages in Andhra Pradesh.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: I am absolutely satisfied with the infrastructure and facilities provided by the university.

detailed_review.Placements: Almost 80% of students get placed in this course. The highest package is between 30 and 35 LPA, and the average package is around 6 LPA. Top recruiting companies like Amazon, Microsoft, Deloitte, and Wipro visit the campus to hire students. Around 60–70% of students receive internship offers at the end of the course.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: In terms of infrastructure, this college is good. They provide Wi-Fi during all working hours. All labs and the library are having air conditioning. Food quality is average, but they offer a variety of items. Medical facilities are available at all times.
detailed_review.Faculty: The college curriculum is similar to other colleges. But professors are knowledgeable and helpful. Some professors are less supportive. The difficulty of exams varies every semester. In some semesters, almost 90% of students pass, while in others, the pass percentage decreases.
detailed_review.Other: This is one of the best colleges after Andhra University. It offers cultural events, fests, and good sports facilities. I definitely suggest it to others.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence )
reviews.review_title: Placements are average, but teaching quality is worth it.

detailed_review.Placements: Coming to placements, 10-5 members out of 100 get placed in college placements. There is a low scope for placements in AI. Actually, there is no scope for AI-related jobs in my college. There is a huge demand for the CSE department students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is not good at all, and it is average. There are not enough classrooms for students. There is always shuffling. The canteen is okay, but the quality is not good. In the main canteen, there are two canteens in my college, and the hostel food quality is not good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in our college are well-qualified and knowledgeable. The teaching quality is average, but the procedure for conducting examinations is actually good. However, the course curriculum is not relevant to our present technologies. The syllabus is outdated, though semesters are tough. The pass percentage is good.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Satisfied with the faculty, infrastructure, facilities, and good placement offers.

detailed_review.Placements: Placement rate in Vignan College is approximately 60-70 percent. The average package ranges from 3.5-4 LPA. The highest package is 24 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are TCS, Wipro, Infosys, Amazon, Accenture, HCL, etc. The top roles offered are software, mechanism, helper, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: VIIT provides well-equipped laboratories, well-furnished classrooms, a library, and sports facilities. It provides separate hostels for both girls and boys. The infrastructure is good, but it lacks in some aspects in boys' hostels and food quality.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty members are very supportive but very strict towards students. They are knowledgeable and highly qualified lecturers. Exams in this college are in a very moderate to difficult range. The syllabus in this college is very easy and much less compared to other colleges.
detailed_review.Other: Different types of fests are held, like technical and cultural fests. In this college, sports and wellness programs are also hosted by the campus. The atmosphere is very nice as it is far away from the city's pollution.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: My perfect review about my college.

detailed_review.Placements: In our ECE course, 80 percent of students can be placed. The highest package is 18 LPA, the average package is 7 LPA, and the lowest package is 3.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies of our course are Infosys, Wipro, TCS. In our course, 60 percent of students got internships in Embedded Systems Trainees.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure is very good, and our facilities are also good, all are available. Our labs are very clean and perfect, and our library is big. We have pleasant classrooms. The hostel is also good, and the food quality is okay, available in the mess and canteen. We also have sports facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Our faculty is helpful, well-qualified, and knowledgeable. Their teaching is good, and they teach concepts that relate to our curriculum. They must make students industry-ready. Our semester exams are at a moderate level, and our pass percentage is above 80 percent.
detailed_review.Other: From my childhood, I was interested in this course because my father is an electrician, and I am interested in electronic devices. I wish they provide a more updated syllabus. Our college also conducts events, fests, and hackathons.

In our college, 60 percent of students have internships in Embedded Systems Trainees.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college and all faculty members are very good.

detailed_review.Placements: Good company placements are offered, and all faculty consider students and treat them very well. Many famous companies come to our college, offering packages of up to 50 LPA to the students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Healthy and clean hostels, labs, and classrooms are maintained very strictly. All students must follow the dress code and wear their ID cards. The library is available on campus and is kept very clean and quiet. Medical facilities are also available on our campus.

The pass percentage of students in those subjects tends to be lower. However, students clear these subjects in their supplementary exams. Faculty is mostly trained and dedicated to supporting the students.
detailed_review.Other: Everyone joins this college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering
reviews.review_title: Vignan's Institute of Information Technology offers quality and great technical education.

detailed_review.Placements: In our ECE department, around 71 percent of students got placed. The highest package is 8 LPA, with an average of 4 LPA. Top recruiters include Infosys, TCS, and NDMATRIX. Nearly 62 percent of secured internships are in reputed companies with roles in software, testing, and embedded domains.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The campus provides strong infrastructure with high-speed Wi-Fi, fully air-conditioned labs, and clean, well-maintained classrooms. The central library is Wi-Fi-enabled and spacious. The canteen and student store are also well-maintained, offering good facilities.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful, friendly, and some of the faculty have a very good knowledge and are very experienced and have done their Ph.D. at IITs and NITs. Semester exams are of a moderate to tough level. The mid and end examinations are conducted strictly, and the lab is also. The pass percentage is 75 percent.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Overall review of our college.

The highest package is 28 LPA in a recent year, and the lowest package is 3.25 LPA, with an average package of 4.95 LPA. The campus includes Amazon, Cisco, Infosys, and Wipro.

detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty members are helpful, well-qualified, and explain concepts clearly. The curriculum is updated and supports industry skills. Semester exams are moderate in difficulty, and students who attend regularly can easily pass with a good percentage.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course because it offers good opportunities in the IT field. The best part is the supportive faculty and campus environment. Fests, events, and extracurricular activities are active. The connectivity is good, but a more practical session would improve the course.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)
reviews.review_title: One of the best colleges in Andhra Pradesh with good facilities provided and good placements.

detailed_review.Placements: Really gets good placement opportunities compared to any other colleges in Andhra Pradesh. Above 200 people are selected by Infosys on an average package of 3 to 4LPA. We will have many hackathons clubs and extra activities to put up your interest and get deep into it.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: For girls hostel will be in college itself but for boys, the hostel will be at a distance of 4km from the college and the college will provide free bus transportation to hostel students. College will have a decent infrastructure which will sometimes disappoint us.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty will be very friendly as they will be able to talk in any language you are comfortable. They make people study and they motivate us to participate in different hackathons conducted in college. They support us to participate in hackathons or any other tech fests conducted in other colleges too.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: This is the best side and the worst side of Vignan.

detailed_review.Placements: 30 percent of students were placed. The highest package is around 30 LPA the lowest package offered is 3 LPA. 20 percent got internship. The idea cell of my campus has these types of things present in colleges. The top recruiting companies are Amazon, Google, Tech Mahindra, TCS, Accenture, and Infosys.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure has no words its mainpoint of my college. Hostel based on their habits and routine. The food has many varieties daily and is fresh. The hostel has no washing machine for students and it has no transport facility also and it is not price worth. The pricing is high that is 1Lakh.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty are good and supportive and some are qualified in the best colleges like AU. The curiculum is best and industry focused to get best jobs. The semester is difficult the pass percentage is 80 percent. The semester exam is more difficult depending on the faculty.
detailed_review.Other: I choose this course as it is the future Some more placement need to be improved. Events are excellent .

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Our college infrastructure is so good and decent with well-experienced faculty.

detailed_review.Placements:
Almost 80 per cent of students are placed from our college every year. 
Packages start from three LPA to seventy-two LPA, the highest based on the companies and students' skills. Artificial intelligence-based roles are offered in the course I have selected.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is so good and decent with well-experienced faculty, and apart from the studies canteen, labs, sports room, play grounds for volleyball, cricket, throwball, and indoor games. Activity clubs, seminar hall, and all are maintained clean and hygienic.
detailed_review.Faculty:
Teachers in our college are well-experienced and have knowledge about every subject. They were having a degree like PhDs and Master's, and gave important points for students' guidance. 
Per year, there will be 2 sem, weekly, miss. Internal and external exams are conducted.

faqs.question: What is the cutoff mark for Vignan's Institute of Information Technology?
faqs.answer: Vignan's Institute of Information Technology accepts AP EAMCET entrance exam scores, followed by its counselling process for admission to BTech courses. As per the APEAMCET 2023 cutoff, the last-round closing ranks ranged between 6061 and 64618 . Among all the BTech specialisations, Computer Science and Engineering was the most in-demand BTech specialisation to get admission at Vignan's Institute of Information Technology. Candidates can refer to the table below to view the AP EAMCET last-round cutoff trends over three years.

faqs.question: What is the cutoff of Vignan's Institute of Information Technology for 2024 admission?
faqs.answer: Vignan's Institute of Information Technology accepts APICET scores to shortlist candidates for the admission to MBA and MCA courses. Based on scores, the cutoff gets release. According to Vignan's Instiute of Information Technology cutoff 2024 , the MCA and MBA closing ranks stood at 11410 and 29758 for the General Home State category candidates. Likewise, for the OBC category, the cutoff was 6767 and 10201 under Home State category. faqs.question: What entrance exams are accepted by Vignans Institute of Information Technology for admission to MBA?
faqs.answer: The primary entrance exam for MBA admissions at Vignan's Institute of Information Technology (VIIT) is the AP ICET (Andhra Pradesh Integrated Common Entrance Test). Candidates wishing to be admitted into any of Andhra Pradesh's management programs must pass this exam. In addition, depending on certain requirements established by the institute, results from other pertinent national tests like the CAT, MAT, or XAT may also be taken into consideration for admission. It is recommended to visit the official VIIT website for the most recent changes.

college_info.college_name: Walchand College of Engineering: Courses, Fees, Admission 2025, Placements, Reviews

highlights.summary: Walchand College of Engineering, is located in Sangli, Maharashtra. Established in 1947, it is a public institute approved by AICTE. Walchand College of Engineering provides 30 UG, PG and After 10th courses in 14 specialisations, namely Civil Engineering, Computer Science Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Information Technology and Mechanical Engineering. Theses programmes are offered in both Full Time mode. B.E. / B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech and After 10th Diploma are some of the courses offered at Walchand College of Engineering. Some of the stream in which these courses are offered include Engineering. The total fee at Walchand College of Engineering ranges between INR 18,000 and 3,39,890. Walchand College of Engineering has a student intake of 890 for all the courses. The average median package at Walchand College of Engineering is INR 7,25,222. Walchand College of Engineering offers all the infrastructural facilities to students.
