college_info.college_name: WCE Fees 2026
Walchand College of Engineering Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Huge green campus, helpful seniors, no ragging, clubs, competition, and respectful students.

detailed_review.Placements: 80 percent of students get placed in college every year, and many of them opt for higher studies. Highest package is 19 LPA from applied materials, and lowest maybe around 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Applied Materials, Schneider Electric, Bosch, Ather, Adani Power, Honeywell, Burns and McDonnell.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available 24X7 in library, classrooms, hostels, study room, and on campus too. Labs are conducted in their respective departments. College has very big campus with separate departments and an academic complex for classes and theory lectures. In hostel, we have 4 sharing rooms and 2 shared rooms for NRI. There are playground, jogging track, a mess, and gym as well.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful, qualified, and knowledgeable. The course for every department is well structured which helps students develop their technical thinking. They help them to get industry ready. In every semester, with theory courses we have lab courses and some subjects for holistic development. Talking about exams, college has a relative grading system which sometimes creates difficulties for students to get a good GPA. However, if consistent and disciplined we can score good marks.

reviews.course: M.Tech. in Power System Engineering
reviews.review_title: My college placement section is better than private college.

detailed_review.Placements: As a student of Shri Ram College of Commerce, I would like to share that my college is better than a private institute. The percentage of students placed every year in my course department is very high compared to private colleges. The highest package is about 12 LPA at my college.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: As a student of Shri Ram College of Commerce, I would like to share that my college is better than a private Institute. The facilities and infrastructure available in my course department were like Wi-Fi. Classroom labs, ground, washrooms, etc., are very good according to the feedback taken from students.
detailed_review.Faculty: As a student of Shri Ram. College of Commerce, I would like to share that my college is better than a private institute. The teachers of the MU course department are very cooperative towards their students. The semester examinations are not that difficult for regular students of my college.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: All the facilities are good enough for a students holistic development.

detailed_review.Placements: 90 to 95 percent of students are placed. Top recruiters Schneider Electric Signify Cooper Lighting Solutions OneSubsea Real Rexnord Rather Energy Siemens Energy Technip Mahanagar Gas. Most of them are offered graduate engineer trainee roles in research and development supply chain management design engineering, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All the facilities are adequate. Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus including smart classrooms best library labs etc. Sports facilities are very good. Badminton court basketball court volleyball court kho kho, table tennis cricket ground football turf hockey Gym etc. Hostel and mess facilities are also good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are helpful qualified and knowledgeable and the teaching quality is excellent. The course curriculum is relevant and makes the students industry ready. Semester exams are moderately difficult. The pass percentage is good. Academics are very strong.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Walchand College of Engineering, Sangli.

detailed_review.Placements: B.Tech at Walchand College of Engineering Sangli is helpful because it's an autonomous college. We have good placement opportunities at present as well as in the future.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: It is excellent. It's structure is widely spread around 60 to 70 acres of land.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very helpful. Faculty is supporting the students to grasp the knowledge and build their strong foundation.
detailed_review.Other: Events and fests are well organised in proper manner.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Strong placements, especially in CS/IT, with a vibrant club culture and a massive campus.

detailed_review.Placements: Approximately 89.18 percent to 91.5 percent of eligible Mechanical Engineering students at WCE Sangli are placed in recent drives. The highest package is around 12 LPA–14 LPA, the average package is approximately 7.43 LPA, and the lowest package is around 3.5 LPA–5 LPA. Recruiters include a mix of core engineering firms and some IT/Consulting companies open to all branches, such as Atlas Copco, Siemens, Tata Motors, Dassault Syst, MS Bajaj Auto, Whirlpool, Schneider Electric, Eaton, Cooper Corporation, Mercedes Benz, L&T, Accenture, Infosys, TCS, and Wipro. Common roles offered to mechanical engineering graduates include graduate engineer trainee (GET), design engineer, quality assurance engineer, and analyst.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Walchand’s Mechanical department offers robust infrastructure with well-equipped labs (CNC, wind tunnel) and smart classrooms. A major campus highlight is the massive Ajit Gulabchand Central Library and campus-wide Wi-Fi. Hostel facilities receive mixed reviews, they provide basic amenities like Wi-Fi and 24/7 water, but hostel blocks are often considered average. Mess food is generally rated just "edible," leading many to prefer outside options, though on-campus canteens are popular. Sports infrastructure is excellent, featuring expensive cricket and football grounds, a synthetic badminton hall, and a gym. A basic medical dispensary is available on campus for first-aid needs.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty in the Mechanical department is generally well-regarded with a significant number of permanent staff holding PhDs from premier institutions like IITs and NITs. Senior professors are often praised for their deep knowledge and industry experience. However teaching quality can vary while some are excellent educators and others may rely on more traditional methods such as reading from slides. Consequently while good guidance is available, a strong culture of self-study is necessary for students to excel. The course curriculum is a major strength. As an autonomous institute, WCE frequently updates its syllabus.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Good infrastructure and greenery.

detailed_review.Placements: Percentage of students placed right now in Civil branch is 10 percent, and placement process for the remaining students is still processing. The rate of placement for last year 2024-25 is 90 percent. Packages are 10 LPA, 3 LPA, 6 LPA. Top recruiters included Shahapuri Pallonaji, Technip, Thornton Tomasetti, Torrent Power, Easa Salle Al Gurg. Roles offered are structural engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure:
Wi-Fi is available in the entire college campus. Classrooms are different for all branches. Library is available for students from 9 am to 9 pm. Different laboratories are available for different courses. Computer facility center is available for students, as well as mess, gym, and ground.
mess, gym, ground .
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are very knowledgeable, and teaching quality is also very good. Some courses in the curriculum are very relevant and useful for industry, and others are related to general topics like Law and Biology. Also, we are offered one open electives subject from another branch, which is useful for us. Difficult level is 4.5/5. Passing percentage is 40 percent.
detailed_review.Other: No.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: High package last year by one CS student, that is 1.5 CPA by Rubrik.

detailed_review.Placements: About 85 to 90 percent of students are placed. Some have good packages and got placed in well companies. The students worked hard. I think the college has a good level of placement ratio. I have seen 48 LPA, no idea about the lowest. I have seen many students in good placements.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms are good. Wi-Fi full access is given with individual password and ID. We have the biggest library, very good clear and studious atmosphere. Hostels are good but old infrastructure, they are making it very strict. Gym is good, food quality is not that good.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers are qualified and knowledgeable. They are good for just being a professor; some are not helpful, yes I think so. This makes them industry ready and provides what is required. This makes students more confident in interviews and placement drives. The semester exams are moderate to score, average easy if we just have to pass. Best, we have to score 40 out of 100 including 20 from end-semester exam, else you are failed.
detailed_review.Other: I want this course as passion. The events are epic. Student clubs give their all. The events are good and very good. Slightly crowded now as numbers have increased from previous year. There are scholarships from Maharashtra government. Students have done and given their best in extracurricular activities.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Walchand College of Engineering, Sangli (est. 1947) is an autonomous institute.

detailed_review.Placements: Walchand College of Engineering has about an 80 percent placement rate. Top recruiters include Amazon, Microsoft, and TCS. The highest package is around 60 LPA, with an average of 9 LPA-10 LPA, mainly strong in CSE and IT branches.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Walchand College of Engineering offers B.Tech, M.Tech, and Ph.D. courses in branches like Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, Computer, and IT. The campus has separate boys' and girls. Hostels with Wi-Fi, mess, and study facilities at reasonable annual fees.
detailed_review.Faculty: The faculty of engineering focuses on applying science and technology to design, build, and improve systems, machines, and structures. It includes branches like civil, mechanical, electrical, and computer engineering. WCE Sangli has qualified faculty with M.Tech. and Ph.D. degrees. Exams include internal tests (ISE/MSE) and end-semester exams (ESE). Labs have a separate evaluation, and the overall assessment is fair and well-structured.
detailed_review.Other: Information Technology (IT) deals with computers, software, and networks to manage data and systems. It offers careers in programming, cybersecurity, and data management.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Great campus life with good placements and supportive faculty. Worth the experience.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements in our college are decent especially for the IT and CS branches. Most students from these branches get placed while core branches like mechanical or civil have a bit fewer opportunities. The average package is around 6 LPA - 7 LPA, and the highest can go above 30 LPA. Companies like Infosys, Siemens, TCS, Tech Mahindra, and Wipro visit the campus every year. College also provides good training and placement support before the drives which helps a lot during interviews.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is good with clean classrooms, well-equipped labs, and decent Wi-Fi. Hostel rooms are okay and the environment is peaceful. Mess food is average but fine for daily use but it is only for hostellers. Overall a good place to study and live.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are quite helpful and knowledgeable. Most of them explain concepts clearly and are approachable after class. The curriculum is updated and relevant to current industry needs especially for IT and CS. Semester exams are moderate, not too hard if you study regularly. The pass percentage is also good and internal marks help maintain grades.
detailed_review.Other: Fees are reasonable compared to the facilities and placements we get. Definitely worth it for the quality of education and campus. Campus life is amazing. There are a decent number of fests, events, and clubs where you can explore your interests. The overall vibe is energetic and fun.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: WCE: The underrated engineering college in Maharashtra.

detailed_review.Placements: More than 85% of students are placed from the Information and Technology branch. The highest package is 60 LPA, and the lowest is 3.5 LPA. Although college decided not to allow companies to offer less than 4 LPA. Oracle, Nice, and IBM are the top recruiters. Uber, Google, and Amazon also offered internships and PPOs to students.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All required facilities are available in hostels, such as filtered drinking water, fresh water, and 24/7 neat and clean washrooms. All necessary working labs are available there with the proper working electronics required for the course. Wi-Fi is available throughout the campus.
detailed_review.Faculty: Many professors and assistant professors have a Ph.D. in any particular subject, but some are yet to complete their Ph.D. Still, we can say that faculty members can be improved. Some faculty members are passouts of this college itself. But here, mostly faculty members have positive experiences of teaching.
detailed_review.Other: College has a nature-friendly environment with lots of greenery spread with old aesthetics.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology
reviews.review_title: Hidden Gem of Maharashtra: Outstanding placements and excellent event culture - WCE Sangli.

detailed_review.Placements: 80 percent is the placement rate. Talking about a specific branch like CSE/IT, it is 80-85 percent. The highest package till now is offered by Rubrik to 1 CSE student of 1.5cr, the lowest is 3 LPA-4 LPA, and the average is 7 LPA-8 LPA. Over 100-110 companies visited, with 450-500 offers, names include Rubrik, CRED, Google, Deutsche Bank, Siemens, Bizom, Connectwise, IBM, Oracle, etc. 50-60 percent secure paid internship, companies offering internships include Google, Siemens, IBM, Connectwise, UBS, Deutsche Bank, etc. Top roles offered in our course are SDE, full-stack developer, SE, ML engineer, system engineer, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Classrooms with a capacity of 60-70 students, clean, well-ventilated, equipped with digital boards/projectors, and all departments have dedicated lecture halls/seminar halls in separate buildings. Department-wise advanced setup labs, overall quality is excellent for academic needs. Hostel quality is average to good. Clean, Wi-Fi-enabled, basic amenities. Mess and canteen food quality has mixed reviews, hygienic/nutritious but average in taste. Two messes. Medical facilities include an on-campus health center/ dispensary for first aid. Sports and games are excellent, and there are large playgrounds.
detailed_review.Faculty: Faculty at WCE Sangli are generally highly qualified, over 80 percent hold PhDs/M. Tech from reputed institutions like IITs with 10-20 years of experience. The B.Tech curriculum at WCE is an autonomous, choice-based credit system with track-based electives. End semester 50 marks, mid sem 30 marks, ISE 30 marks, making up a total of 100 marks. Difficult is moderate.
detailed_review.Other: I chose B.Tech IT at WCE primarily for its outstanding placement record, even from a tier 2 city like Sangli. The best things about my course are placements and industry readiness, obviously, campus and vibe, and faculty and autonomy. Things I wish would be better are location and exposure, infrastructure upgrades, admin and non-teaching staff, and core branch focus. Events and fests are extremely big club culture, and exciting events and auto expo shows, Mr. and Ms. Walchand like fashion show, bodybuilding competitions, etc.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Great campus life, good placements, and supportive faculty.

detailed_review.Placements: I am part of the B.Teach (CSE) batch of 2028. Around 80 percent of students from our course got placed. The highest package offered is around 12 LPA, the average is 5 LPA, and the lowest is 3 LPA. Top recruiting companies are TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Capgemini, and Deloitte. About 60 percent of students also secured internships in reputed firms like Amazon, TCS, and local startups. The top roles offered are Software Developer, Analyst, and Associate Engineer.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college provides excellent Wi-Fi connectivity, well-equipped computer labs, smart classrooms, and a large central library with access to digital journals. The hostel rooms are spacious and well-maintained with 24/7 water and electricity. The mess food is decent and hygienic. There are separate facilities for sports, gym, and medical care. The canteen food is affordable and offers multiple cuisines.
detailed_review.Faculty: Most of the faculty members are highly qualified and approachable. They help students with projects, research, and placements. The curriculum is regularly updated to match industry trends with added focus on AI, Data Science, and Cloud Computing. Semester exams are of moderate difficulty and the pass percentage remains high due to consistent internal evaluation and support from teachers.
detailed_review.Other: Considering the quality of teaching, infrastructure, and placement opportunities, the college offers good value for money. The total fees for the course are around Rs. 6,00,000, including tuition, hostel, and other facilities. I chose this course because of my interest in technology and the college's strong placement record. The best part is the supportive faculty and hands-on learning environment. It would be even better if the placement cell collaborated with more product-based companies.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: The college is great for engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: The college has a strong placement record involving names like Amazon and Rubrik. The average is 13-15 LPA, and the core branches' average is 5-8 LPA, including branches like electrical, mechanical, and civil engineering, where the college attracts good companies and helps with jobs and internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The hostel here is very small. The rooms are very small, and everyone has to share one common washroom for activities like bathing and using restrooms. Also, not all first-year students get a hostel as intake in college is more than the hostel capacity. The college also has an ID scanner; whenever you go out, you have to scan your ID.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are well qualified, as everyone has done their master's from good colleges and has good teaching experience. The curriculum is relevant and adequate for the industry level. The exams are tough, but the question bank given is enough for the exam.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: College is good. Placements are okay, but I recommend this college.

detailed_review.Placements: The percentage of students placed is 60% The highest package is approximately 20 LPA. The lowest package is 11 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Tata, Blinkit, Honda, Mahindra, and so on. The percentage of students who secured internships is 40% to 55%. The roles offered are HR, marketing, web developer, bug reporter, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The college building and the infrastructure are very good. The environment is best for studying in a college that provides a canteen, library, computer lab, Wi-Fi campus with 5G speed. The quality of hostel food is okay to eat, and the water supply is also very good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are outstanding, they teach us in a very innovative way. The curriculum is very innovative and related to jobs, and it makes students industry-ready. Semester exams are not easy to understand.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this college because it is very good and the city is very near to me.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Walchand College of Engineering by Akshy Patil.

detailed_review.Placements: A good percentage of students got placements from my college. The highest package offered to a student in my course was 17 LPA, and the average package was 3 LPA. Many top recruiting companies hired students in my course. The percentage of students who got internships in this course was 80%.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Facilities available in my course were super. Wi-Fi, classrooms, and the library were available for all students. The quality provided in my course was very good. The food was tasty. Medical facilities were available. Sports and games were available.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers in my college were very helpful, and all were well qualified. They had great teaching qualities. This course was curriculum-relevant, and students were industry-ready. However, the semester exams were very difficult, and more than 50% of students failed and had to take a re-exam later in the year.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to gain knowledge. There was no specific stream in my course. Events and the campus crowd were super. Scholarships were available.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering
reviews.review_title: Campus life at WCE Sangli. This college has really good infrastructure.

detailed_review.Placements: 90% of students from my course are placed with good packages. This year's highest package offered is 52 LPA, and the average package is 9 LPA. Top recruiting companies that visit our campus for placement include Google, Microsoft, Siemens, Snyder, TATA, TCS, Nvidia, and many more. 70% of students secure internships in companies like Google, Microsoft, Siemens, L&T, Snyder, etc.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: The entire campus of 92 acres is provided with Wi-Fi connectivity. All the labs are well-equipped with advanced technology instruments. All the classrooms are fitted with digital boards and have good ventilation. A very large library is available on the college campus, which provides full access to all students with their ID cards. Purified water facilities are available throughout the campus. The hostel is provided with the necessary facilities, and the mess food quality is good. Three canteens are available on the campus, offering good cold and hot drinks and refreshments. All sports facilities are available for students free of charge.
detailed_review.Faculty: All teachers at my college are excellent educators. They have deep knowledge and understanding of their respective subjects. 75% of the faculty members at my college hold Ph.D. degrees. Our syllabus and course content are designed according to the New Education Policy (NEP). The course includes subjects that make students industry-ready. Exams conducted at my college range from moderate to difficult in level, and 80-90% of students pass the exams.
detailed_review.Other: I choose this college because of its legacy and campus placements. In my opinion, no improvements are needed in the college campus or course content. As for the events, many events are organized and celebrated in our college. Traditional, entertainment, technology, and art-related events are held where students can enjoy campus life. Caste scholarships are available in the college, and students can also apply for private scholarships.

reviews.course: Diploma in Civil Engineering
reviews.review_title: Overall, the college is really good.

detailed_review.Placements: Placements in 5th semester offer a pool campus at GP Karad. The package offered is 3 LPA. For diploma, there are not many students who really try to get placed. 90% of students do B. Tech and placements are really good for B.Tech course and it varies with reference to the branch.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is very good and also has a green campus. College campus is really big with various facilities such as gym, badminton court, basketball ground, and study hall for both girls and boys. Library is also quite big with all types of books included.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teachers are quite knowledgeable and everyone holds M.Tech degree. There are 2-3 teachers with PhD. Faculty members are really cooperative and knowledgeable. Diploma course makes the students industry-ready as the syllabus is also designed as per. Exams and certificates are by MSBTE for diploma courses.
detailed_review.Other: Overall, the college is good. Events are held in college and are excellently managed.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review_title: I'm not satisfied with some of the faculty; otherwise, the whole college is better.

detailed_review.Placements: 80-90 percent of students from my batch were placed in various companies. The highest package was 12.5 Lacs, and the average package for mechanical placement is 7.5-8 Lacs per annum. Yes, students get internships also in various multinational companies. It has a very good PPO after the completion of the internship.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Academic Infrastructure: Well-equipped classrooms with multimedia projectors and modern teaching aids, specialized engineering laboratories for each department, including computer labs, electronics labs, mechanical workshops, etc. A central library with over 80,000 books.
detailed_review.Faculty: Teaching Faculty: Most faculty members hold Ph.D. degrees or are pursuing doctoral studies. Many professors have industry experience and research publications. The teaching quality varies by department but is generally considered above average. Faculty members are typically accessible for doubt-solving and guidance. Many professors are involved in research projects and consultancy work.
detailed_review.Other: Notable Strengths: Strong brand value as one of Maharashtra's oldest and most reputed engineering colleges. Excellent placement record with top companies visiting campus. High-quality technical education with an emphasis on practical learning. Strong alumni network across various industries. Affordable education compared to private colleges. The merit-based admission process ensures a quality peer group.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
reviews.review_title: One of the Premium Institutes from Maharashtra.

detailed_review.Placements: AIML introduced this year only. So, no placement of this course for the next 3-4 years, but placements of AIML will be similar to IT. IT students are hired by big companies like Cred, Rubric, etc. Around 60 LPA was the highest salary offered this time. Average is around 12-13 LPA. The lowest drops to 4 LPA. Almost 80% students get internships.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of the college is good. As the college is from 1947, some old buildings are there. Wi-Fi facility is all over the campus with great connectivity and great performance. The library is well established. Labs and classrooms are well-equipped. The hostel is in old buildings, but the newly constructed Cyber Hostel is better than previous ones. There are two messes in the college; both of them are good.
detailed_review.Faculty: Almost every teacher is helpful to students. Teachers are well qualified with knowledge of their subjects properly. Our course, AIML, has been designed considering CS and IT courses. Semester exams are moderate, but some subjects students face difficulty.

reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
reviews.review_title: Review of Walchand College of Engineering.

detailed_review.Placements: A high percentage of students get placed in top companies from my course: more than 70%. The highest package offered to them is more than 16 lacs for year and the lowest is 3 lacs. The percentage of student internships in this course is more than 80% in my course, like Accenture and HDFC Bank.
detailed_review.Infrastructure: All the facilities are available in my course. Wi-Fi is there in the classroom. The library is available for all students in college. The food of the college canteen is so good but is tasteless. Medical facility is not available in this course. But sports and games facilities are available.
detailed_review.Faculty: The teachers in my course were so helpful, qualified and knowledgeable. They had great teaching quality. This course is curriculum relevant and students are made industry ready. The semester exam in this course is so easy; therefore, the pass percentage is more than 60% in the exam.
detailed_review.Other: I chose this course to learn computers. Events are so good. Scholarship is available. Extracurricular activities happened.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility to get admission in Walchand College of Engineering for UG/PG courses?
faqs.answer:
Walchand College of Engineering has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: Courses Eligibility B.E. / B.Tech Candidate must have completed Diploma Course in Engineering and Technology in relevant stream with minimum 45% marks (40% marks in case of candidates of Backward class categories and Persons with Disability belonging to Maharashtra State only) from an All India Council for Technical Education or Central or State Government approved Institution or its equivalent.
OR
Candidate must have completed B.Sc. from UGC/ Association of Indian Universities recognised University with at least 45% marks (40% in case of candidates of Backward class categories and Persons with Disability belonging to Maharashtra State only) and passed 10+2 with Mathematics as a subject. After 10th Diploma Candidate passed 10th class/SSC examination or its equivalent, with at least 35% aggregate marks from any recognised institute/board are eligible to apply. M.E./M.Tech Sponsored candidate must have minimum of two years of full time work experience in a registered firm/ company/ industry/ educational and/ or research institute/ any Government Department or Government Autonomous Organization in the relevant field in which admission is being sought. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT

faqs.question: How many seats are available for various courses offered at Walchand College of Engineering?
faqs.answer: Courses offerred by Walchand College of Engineering are approved by eminent Government bodies like AICTE. The combined seats available for courses offered at Walchand College of Engineering goes up to 830. Not satisfied with answer? Ask Shiksha GPT
